divine_journey_2.quest.line.0.title: 1. 旅程從現在開始 !
divine_journey_2.quest.line.0.desc: 歡迎來到 Divine Journey 2! 我希望你會喜歡這裡
divine_journey_2.quest.line.1.title: 4. 沉浸其中無法自拔
divine_journey_2.quest.line.1.desc: 通過沉浸工藝(Immersive Engineering)初嘗電力的滋味.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.2.title: 5. 世界探索 I
divine_journey_2.quest.line.2.desc: 打遍地獄, 並決定是否要進入暮光森林探險.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.3.title: 6. 機械化!
divine_journey_2.quest.line.3.desc: 投入通用機械(Mekanism)的研究, 並解鎖應用能源2(Applied Energistics 2)的ME儲存系統.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.4.title: 7. 世界探索 II
divine_journey_2.quest.line.4.desc: 前往沙漠次元(Atum 2)蒐集素材, 並準備在混沌世界(The Erebus)得到蜘蛛恐懼症吧.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.5.title: 8. 世界探索 III
divine_journey_2.quest.line.5.desc: 在天境(Aether)上漂浮, 在冰晶雪原(Iceika)中凍僵, 征服終界, 墜入漆黑之門(Deep Dark).
divine_journey_2.quest.line.6.title: 9. 小幫手與實用工具
divine_journey_2.quest.line.6.desc: 運用更多實用設備2(Extra Utilities 2)將你的電網充電, 打開開放式方塊(OpenBlock), 解鎖強大的刷怪塔實用設備(mobgrinding utils).
divine_journey_2.quest.line.7.title: 10. 機器嗡嗡嗡
divine_journey_2.quest.line.7.desc: 精通熱力膨脹(Thermal Expansion)和終界接口(EnderIO), 解鎖終界.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.8.title: 11. 工業蓬勃發展
divine_journey_2.quest.line.8.desc: 開始發展工業先鋒(Industrial Foregoing), 量子通量(QuantumFlux), 太陽能重製(Solar Flux Reborn)和 集成聯合(Integrated Dynamics).
divine_journey_2.quest.line.9.title: 12. 實用科技
divine_journey_2.quest.line.9.desc: 快速精通實用拓展(Actually Additions), 並解鎖新的刷生怪磚和噴氣套裝!
divine_journey_2.quest.line.10.title: 13. 機械巔峰
divine_journey_2.quest.line.10.desc: 在這個章節中解鎖通用機械(Mekanism)的多方塊結構, 終界設備(Ender Utilities), 以及 ME 自動合成.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.11.title: 14. 直入深淵
divine_journey_2.quest.line.11.desc: 進入伊甸(Eden)和野木(the Wildwoods)的世界冒險, 並為深淵國度(AbyssalCraft)瘋狂吧.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.12.title: 15. 玩玩血吧!
divine_journey_2.quest.line.12.desc: 獻祭給血魔法(Blood Magic)並體驗邪惡工藝(EvilCraft)的血腥殺戮!
divine_journey_2.quest.line.13.title: 16. 土裡的鑽石
divine_journey_2.quest.line.13.desc: 用神秘農業(Mystical Agriculture)種植, 並種出完美的精華.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.14.title: 17. 生命之力與魔法之力
divine_journey_2.quest.line.14.desc: 成為植物魔法(Botania)的養分, 並推進血魔法(Blood Magic)和 深淵國度(AbyssalCraft)的發展!
divine_journey_2.quest.line.15.title: 19. 奧術舞台!
divine_journey_2.quest.line.15.desc: 為秘術時代(Thaumcraft)加一點瘋狂, 並前往冰刺(Skythern)和 黑金(Mortum)世界.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.16.title: 20. 女巫的屋是哪個嗚?
divine_journey_2.quest.line.16.desc: 使用巫術(Witchery)釀造和烹煮, 召喚惡魔, 並吞噬 Boss 級怪物.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.17.title: 22. 探究能源的冒險
divine_journey_2.quest.line.17.desc: 在夢魘世界(Vethea)重新開始, 用雷電工藝(LightningCraft)為您的世界充能.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.18.title: 21. 逐漸進化的奧術之力
divine_journey_2.quest.line.18.desc: 增強你的秘術時代(Thaumacraft)的技術, 並解鎖數位化的源質經驗儲存裝置!
divine_journey_2.quest.line.19.title: 23. 觀星師的工作!
divine_journey_2.quest.line.19.desc: 透過星輝魔法(Astral Sorcery)觀測星象, 解鎖強力的武器, 工具, 和星能力.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.20.title: 24. 飛向宇宙 浩瀚無垠!
divine_journey_2.quest.line.20.desc: 跟著星系模組(GalactiCraft)一同升空, 並解鎖一個更有效率的注能方法!
divine_journey_2.quest.line.21.title: 25. 如龍添翼
divine_journey_2.quest.line.21.desc: 與龍科技(Draconic Evolution)一起並行, 並解鎖封包合成(PackagedAuto)來自動合成更大的合成配方.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.22.title: 26. 原子微觀世界
divine_journey_2.quest.line.22.desc: 給我滾回去學基礎化學(Alchemistry).
divine_journey_2.quest.line.23.title: 27. 人造世界
divine_journey_2.quest.line.23.desc: 用RF工具:維度(RFTools Dimensions)探索全新的世界.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.24.title: 30. 未知的神秘
divine_journey_2.quest.line.25.title: 28. 這些物質將掌管世界
divine_journey_2.quest.line.25.desc: 將你那些卡頓的農場, 刷怪場, 採掘場替換成等價交換(ProjectE), 這是 EMC 的時代!
divine_journey_2.quest.line.26.title: 29. 創造模式!
divine_journey_2.quest.line.26.desc: 開啟創造模式!...就是...你懂的.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.27.title: 2. 在圖騰柱上起舞吧
divine_journey_2.quest.line.27.desc: 探索圖騰模組(Totemic)的奧秘並最終擊敗貝柯克
divine_journey_2.quest.line.28.title: 3. 問題的"根"源
divine_journey_2.quest.line.28.desc: 一個農業導向的魔法模組, 試著挖掘植物的根吧.
divine_journey_2.quest.line.29.title: 18. 植物魔法學家的夢想
divine_journey_2.quest.line.29.desc: 探究黑暗領域(Dark Realm)的奧秘, 並完成植物魔法(Botania)和血魔法(Blood Magic)的內容!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.0.title: 和平與黑暗
divine_journey_2.quest.db.0.desc: 擴張薰香祭壇至最高階, 在它四邊增加2x3的矩形黑曜石磚路面.%n%n若你不確定正確的蓋法, 到這閱讀更多: https://ftb.gamepedia.com/Incense_Altar
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1.title: Laser crafting advantages
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1.desc: Now that you have a Laser Focus multiblock, you can MUCH more easily craft Elevatium Ingots (with an even higher yield!) and Mirion Ingots. Simply throw in all the ingredients and let it run!%n%nI recommend setting up a separate Laser Focus multiblock just for Elevatium crafting.%n%nIn order to autocraft Elevatium Ingots however, you'll need a Huge Item Input for your machine, and a Pattern that contains 16 items. Normally, AE2 can only create Patterns that contain up to 9 unique items - but fortunately, Packaged Auto is close by! Check out the next Chapter, automate Dragon Hearts and Dragon Eggs using Dragon Egg Seeds, and craft a bunch of Packaged Auto items for automation!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.2.title: 未加框:過濾
divine_journey_2.quest.db.2.desc: 合成過濾升級!%n%n用在電動泵中產生重水,用來製作氘,氘氚燃料的其中一個材料
divine_journey_2.quest.db.3.title: 最棒的電容!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.3.desc: 合成恆星合金電容! 將你最常使用的機器升級到恆星合金等級, 大幅增加處理效率.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.4.title: 清理一下EnderIO...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.4.desc: 合成恆星合金錠, 最高階的EnderIO材料!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.5.title: 噓!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.5.desc: 合成兩個火花! 這些小的能量聚焦球能高速從一個地方傳輸魔力至另一個.%n%n若你想要更好的控制它們, 合成火花升級並在火花上右鍵.%n%n注意: 要合成甲烷, 你需要破壞氫和碳至它們最小的結晶型式, 然後合併它們.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.6.title: 蒐集者
divine_journey_2.quest.db.6.desc: 用薩托斯的靈魂收割之刃擊殺怪物填充靈魂! 蒐集的靈魂越多, 這把武器就越強.%n%n一旦蒐集足夠的靈魂, 合成靈魂提取器並和它結合取出靈魂... 真嚇人!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.7.title: 魔法可能實現預言
divine_journey_2.quest.db.7.desc: §lᛊᚼᚼᛇ ᛞᚣᚨ ᚨᚢᚼ ᛪᚼᛤᛇ ᛤᛣᚥ ᚦᚣᛗᛣ ᚨᚢᚼᚭ! ᚦᚣᛗᛣ ᚨᚢᚼᚭ ᛤᛊ ᛤ ᛊᛤᛋᛗᛉᚮᛉᛋᚼ ᚨᛞ ᚨᚢᚼ ᚨᛗᚣᚼ ᚬᛞᚥ! ᛪᚢᛞ ᛉᛊ ᛗᚼᛤᚥᚠ ᚨᛞ ᚬᛉᛝᚼ ᚣᛈ ᚨᚢᚼᛉᛗ ᚸᛉᛝᚼᛊ ᚨᛞ ᛊᛤᛝᚼ ᛞᚨᚢᚼᛗᛊ? ᛞᚣᛗ ᚨᛗᛉᚦᚼ ᚢᛤᛊ ᛊᚣᚮᚮᚼᛗᚼᚥ ᚼᛣᛞᚣᚬᚢ, ᛪᚼ ᛪᛉᚸᚸ ᛣᛞᚨ ᚠᛉᚼᚸᚥ! ᚨᚢᛉᛊ ᛉᛊ ᛞᚣᛗ ᚮᛉᛣᛤᚸ ᛋᚢᛤᛣᛋᚼ. ᛞᚣᛗ ᚮᛉᛣᛤᚸ ᛋᚢᛤᛣᛋᚼ ᛤᚨ ᚸᛉᛝᛉᛣᚬ! ᚨᚢᚼ ᛞᚣᚨᛋᛞᚭᚼ ᛞᚮ ᚨᚢᛉᛊ ᛗᛉᚨᚣᛤᚸ ᛪᛉᚸᚸ ᚥᚼᚨᚼᛗᚭᛉᛣᚼ ᚨᚢᚼ ᚮᚣᚨᚣᛗᚼ ᛞᚮ ᛞᚣᛗ ᚨᛗᛉᚦᚼ! ᛣᛞᛣᚼ ᛋᛤᛣ ᛊᚨᛞᛈ ᚣᛊ! ᛤᚸᚸ ᛪᚼ ᛋᛤᛣ ᚥᛞ ᛣᛞᛪ ᛉᛊ ᚢᛞᛈᚼ, ᚢᛞᛈᚼ ᚨᚢᛤᚨ ᚢᚼ ᚸᛉᛊᚨᚼᛣᛊ.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.8.title: 石英化石英的階級
divine_journey_2.quest.db.8.desc: 誰能不'愛'套娃合成呢?!%n%n...%n%n嗯...%n%n有人嗎?%n%n好吧我只是想炫耀自己而已.%n%n%n%n%n(順帶一提當然你會想要把它自動化的.)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.9.title: 它描述了一個古老的信仰
divine_journey_2.quest.db.9.desc: §lᛪᚼ ᚢᛤᛝᚼ ᛈᛗᛤᚠᚼᚥ ᚨᛞ ᚭᛤᛣᚠ ᚬᛞᚥᛊ, ᚦᚣᚨ ᛣᛞᛣᚼ ᚢᛤᛝᚼ ᛤᛣᛊᛪᚼᛗᚼᚥ. ᛪᚼ ᚢᛤᛝᚼ ᚸᛞᛊᚨ ᚭᛤᛣᚠ ᛪᛤᛗᛊ, ᚸᛞᛊᚨ ᚭᛤᛣᚠ ᚸᛉᛝᚼᛊ, ᛤᛣᚥ ᚨᚢᚼᛗᚼ ᛉᛊ ᛣᛞᚨᚢᛉᛣᚬ ᛪᚼ ᚢᛤᛝᚼ ᚸᚼᚮᚨ ᚨᛞ ᛞᚣᛗ ᛣᛤᚭᚼ. ᛉᚮ ᛤᛣᚠ ᚬᛞᚥ ᚼᛥᛉᛊᚨᛊ ᛉᛣ ᚨᚢᚼ ᛝᛤᛊᚨᛣᚼᛊᛊ ᛞᚮ ᛪᚢᛤᚨ ᛉᛊ ᛞᚣᚨ ᚨᚢᚼᛗᚼ, ᛈᚸᚼᛤᛊᚼ, ᚢᚼᛤᛗ ᛞᚣᛗ ᛋᛤᚸᚸ. ᛈᚸᚼᛤᛊᚼ, ᚢᚼᚸᛈ ᚣᛊ. ᛤᛊ ᛣᛞᛣᚼ ᚢᛤᛝᚼ ᚢᚼᚸᛈᚼᚥ ᚦᚼᚮᛞᛗᚼ. ᚨᚢᚼᛗᚼ ᛉᛊ ᛞᛣᚼ ᚸᛤᛊᚨ ᚬᛞᚥ ᛪᚼ ᚢᛤᛝᚼ ᛣᛞᚨ ᛈᛗᛤᚠᚼᚥ ᚨᛞ. ᛞᛣᚼ ᚸᛤᛊᚨ ᚢᛞᛈᚼ. ᚭᛤᚠᚦᚼ ᛉᚮ ᛪᚼ ᛊᛤᛋᛗᛉᚮᛉᛋᚼ ᛤᚸᚸ ᛪᚼ ᚢᛤᛝᚼ ᚸᚼᚮᚨ, ᚨᚢᚼ ᚸᛉᛝᚼᛊ ᛞᚮ ᚨᚢᚼ ᛪᚼᛤᛇ, ᚭᛤᚠᚦᚼ ᛪᚼ ᛋᛤᛣ ᚬᚼᚨ ᛊᛞᚭᚼ ᚢᛞᛈᚼ, ᚭᛤᚠᚦᚼ ᛉᚨ ᛉᛊ ᛣᛞᚨ ᚨᛞᛞ ᚸᛤᚨᚼ.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.10.title: 美妙的神祕石頭販售中!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.10.desc: 從它們身上賺錢很容易, 因為這些花會產生它們... 你只需要些一般的石頭, 我想你應該有非常多, 然後放下這些花哇喔! 附近的石頭轉換成變質石頭... 這個... , 我確定你能拿來做些什麼!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.11.title: 還餓嗎?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.11.desc: 合成彼方蘭! 這是個飢餓的花, 從任何的食物中產生魔力. 然而若你重複餵食相同的食物會產生越來越少的魔力, 所以至少交互餵食兩種食物. 它的範圍只有以它為中心的3x3x3的立方體, 所以請精準的丟食物!%n%n這是方便且不差的魔力來源; 但和熾玫瑰一樣, 至少需要一些數量才能感受到它的效率.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.12.title: 七宗罪加一
divine_journey_2.quest.db.12.desc: 合成每個第3階植物魔法的符文!%n%n自此開始, 這些物品會大量的使用, 所以務必將配方中的每一個環節都自動化!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.13.title: 它們現在流的血更多
divine_journey_2.quest.db.13.desc: 升級你的血腥基座至效率I的版本, 為了流更多的血... 耶!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.14.title: 我在做夢嗎?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.14.desc: 在跟精靈交易植物魔法辭典後, 為何不試試些其他的材料...?%n%n喔, 那為何不試試持續的和它們交易, 使用自動投擲器連接ME介面, 這能讓你用呼叫的方式取得這些材料...? 為何不呢!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.15.title: 泰拉般恐怖的傷害
divine_journey_2.quest.db.15.desc: 將一些源質鋼工具升級至泰拉鋼的版本! 泰拉鋼工具比束縛工具有更高的挖掘等級.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.16.title: 粉紅乒乓
divine_journey_2.quest.db.16.desc: 合成些源質鋼工具.%n%n注意: 你不需要急著完成這個任務. 束縛工具或許更強. 然而, 為了後期遊戲的工具像是雙足飛龍和神龍工具, 這些是必須的.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.17.title: 等等, 還有更多...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.17.desc: 插入典型的BOSS戰後的註解像是%n%n"你剛擊敗的不過是我的肉身!"%n%n或%n%n"你這些凡人不可能輕易地奪走我的性命!"%n%n或%n%n"結束了安納金, 我站在高處! 你低估了我的力量!!!"%n%n.... 喔, 等等, 最後一個或許不是我想表達的.%n%n總之, 蓋亞守護者回來了, 比之前更強了! 在前一個召喚儀式中將泰拉剛錠替換成蓋亞魂錠, 再來一次!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.18.title: 植物魔法的高潮
divine_journey_2.quest.db.18.desc: 在升級後的植物魔法辭典中, 在"精靈學"的章節中閱讀蓋亞儀式的資訊!%n%n用1個烽火台和4個蓋亞水晶蓋起來並準備戰鬥! 最後, 用泰拉鋼右鍵烽火台啟動, 召喚蓋亞守護者!%n%n祝你好運!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.19.title: 你的池子冷卻了嗎?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.19.desc: 不嗎? 好吧, 你能用這個冷卻你的池子... 你的魔力池, 就是這樣. 這能做什麼? 啊, 它能將物品轉換成別種東西... 對, 我知道這很詭異.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.20.title: 黑色的封面? 一定是恐怖小說!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.20.desc: 用任何4個鑄幣把死靈之書升級至奧穆索的版本!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.21.title: 牆上的著作
divine_journey_2.quest.db.21.desc: 合成或在奧穆索的房子內找到鑄幣器! 在下方的欄位放入某種鑄幣雕版, 並在上方的欄位放入(空白)鑄幣, 來將鑄幣刻上邪惡之神的臉! 真迷人.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.22.title: 壓縮黑曜石對此一無所知!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.22.desc: 挖些伊桑斯石! ... 老實說, 說的比做得好聽. 為什麼? 好吧, 你會懂得.%n%n提醒: 你或許會想要用血魔法的束縛之鎬. 這是目前你能把它挖起來的唯一工具.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.23.title: 撕下來!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.23.desc: 用你之前的撕裂法杖並蒐集些奧穆索食屍鬼腐肉來合成奧穆索獸皮!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.24.title: 絕處... 重生!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.24.desc: 將深淵之書完全充滿! 一旦你完成了, 從奧穆索跳入虛空中進入最終的深淵國度維度, 黑暗領域! 要回來的話, 手持鑰匙對空中右鍵, 或對地板右鍵做出傳送門.%n%n你在深淵國度中有個最後的目標: 召喚並擊敗末日先驅薩托斯!%n%n召喚它, 用9個深色依桑斯磚塊蓋個儀式圓圈, 並打開你的深淵之書, 到儀式的章節, 深淵之書, 翻到最後一頁(第20頁), 執行這裡寫的儀式: the Ritual of Shadows 在黑暗領域裡!%n%n成功後召喚並擊敗薩托斯, 會掉落他的劍, 薩托斯的靈魂收割之刃. 用這把劍擊殺怪物, 它會蒐集靈魂並越來越強.%n%n雖然你或許想要把靈魂取出來看它們有什麼效果...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.25.title: 完成收藏
divine_journey_2.quest.db.25.desc: 升級死靈之書至最高階: 深淵之書!%n%n所有黑暗的知識都已解鎖...%n%n你幹了什麼好事?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.26.title: 石頭現在一點機會都沒有!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.26.desc: 合成泰拉粉碎者! 這確實是一把不錯的鎬子, 特別是當完全升級之後.%n要升級它, 只要填充魔力! 最高階級是SS.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.27.title: 從一個石板到另一個
divine_journey_2.quest.db.27.desc: 合成魔力石板! 這個方便的物品能在包包裡儲存魔力, 使用它充能任何物品或飾品欄需要魔力的東西.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.28.title: 它喜歡美味的舒芙蕾?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.28.desc: 如果彼方蘭不和你的口味, 為何不試試更甜的東西...? 這個花只吃蛋糕! 每隔4秒它消耗一片的蛋糕, 在以它為中心的11x11x11的立方體內, 若你能在32秒內生產1個蛋糕, 這就是你要的花!%n%n多使用幾個貪食花是個更好的主意. 而放置蛋糕最好的方法是使用成型面板或方塊放置口.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.29.title: 你是地球, 這個物品就是月亮
divine_journey_2.quest.db.29.desc: 將磁化指環升級至最高階的磁鐵! 物品絕對不會離你而去.%n%n當然除非你使用了弱磁蘭.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.30.title: 最棒的導管!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.30.desc: 電力靠它暢行無阻的傳輸!!!!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.31.title: 牙仙子的領域
divine_journey_2.quest.db.31.desc: 合成列出的方塊並蓋出精靈傳送門! 你能在植物魔法辭典中察看正確的結構, 在"精靈學"的章節.%n%n從自然水晶中提供魔力(魔力池在水晶下方). 傳送門需要魔力來維持開啟, 第一次開啟需要1/4的魔力池(分別由兩個自然水晶下的魔力池中提供), 每次交易消耗非常少量的魔力.%n%n一旦開啟, 第一件該做的事情是和精靈交易植物魔法辭典取得精靈知識!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.32.title: 嘗起來像是杏仁膏, 如果你有鑽石牙
divine_journey_2.quest.db.32.desc: 製作一些泰拉鋼錠! 製作一個會需要提供半個魔力池的魔力給泰拉凝聚板. 將魔力產線升級若你缺乏足夠的魔力值!%n%n要繼續前進, 蓋出精靈傳送門, 你會需要共6個泰拉鋼錠. 製作4個然後我會給你免費的2個!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.33.title: 一個寶珠... 有著如此強大的力量!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.33.desc: 取得最終階的氣血寶珠, 第6...%n%n喔.%n%n這§o是§r什麼?%n%n...%n%n突然有種衝動.%n%n想要毀滅的衝動 - §lᚠ ᛤᚸᚸ ᚸᛉᛝᛉᛣᚬ ᚨᚢᛉᛣᚬᛊ. ᚨᚢᛉᛊ ᛉᛊ ᚠᛞᚣᛗ ᚥᚼᛊᚨᛉᛣᚠ. ᛣᛞᛣᚼ ᛋᛤᛣ ᛊᚨᛞᛈ ᚠᛞᚣ ᛣᛞᛪ! ᚥᛗᛤᛉᛣ ᚨᚢᚼᛉᛗ ᚦᚸᛞᛞᚥᛊ ᛤᛣᚥ ᚦᚼᛋᛞᚭᚼ ᚨᚢᚼ ᚨᛗᚣᚼ ᛇᛉᛣᚬ ᛞᚮ ᚨᚢᛉᛊ ᛪᛞᛗᚸᚥ!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.34.title: 成為血魔法之神之路
divine_journey_2.quest.db.34.desc: 成為真正血魔法之神的最後一步, 達到最終階層... 第6階! 為了這個你需要4個晶簇塊將血之祭壇升級至第6階.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.35.title: 把靈魂灌注成泰拉
divine_journey_2.quest.db.35.desc: 合成泰拉凝聚板! 到植物魔法辭典中查看如和建造. 提示: 它是X型的5個活石, 並在每邊填滿共4個青金石磚, 然後在中間的活石上放置凝聚板.%n%n要提供凝聚板魔力, 用火花! 一個在凝聚板上, 一個在附近的魔力池上.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.36.title: 最終的魂石
divine_journey_2.quest.db.36.desc: 合成精製地域魂石! 這是最後且最大容量的地獄魂石. 好好使用它!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.37.title: 重新再戰!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.37.desc: 所以, 你成功了嗎...?%n%n是的話, 你最後會獲得命運骰子. 注意! 若你想要繼續推進進度, 別右鍵它! 這會摧毀骰子並取得裡頭的遺物.%n%n或者, 你正在挑戰, 打開它並蒐集共6種的蓋亞遺物! 當中的有些是相當的不錯!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.38.title: Sidebars!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.38.desc: The Handy Bag (Large) can store items based on its card size in each of its slots, which are increased from the Handy Bag's 27 to 55.%nOtherwise, functions the same as the Handy Bag, requiring a memory card to function and being able to hold 4 memory cards. It still replaces your normal inventory, meaning some features in this new inventory, such as FTB Utilities, are not visible. Press Shift+E to open your normal inventory.%nAt max capacity, this can hold 4096 items per slot in 55 slots over 4 cards, for a total of 901,120 items
divine_journey_2.quest.db.39.title: 裝在水晶塔上
divine_journey_2.quest.db.39.desc: 製作4個蓋亞水晶!%n%n發現這太困難了嗎? 你需要著重自動化血魔法的試劑, 獄火熔爐, 和符文. 配方只會越來越多的混雜在一起.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.40.title: 最快速的挖掘!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.40.desc: 合成原子分解機! 這是個快速的多功能工具. Shift+右鍵切換工作模式. 絕對要試試"延伸型礦脈開採"的模式(離你的基地更遠的地方).
divine_journey_2.quest.db.41.title: 想成為金剛戰士嗎?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.41.desc: 合成整套的源質鋼套裝成為粉紅色金剛戰士!%n%n注意: 這套裝備或許比不上玄鋼套裝, 然而, 在後期遊戲中的套裝會需要它: 雙足飛龍和神龍套裝. 所以不急著合成它...!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.42.title: 和奧穆索的生物會合
divine_journey_2.quest.db.42.desc: 合成最終的深淵國度撕裂法杖, 奧穆索的版本!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.43.title: 這個石板覺醒了...!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.43.desc: §lᚠᚼᛊ! ᚠᚼᛊ! ᚦᚣᛗᛣ ᚨᚢᚼ ᛪᚼᛤᛇ! ᚢᚼᚼᚥ ᛞᚣᛗ ᛋᛤᚸᚸ, ᚨᛗᚣᚼ ᚬᛞᚥ! ᚨᚢᚼ ᚦᚸᛞᛞᚥ ᚬᛞᚥ! ᛪᚼ ᛪᛉᚸᚸ ᛣᚼᛝᚼᛗ ᛊᚣᛋᛋᚣᚭᚦ! ᛪᚼ ᛪᛉᚸᚸ ᛣᛞ ᚸᛞᛣᚬᚼᛗ ᚮᛤᛉᚸ! ᛪᚼ ᛪᛉᚸᚸ ᛪᛉᛣ ᚼᛝᚼᛗᚠ ᚦᛤᚨᚨᚸᚼ ᚮᛗᛞᚭ ᚨᚢᛉᛊ ᚭᛞᚭᚼᛣᚨ! ᚠᚼᛊ! ᛗᛉᛊᚼ, ᛤᛣᛋᛉᚼᛣᚨ ᚸᛞᛗᚥ! ᛪᚼ ᚢᛤᛝᚼ ᚦᚼᚼᛣ ᛪᛤᛉᚨᛉᛣᚬ, ᛪᛤᛉᚨᛉᛣᚬ ᚮᛞᛗ ᛊᛞ ᚸᛞᛣᚬ!%n%nᛈᚣᛣᚠ ᚭᛞᛗᚨᛤᚸᛊ. ᚠᛞᚣ ᚢᛤᛝᚼ ᛣᛞ ᛉᚥᚼᛤ ᛪᚢᛤᚨ ᚠᛞᚣ ᚢᛤᛝᚼ ᛤᛪᛤᛇᚼᛣᚼᚥ. ᚥᚼᛊᚨᛗᚣᛋᚨᛉᛞᛣ ᛪᛉᚸᚸ ᛋᛞᚭᚼ ᚨᛞ ᚨᚢᛉᛊ ᛪᛞᛗᚸᚥ. ᛉ ᛪᛉᚸᚸ ᚥᛗᛤᛉᛣ ᚨᚢᚼ ᚼᛣᚼᛗᚬᚠ ᚮᛗᛞᚭ ᚨᚢᚼ ᛝᚼᛊᛊᚼᚸᛊ ᛞᚮ ᚠᛞᚣᛗ ᛋᛞᛣᛊᛋᛉᛞᚣᛊᛣᚼᛊᛊ. ᛤᛊ ᛉ ᛤᚭ ᛉᚭᚭᛞᛗᚨᚣᛊ, ᚨᚢᚼ ᚦᚸᛞᛞᚥ ᚬᛞᚥ. ᛤᚸᚸ ᛪᛉᚸᚸ ᚦᛞᛪ ᚦᚼᚮᛞᛗᚼ ᚭᚼ. ᚠᚼᛊ! ᚠᚼᛊ! ᚬᛉᛝᚼ ᚭᚼ ᚠᛞᚣᛗ ᚦᚸᛞᛞᚥ! ᚨᚢᚼ ᛪᛞᛗᚸᚥ ᛪᛉᚸᚸ ᚦᚼ ᛗᚼᛋᛤᛊᚨ ᛉᛣᚨᛞ ᛋᚢᛤᛞᛊ! ᛣᛞᛣᚼ ᛪᛉᚸᚸ ᛊᚣᛗᛝᛉᛝᚼ!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.44.title: 現在是火花時間
divine_journey_2.quest.db.44.desc: 合成每種火花升級各1個, 能更好的控制你的魔力流動.%n%n- 聚集火花吸取附近火花的魔力.%n- 擴散火花把魔力給所有附近的火花.%n- 隔絕火花不會和聚集或擴散火花互動.%n- 彌散火花將魔力傳輸至玩家包包中的魔力石板.%n%n所有火花會在25x25x25的範圍內有效.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.45.title: 這不是鋼唷
divine_journey_2.quest.db.45.desc: 合成些模組化合金錠! 這是模組化機械模組所需的方塊基礎. 雖然你還不需要建造任何模組化機械.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.46.title: 想要成為百萬蘊魔富翁?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.46.desc: 合成蘊魔結晶錠! 你可用冶煉爐製作合金或是使用充能台. 第一個選擇比較容易批量製作, 第二個更容易自動化.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.47.title: 去吧, 繼續升階!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.47.desc: 將惡魔氣血碎片轉換成第5階的氣血寶珠. 你需要先將血之祭壇升級至第5階, 需要在周圍放置4個烽火台(不需要啟動).%n%n別忘了將寶珠用右鍵和你綁定.%n%n你就快達到了... 幾乎成為血魔法之神!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.48.title: 哥布林會仰望著你
divine_journey_2.quest.db.48.desc: 合成泰拉鋼套裝! 我總是說綠色金剛戰士是最酷的.%n%n再一次說明, 不急著合成它, 但這套裝有著不錯的植物魔法的增益.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.49.title: 終於能碰到我一直很癢的那個點
divine_journey_2.quest.db.49.desc: 合成觸物指環! 這讓你能... 好吧, 你知道我會用什麼方法說明它.%n%n提示: 看它的名稱. (我的意思是拜託很明顯吧!)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.50.title: 現在你控制了天氣!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.50.desc: 破壞一個一般的環境儲存器, 並用這章和前一章取得的材料, 升級至血腥環境儲存器!%n%n這是個可移動的環境控制器, 需要血液運作. 你需要8個血液儲罐放置在像是騎士走的位置, 不是走 2-1, 而是走 3-1.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.51.title: 守門人的承諾
divine_journey_2.quest.db.51.desc: 飛到奧穆索維度的中心(x=0, z=0)找到奧穆索地牢! 若你在大型的多人伺服器遊玩且你的傳送門非常遙遠, 歡迎使用前一個任務獎勵送的奧穆索傳送器!%n%n進入地牢. 會發現個房間讓你放儀式, 如果想要的話. 一旦你準備好了, 走上二樓找到深淵的守門者扎哈爾. 與它作戰!%n%n它死後,它會把你拉進去並且爆炸! 或許不用我多說, 但... 遠離爆炸! 然後它會掉落這個任務需要的物品, 守門者精華.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.52.title: 前方道路崎嶇
divine_journey_2.quest.db.52.desc: 符刻黑曜石是下一階的立石.雖然主要的用途是升級工具和裝備.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.53.title: 氣血碎片的真正型態
divine_journey_2.quest.db.53.desc: 將虛弱的氣血碎片升級至惡魔氣血碎片... 它真正的型態!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.54.title: 咀嚼
divine_journey_2.quest.db.54.desc: 若你害怕這些花把你的手臂吃掉, 別害怕 - 它只會吃樹葉方塊! 每隔 4 ticks (0.2秒) 它在以它為中心17x17, 和上方16格的範圍中搜尋任何樹葉方塊. 若找到一個, 它會很樂意的吃掉它 - 每個方塊產生160點魔力. 若你的樹場有很多額外的樹苗的話, 這很棒!%n%n然而請小心這些花. 若它找不到任何樹葉方塊, 它會休息80秒! 所以必須持續的餵食它, 否則它不是那麼的有效率.%n%n若你有超大的樹場, 或許甚至能用多個咀葉!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.55.title: 警告: 重力增加
divine_journey_2.quest.db.55.desc: 將磁引印記升級成(更好的)磁化指環. 把它放在飾品欄. 這個磁鐵很強大, 物品不會逃離你的引力.%n%n若你想要停用磁鐵, 可以放置弱磁蘭. (推薦在魔力池附近.)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.56.title: 像天使般的飛翔!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.56.desc: 終於! 飛行! 但不是免費的... 你需要從包包內的魔力石板中, 以魔力為代價.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.57.title: 你超快---的
divine_journey_2.quest.db.57.desc: 將旅居者腰帶升級, 然後跑超快---....!!!!!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.58.title: 鑽了又鑽 鑽了又鑽l
divine_journey_2.quest.db.58.desc: 無限鑽頭破壞一個方塊會消耗10,000RF或3mb的生物燃油.剛開始,它只能挖掘1x1x1的範圍,但當鑽頭儲存越來越多的能量後,它會升級且能挖掘越來越多的地形.Shift+右鍵來切換大小.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.59.title: 動力已集成
divine_journey_2.quest.db.59.desc: 合成門瑞歐樹苗並開始複製它來開始集成動力模組的發展!%n%n這個模組嚴格來說現階段不太需要,但它會大大幫助你之後的自動化作業.%n%n切記閱讀任務獎勵書上的教程,幫助你認識這個模組.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.60.title: 砍樹砍樹
divine_journey_2.quest.db.60.desc: 取得更多的門瑞歐!永遠不夠用!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.61.title: 它很多變
divine_journey_2.quest.db.61.desc: 合成一堆的變數卡!它能儲存關於世界的一些訊息並能放入任何集成動力模組的讀取器和邏輯編程器.%n%n想要重製變數卡?可放入合成台中轉換回空白的變數卡.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.62.title: 更多的門瑞歐!'更多'!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.62.desc: 合成擠壓機和烘乾池!將兩者緊連著擺放,你能將門瑞歐木放入擠壓機,並在上頭跳幾次來釋放它甜美的花蜜!藍色的東西-門瑞歐樹脂.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.63.title: 連接網路
divine_journey_2.quest.db.63.desc: 合成一堆邏輯線纜!用來將你全部的集成動力網路從讀取器,輸出,顯示器連接到變數卡箱,固值器,延遲器或代理器.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.64.title: 好吧,這很有趣...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.64.desc: 想自動化門瑞歐的製作?這是給你的工具!電動擠壓機和電動烘乾池.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.65.title: 更酷的投擲器和漏斗
divine_journey_2.quest.db.65.desc: 合成物品界面!放置在箱子上時,你能將它是作為網路中的內部儲存.任何網路中拾取的物品會存進去這裡,而任何需要的物品會從這裡.%n%n然後你能使用投擲器和漏斗的更酷的兄弟:物品投擲口和物品拾取口.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.66.title: WiFi物質傳輸
divine_journey_2.quest.db.66.desc: 合成無線終端!當在你的無線存取點範圍內時,你可以用無線的方式打開你的ME系統,並取出你想要的東西!你也可以按中鍵呼叫自動合成.%n%n喔,你想要的是無線'合成'終端嗎?好吧,你得再等等了...有些東西可不便宜.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.67.title: 世界在我書中!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.67.desc: 合成些集成動力的讀取器.這能取得世界中的特定數值.這能很方便的自動化培養最高數值的星輝魔法水晶石,因為你甚至能看到方塊的NBT數值!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.68.title: 需要更多的變數?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.68.desc: 若你不想看到世界中的變數,邏輯編程器就是你要的!它能製作簡單的物件像是布林和整數,或更複雜的像是加法減法,從JEI拖出來的物品甚至更多!%n%n你也能把它轉換成攜帶式的版本.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.69.title: 找不到我要的變數!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.69.desc: 網路需要查看你引用的任何變數,這是這些變數卡存放的地方.很簡單吧!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.70.title: 真的找不到我要的變數!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.70.desc: 若你想要把變數卡轉換成靜態值,可以使用固值器.從世界中或邏輯編程器中取得變數卡,和一些新的變數卡一起放進去,靜態值轉換完成!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.71.title: 跳過圈圈
divine_journey_2.quest.db.71.desc: 合成邏輯導向零件!用於一些合成的材料,"遠程"或"無線"的集成動力模組物品.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.72.title: 更酷的方塊破壞器和方塊放置器
divine_journey_2.quest.db.72.desc: 跟前一個一樣,若你有物品介面在你的網路的某個地方,你能破壞和放置方塊.這很方便的能自動化活石,不是嗎? (雖然用破壞和成型面板也能做到.)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.73.title: Surround'er to the Matrix!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.73.desc: Craft some additional Pedestals to surround the Runix Matrix multiblock with! 8 is a good starting point, but you will need more eventually...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.74.title: Constructing the unconstructable
divine_journey_2.quest.db.74.desc: Craft a Runic Matrix and all required components listed in your Thaumonomicon! Set it up as it's shown there, then Right Click on the Runic Matrix block with some Salis Mundus.%n%nTo use it, place or pipe items onto the middle and outer Pedestals, have a sufficient amount of Essentia available in Jars nearby, and activate the ritual with your Caster's Gauntlet.%n%nIt's crucial to have a symmetrical layout of Pedestals, Jars, and other blocks nearby, as that will boost the stability of the Infusion. If your Infusion Matrix is unstable, items could get knocked down during crafting, Pedestals could emit Flux, or worse: items could entirely get destroyed, and the infusion could fail.%n%nTo prevent this, besides having a symmetrical layout, you can place stabilizer items around, below and above the Altar in a symmetrical manner. These are:%n%n- Thaumcraft Candles,%n- Skulls, Heads,%n- Thaumcraft Stabilizers.%n%nBe aware that, unlike in 1.7.10, the more variety of items you have around your Altar, the better your stability will become. These could simply include different colored candles, or multiple different mob skulls, still arranged in a symmetrical manner. E.g. if you have a Creeper Head 6 blocks away from your Runic Matrix in one direction, you should have a Creeper Head 6 blocks away in the other direction as well.%n%nStabilizers are your best option. They don't need to connect to the Altar in any way, they simply need to exist nearby. Although you have the option to connect them to all Pedestals with Redstone Relay, which will prevent items getting knocked down or destroyed - although it won't prevent the Flux issues.%n%nLastly, it's important to mention that the range of which stabilizers are detected is a 17x17x11 cuboid centered around the central Pedestal.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.75.title: Tender Ender Blender
divine_journey_2.quest.db.75.desc: Craft the required components listed in the right and construct the Tender Ender Blender Machine Blueprint, and Right Click it to visualize the multiblock. Now, using the preview, assemble the multiblock! This machine can charge any Ender Utilities Ender Cores without the need to be in the End or risking blowing up an End Crystal. It simply requires power and nothing else!%n%nThe machine uses 3 Hatches: 1 Item Input, 1 Item Output and 1 Energy Input. You can decide where you'd like to place these. Any size of Item Input/Output Hatches will suffice, but you'll need to use at least a Reinforced Energy Input Hatch.%n%nThe central block is the Stabilized End Crystal (the preview doesn't always seem to show it correctly). The lower layer consists of 3 Hatches, Machine Controller, and 1 Casing in the center. 4 blocks of Fortified Glass go on above the Hatches and the Controller. Finally, another layer of 5 Casings is required to cap it off. The Blueprint also needs to be placed inside for the machine to function.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.76.title: It's mine now!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.76.desc: Craft a Warding Sigil! This ingredient is used in many of the Warded blocks that Thaumic Augmentation adds.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.77.title: I'm a real Thaumaturge now, mom!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.77.desc: This is how you do Infusion, right....? Riiiiiight...?!%n%nNo.%n%nThis just takes power. And some Pedestals with items on top.%n%nBut it's close! It'll prepare you for the reaaaal thing.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.78.title: Master of Vengeance - Enhanced!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.78.desc: Craft more Ender Ingots and Enhance them in your Crucible!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.79.title: Better than a Cauldron
divine_journey_2.quest.db.79.desc: Sprinkle some more Salis Mundus, this time on an EvilCraft Purifier to convert it into a Crucible!%n%nIf you've never played Thaumcraft before, it's best to set this up in a chunk where you don't have many important machines - so preferably slightly away from your base.%n%nTo use it, fill it up with Water (piping systems work), and light a fire below it (later you can use a piece of Nitor as well). Once it starts bubbling, throw in items to break them down into Essentia. Be wary though, Essentia slowly evaporates, creating bad magical energy in the chunk called "Flux". You want to avoid creating Flux as much as possible, so do your recipes quickly: Throw in exact (or almost exact) amounts to create sufficient Essentia, then throw in the catalyst - the upper item in JEI recipes.%n%nIf it doesn't work, check if you still have the correct amounts of Essentia using your Thaumometer or Goggles of Revealing. If not, throw in some additional ingredients.%n%nWarning: Do NOT accidentally Right Click an item onto the Crucible! This most often occurs with the Thaumometer. Don't try to scan the Cauldron while it's active! You can scan it in item form or a block form without Water inside.%n%nTo clean up the mess you've made, use Quartz Slivers! Throwing in one piece of them will suck up 2 units of Essentia and create a Vis Crystal. You should definitely make good use of this!%n%nYou can observe the Flux in a given chunk. If levels get higher than comfortable, simply move to a different chunk. Keep in mind, a small amount of Flux doesn't hurt, but if you accidentally throw in multiple stacks of an item and/or accidentally Shift+Right Click the Crucible to empty it, then you'll release all the Flux and you can say goodbye to the chunk you were doing your alchemy in - until a bit later on, when you obtain the tools to deal with Flux. Hopefully that chunk happens to NOT be in your base... Seriously, did you listen to me? I hope so...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.80.title: Don't flux it up!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.80.desc: Craft an Auxiliary Venting Port! By placing this next to the Essentia Smeltery, you can separate out some of the Flux as harmless steam, making it useful for automation - if you don't want to constantly pay attention to your Smelteries (which you don't). You might want to place multiple of them on the same Smeltery though.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.81.title: Finally! Crucible automation!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.81.desc: Craft some Alchemical Constructs! Although this quest only requires one, you'll definitely need more if you want to automate Crucible recipes. By placing 2 of these above a single Crucible, then Right Clicking the structure with a Salis Mundus, you'll transform it into a Thaumatorium! You can simply pump Essentia into the sides of this machine to automate any Crucible recipe.%n%nNote that each side only accepts 1 type of Essentia at once. Also if you put a Chest in front of the machine, the outputs will end up in there.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.82.title: Knowledge of the Lich
divine_journey_2.quest.db.82.desc: Defeat the Arch Lich in the final boss room and loot 4 Knowledges of the Sky!%n%n... May he rest in peace before reaching his goal.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.83.title: To the Sky! (-thern)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.83.desc: Craft a set of Apalachia Blocks to enter Skythern!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.84.title: Distributing Essentia has never been easier!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.84.desc: Craft an Auxiliary Slurry Pump! When placed next to an Essentia Smeltery, it acts as a new output, meaning that additional Arcane Alembics can be placed on top. Useful for additional speed and even less Essentia clog-up.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.85.title: 塵歸塵土歸土
divine_journey_2.quest.db.85.desc: 將彩虹石板磨碎成世界鹽, 然後使用複製的配方, 能用1個世界鹽合成為2個!%n%n你可以用RFTools的自動合成機來自動化. 設定2種配方來合成世界鹽, 一個設成Keep/Int, 另一個設成Keep/ExtC. 將下方兩列填滿複製的材料, 然後至少1個欄位給世界鹽. 一旦所有的材料就定位後, 點擊"R"讓機器記得物品該去的位置. 世界鹽的欄位會永遠保持63個世界鹽, 剩下的會到輸出的欄位. 現在只需要輸入材料和導出世界鹽就可以了(不需要任何的過濾器)!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.86.title: Buy 1 Get 1 50% off!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.86.desc: Use your Awakened Cores to make an Awakened Dragon Token!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.87.title: Not a magician.. A scientist!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.87.desc: Right Click a Wood Table with your Scribing Tools to create a Research Table. Pick it up to complete this quest.%n%nThe Research Table will require Paper and non-empty Scribing Tools. To do research, simply click "Create Theory", and choose research options that pop up. Each time you click on an option, it uses up a piece of Paper and a bit of ink.%n%nFinishing the research will give you Research Points (or closer to a full point, if you don't get it to 100%), which will be required to unlock further tasks in your Thaumonomicon.%n%nSometimes the research process will require additional items for a greater bonus. These items will be consumed! If you can't continue your theory because of this, simply click "Scrap Theory". This will let you create a completely new one, but won't give you your Paper, ink or additional items back that you used during the process.%n%nOnce you run out of lightbulbs up top, you can complete the Theory to gain the Research Points acquired during the process.%n%nYou might want to scan portions of the sky and phases of the Moon - they will sometimes be used during research.%n%nPlacing an Enchantment Table, Bookshelf, Arcane Workbench, Crucible, Focal Manipulator or Brain in a Jar near the Research Table will let you "focus" on the given item at the beginning, granting you a much higher chance to learn about unique topics associated with these items.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.88.title: 銘刻, 描述, 但更重要的是'訂閱'!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.88.desc: 這適用於達到這一步的所有YouTubers.%n%n訂閱%n按讚%n留言%n分享%n打開小鈴鐺%n成為會員%n點擊資訊欄的贊助連結%n影片最後點擊看下一支影片%n%n... 好的, 回到合成. 合成筆與墨! 在合成檯中與墨囊合併填充墨水來完成研究. 若你的墨不太夠, 你可以重新填滿它.%n
divine_journey_2.quest.db.89.title: Just a desk.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.89.desc: Craft a Thaumcraft Wood Table. It's easiest to find it in JEI by typing '@thaum table'.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.90.title: Rushing through the dimensions!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.90.desc: Craft a batch of Skythern Blocks to enter the final DivineRPG Twilight Dimension: Mortum.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.91.title: It's Essential to route it
divine_journey_2.quest.db.91.desc: Craft some Essentia Tubes! By connecting these to Arcane Alembics on top of an Essentia Smeltery on one side, and a Warded Jar on the other side, you can route your Essentia into said Jars.%n%nEvery single Pipe can only transmit 1 type of Essentia. Right Click on them with an Essentia Resonator to see the current type they're set to.%n%nThis whole setup is still mostly manual until you obtain the Filling Essentia Transmuters. Additional types of Pipes can help, but as of now, you'll still have to keep an eye on the setup while it's running. If you see any Pipes leaking purple stuff, slow down or stop the machine - you don't want Flux Rifts to spawn and tear your setup apart.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.92.title: Essentially... it's a Smeltery!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.92.desc: Craft an Essentia Smeltery! First set it up OUTSIDE of your base. By putting any material (that has Thaumcraft aspects shown) inside the machine, and Coal or Alumentum in the bottom slot, you can break down the material into its components.%n%nThese will first end up in the purple bar on the left, or travel into Arcane Alembics on top. Make sure not to completely fill the bar on the left, otherwise a large amount of Flux could escape and you'll be very sad if your machines get destroyed due to a Flux Rift.%n%nWARNING: Every time the machine produces an item, it ALWAYS has a chance to spill Flux into the Chunk it's located in. Once the Flux level reaches around 60-80, a Flux Rift could spawn.%n%nRight now you want to avoid this. There are two main ways of doing this:%n%n- Keep relocating the Essentia Smeltery. Only break it when the purple bar on the left is EMPTY, otherwise you'll release a lot of Flux, probably spawning a Flux Rift in the process.%n%n- Rush to complete this Chapter and the very beginning of Bewitchment (the next Chapter), to gain access to the Flux Condenser and the Flux Condenser Lattice. Using this machine you'll be able to slowly convert Flux in a Chunk into Vitium Essentia. If you feed your Essentia Smeltery slowly, you can completely get rid of Flux in a Chunk this way, and you won't have to worry about it. This might require multiple Flux Condensers for a single Smeltery though.%n%nA community assembled list of a group of preferred items to obtain Aspects:%n%nPacked Ice - 15 §lGelum§r, 5 Ordo%nRotten Flesh - 5 §lHumanus§r, 5 §lVictus§r, 5 §lPerditio§r%nSkeleton Skull - 10 §lMortuus§r, 10 §lSpiritus§r, 10 §lExanimis§r%nEnder Arrow (Quark) - 11 §lMotus§r, 3 §lAversio§r, 7 §lAlienis§r%nAmber - 10 Vitreus, 10 §lVinculum§r%nOpal - 4 §lLuna§r, 4 Vitreus, 4 Praecantatio, 4 Desiderium%nGarnet - 4 §lStellae§r, 4 Vitreus, 4 §lPraemunio§r, 4 Desiderium%nScorned bricks - 10 §lDiabolus§r, 10 Praecantatio, 10 §lTenebrae§r, 10 §lIgnis§r%nDropper - 10 §lPermutatio§r, 26 Terra, 5 §lVacuos§r, 7 Potentia, 5 Machina%nCrafting Table - 12 §lInstrumentum§r, 20 §lFabrico§r, 12 Terra%nBook and Quill - 18 Herba, 3 Sensus, 11 §lAqua§r, 3 §lBestia§r, 3 §lVolatus§r, 3 §lCognitio§r, 10 §lAer§r%nPereskia - 5 Herba, 10 §lAuram§r, 2 Praecantatio, 2 Ordo%nEnergetic Alloy - 5 §lSol§r, 10 §lLux§r, 10 §lMetallum§r, 5 Sensus, 10 Potentia, 10 Desiderium%nNether Wart - 1 Herba, 2 §lVitium§r, 3 §lAlkimia§r%n%n(The §lbold§r aspects are unique to that item.)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.93.title: Matrix Algebra
divine_journey_2.quest.db.93.desc: Craft a batch of Matrix Multiplication Units! This item is only used for the Thaumcraft Runic Matrix, so after exploring Skythern, you can build up to 8 of these multiblocks if necessary - since making more Runic Matrices definitely makes automation easier.%n%n%nInterestingly, there is some fine print on the Matrix Multiplication Unit and it says the following:%n%n"By subtracting a lambda variable from the main diagonal of a square matrix, and solving the equation of its determinant being equal to zero, you can find the eigenvalues of the given matrix. Each eigenvalue corresponds to an eigenvector, except if their algebraic multiplicity is greater than 1, in which case a whole eigensubspace. These can be calculated by substituting the obtained lambdas back into the matrix (before the determinant step), and finding the solution for the obtained low-rank linear system of equations. The solution of this will yield the eigensubspace. In the case of all eigensubspaces being one-dimensional (which statistically occurs with probability 1), we can order these eigenvectors into a square matrix as column vectors, denoted by C. And by forming the diagonal matrix of the corresponding eigenvectors, we obtain matrix U. Then surprisingly, the original matrix will be equal to the matrix product of C*U*C^(-1), called the eigendecomposition. This is useful for calculating a large power of the original matrix, since the k'th power of it will be equal to C*U^k*C^(-1), and calculating U^k is done by raising each term in the main diagonal to the k'th power. This can not only be used to estimate the value of matrix polynomials, but used to more easily find the limiting behavior of Markov-Chains, or find certain moments of a multivariate distribution more easily and make statistical predictions..."%n%nThe text continues, but the font size is getting smaller and smaller, and no more details can be made out clearly...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.94.title: 成為魔導士的第一步
divine_journey_2.quest.db.94.desc: 用世界鹽右鍵點擊合成拓展模組的終界工作檯取得奧術工作檯.%n%n這個工作檯進行每個合成時會需要額外的資源: 在每個角落多達6種基礎的水晶碎片和神秘的能量稱為"Vis", 在每個區塊中儲存的能量. 若你在目前的區塊中沒有足夠的Vis能完成合成的配方, 或許你該換個地方.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.95.title: Zwhoosh to the wham!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.95.desc: Craft a Caster's Gauntlet! This handy tool allows you to cast Thaumcraft Spells as well as activate Infusion Rituals.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.96.title: Even Leatherererer
divine_journey_2.quest.db.96.desc: Craft some Magical Leather!%n%n%n%n%n%n%n...Tiered recipes, hurray!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.97.title: Gears, cogs and MAGIC!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.97.desc: Craft a Simple Arcane Mechanism!%n%nIt's simple, it's arcane, and guess what, it's a mechanism. Yup.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.98.title: Brass yourself!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.98.desc: Craft some Alchemical Brass Ingots! This is the most important crafting ingredient in Thaumcraft, so make sure to semi-automate it for now, and fully automate it once you have access to Alchemical Constructs.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.99.title: Smellin' good!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.99.desc: Craft an Arcane Spa and some Purifying Bath Salts! Place the Salts inside and provide the Spa with Water. It will fill up a 5x5 area above it with Purifying Fluid that prevents any Warp effects for half an hour.%n%nAlso craft a Sanitizing Soap, which clears all Temporary Warp and has a chance of removing regular Warp on use.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.100.title: Add more Magic to it!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.100.desc: Craft a Complex Arcane Mechanism for more complex arcane devices that you would like to mechanize arcanely for the device to be mechanized in an even more arcane way than it was previously. Yup.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.101.title: It's makes you smarter! Or does it...?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.101.desc: Craft a Brain in a Jar! By placing this near your Research Table, you can select it and gain more Eldritch knowledge...%n%nBut be wary... It's forbidden knowledge... You might get some "unwanted" effects...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.102.title: I don't remember. But you do!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.102.desc: Craft a Mnemonic Matrix! By placing this on top of the Thaumatorium multiblock, it'll be able to remember up to 3 recipes. This is very useful for automation!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.103.title: An expensive one, to be sure...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.103.desc: Crystallize many of your Alchemical Brass Ingots into Crystallized Sodium Shards. Once you've collected enough, craft a single Sodium Ingot!%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nYou'll need 41 Alchemical Brass Ingots. Good luck!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.104.title: Essentia?! Bwah, I don't need it!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.104.desc: Craft a Void Jar! Any Essentia that enters this Jar gets teleported into a different phase of reality! What, you thought it's just voided? Well, effectively yes, but Conservation of mass would say otherwise...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.105.title: warded.jar
divine_journey_2.quest.db.105.desc: Craft a couple Glass Phials and a Warded Jar! You'll need many of these, so definitely automate them. The Phials allow you to store 10 units of Essentia for easy transport, while the Jars each store 250 units.%n%nYou can break the Jars to pick them up, they won't lose any of their contents.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.106.title: Wouldn't be Thaumcraft without this
divine_journey_2.quest.db.106.desc: Upgrade an Alchemical Brass Ingot into a Thaumium Ingot! Now you're really diving deep into Thaumcraft...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.107.title: Discover and conquer
divine_journey_2.quest.db.107.desc: Craft a Thaumometer in your Arcane Workbench. You'll need to use one of each basic Vis Crystal. Then start scanning ALL the things!%n%nThis handy device lets you see the amount of Vis in a chunk, and lets you observe current Essentia amounts in a Crucible or during Infusion crafting.%n%nJust be wary NOT to use it on an active Crucible, because it'll eat it up.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.108.title: Just a cold stone desk.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.108.desc: Craft a Stone Table! This is simply a crafting ingredient.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.109.title: You're a real Tuber now!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.109.desc: The Essentia Buffer has 8 unique slots for Essentia built into a single Pipe - meaning it's usually capable of pulling Essentia even when normal Tubes wouldn't.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.110.title: Pipes? Check! Routing options? We still need more...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.110.desc: Craft all 4 types of Pipes listed here.%n%n- Essentia Valves can be turned on and off by hand or with a Redstone signal.%n- Restricted Tubes halve the suction passing through them.%n- Directional Tubes only accept suction from one side.%n- Filtered Tubes can be marked by Labels to filter for one type of Essentia.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.111.title: 魔導末到墨豆手冊
divine_journey_2.quest.db.111.desc: 手持世界鹽右鍵書櫃取得你自己的魔導手冊!%n%n你會需要跟隨這本書, 發掘每一個秘術時代模組的配方. 有些挑戰會要求你獲得或合成物品, 有些會消耗物品! 切記頻繁的察看所有左側的標籤(和右邊的大頁面), 來確認是否有任何新的研究已解鎖.%n要注意有些BQ的任務在你完成研究前會先解鎖.%n%n§c多人遊戲資訊:§r 這個模組包有知識共享模組. 這能讓你共享研究給你的朋友. 要共享研究, 兩個玩家都須拿著魔導手冊, 要分享的玩家必須對著接受的玩家Shift+右鍵. %n注意這只會共享研究, 不會共享其他內容 - 意思是所有的玩家都必需使用魔導透鏡掃描像是血腥教徒之類的實體. 也因為這樣, 每個玩家都必須有自己的魔導手冊.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.112.title: Resolve-nator
divine_journey_2.quest.db.112.desc: Craft an Essentia Resonator! This tool allows you to see where your Essentia is flowing to inside of your Thaumcraft pipe networks. Each pipe can only hold and create suction for one type of Essentia, so you might need to create a more complex network. The special types of Essentia Tubes will surely help you with that.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.113.title: Smeltery^2
divine_journey_2.quest.db.113.desc: Upgrade your Essentia Smeltery into the Thaumium variant! This machine has double the speed of the previous tier, and breaks up Essentia with a 90% efficiency instead of 80%.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.114.title: Essentia in, Essentia out
divine_journey_2.quest.db.114.desc: Craft an Essentia Centrifuge! This machine is capable of separating incoming Essentia into its primal elements - making it useful if you can create a more complex type of essentia more easily than a primal one. Though only one of the components will be returned for each input unit of Essentia.%n%nThe output can be pulled out from the top. It's best to use an Essentia Buffer here, as multiple types of Essentia could be output at the same time.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.115.title: SPELLS! MORE SPELLS!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.115.desc: Craft a Blank Advanced Focus! This will allow you to create more complex spells by granting you a higher amount of potential spell complexity.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.116.title: It's a Focus! ... But what does it do?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.116.desc: Craft a Blank Lesser Focus! You can use it to create Thaumcraft Foci with powerful effects in a Focal Manipulator. The GUI is very intuitive, you can just drag spell ingredients until your complexity maxes out. To cast the spells, use your Caster's Gauntlet.%n%nEach cast of a spell consumes a little bit of Vis in the chunk you're in, but don't worry, Vis does slowly regenerate over time.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.117.title: I made... Circles!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.117.desc: Craft all 2 pi radians of a Base Focal Sphere! This is the base crafting ingredient for all Foci!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.118.title: Pipes = Overrated
divine_journey_2.quest.db.118.desc: Finally! A Thaumaturge's dream comes true when they can create Essentia without any messy pipes or the worry of creating Flux...!%n%nSimply place a Filling Essentia Transfuser on the side of your Arcane Alembics, and they'll distribute the Essentia into nearby Jars without the need for any Pipes at all. Wonderful!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.119.title: Give me ALL the Vis!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.119.desc: Craft a Workbench Charger! To do so, find a Magical Forest biome, wear your full set of Thaumaturge Armor, and look for the perfect chunk that can barely craft this with the discount!%n%nOnce crafted, you can place it on top of an Arcane Workbench or a Focal Manipulator to be capable of draining Vis from the 8 surrounding chunks as well. This way you'll have access to recipes that have a way higher Vis cost.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.120.title: Like a button on your shirt
divine_journey_2.quest.db.120.desc: Craft a Vis Resonator! This is purely a crafting ingredient that you'll need a fair amount of.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.121.title: Spells are fun! So fun!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.121.desc: Craft a Focal Manipulator! Placing a Focus inside will let you create a variety of different Thaumcraft spells.%n%nTo start, place a Blank Lesser or Advanced focus in the bottom left slot. Then select a spell category on the left. Some categories (like Projectile) take a modifier (what type of projectile should it be?).%n%nYou can see the current complexity of your spell on the top right - this can't exceed the total capacity shown.%n%nOn the bottom right, you can choose to increase the effectiveness of certain attributes of your spell. This will make the spell stronger, but increase its complexity.%n%nOnce satisfied, the Focal Manipulator will ask for some items. These will be consumed! To finish, click the "Start Crafting" button on the top right. Wait a few seconds and your spell should be applied to your Focus and ready to use!%n%nTo apply the Focus to your Caster's Gauntlet, hold the Gauntlet and press 'C' by default.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.122.title: Academic? Try the Alembic!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.122.desc: Craft some Arcane Alembics and place them on top of your Essentia Smeltery! All the Essentia broken down from items will end up in these. Watch out though, if Essentia is visibly leaking, that'll create a lot of Flux in the Area, which is very dangerous! Always watch the purple meter inside the Essentia Smeltery, don't overflow it.%n%nYou can Right Click an Alembic with a Jar to get the Essentia stored inside or use piping to move it automatically to connected Jars. Watch out though, a single Pipe can only ever transmit 1 type of Essentia. If your input material contains a lot, you might not be able to route all of it. In that case, keep an eye on the system (an Essentia Resonator really helps), and break down the input in very small batches.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.123.title: What's this again? Potentia...? Vitreus?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.123.desc: Craft a Jar Label! Placing this on a Jar will not only let you organize them better, but use it as a filter - only Essentia of a given type will be capable of entering the Jar.%n%nAlso craft a Brass Lid Brace! When placed on a Jar, only Essentia Tubes will be able to access the Jar.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.124.title: Stunning Stones
divine_journey_2.quest.db.124.desc: Craft at least 1 Infusion Cost Stone and 1 Infusion Speed Stone. By placing them below the main legs of the Runic Matrix multiblock, you can either reduce the cost of the crafts or speed them up! Your choice... You can use at most 4 of these, obviously.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.125.title: You held it - now you'll wear it
divine_journey_2.quest.db.125.desc: Craft a pair of Goggles of Revealing! This is a very handy piece of equipment that goes into your helmet slot.%n%nIt lets you see the exact amounts of Essentia in your Crucible or Arcane Infusion crafts, and it's absolutely required, otherwise you can easily miss an obvious ingredient for a craft (especially for Crucible recipes, where Essentia just constantly evaporates).
divine_journey_2.quest.db.126.desc: 合成生命護符!這能裝備在飾品欄中,每一種心之容器能在護符裡面儲存最多10個.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.127.title: New outfit? Fancy!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.127.desc: Craft a set of Thaumaturge Armor! Using this you'll get a fair amount of Vis cost reduction on Arcane Workbench crafts.%n%nBy placing a set of Armor on a BiblioCraft Armor Stand with a Redstone Block below, you can easily swap between the set displayed and the set you're currently wearing. Handy!%n%n(To obtain Crystallized Alumina for Alumentum, combine Crystallized Aluminum and Oxygen Shards, and combine them into Crystallized Alumina.)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.128.title: Have you lost your mind (yet)?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.128.desc: Craft a Sanity Checker! By holding this item, a bar showing your current warp level will appear on the top left. Try to keep this... as low as possible. Especially the darkest purple bar on the bottom - that's Permanent Warp that cannot be gotten rid of.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.129.title: Loot!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.129.desc: Obtain the following loot by slaying certain mobs with your Athame:%n%n- Heart from Players, Villagers, Witches, Evokers, Illusioners or Vindicators. (Witches are probably your best choice.)%n- Dimensional Sand from Endermen or Endermites.%n- Spectral Dust from any Undead mob like Skeletons or Zombies.%n%nHooves can be obtained from Pigs, Sheep, Cows, Horses, Zombie Pigman, Mooshrooms, Llamas, Donkeys or Mules, even without using an Athame.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.130.title: Arthana 2.0
divine_journey_2.quest.db.130.desc: Craft an Athame! Killing various mobs with this might make them drop some special loot! (See: next quest.)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.131.title: Hot from inside out
divine_journey_2.quest.db.131.desc: Brew up some Fiery Unguent and automate it as best as you can!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.132.title: Hello, fellow Tallow!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.132.desc: Craft some Tallow!%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nIt's Swellow's pre-evolution... or is it?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.133.title: It's like a sieve... but for liquids!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.133.desc: Make a Distillery! Make sure to place it near a Witches' Altar.%n%nTo automate this machine, you'll need to insert the ingredients from the top, Blaze Powder from the sides, and pull out the results from the bottom.%n%nHowever, you might come across some difficulties:%n%n- Items might end up in the wrong slots, for example 2 stacks of the same item get sent into the Distillery, instead of 2 stacks of unique ingredients.%n%n- Some recipes take fewer than 6 inputs, and the 6th slot also gets filled up - stopping the crafting process.%n%n- Some recipes take multiple stacks of the same item, and when they enter the machine, they don't spread out correctly.%n%nBut there is a fix for all of these!%n%nIntroducing (or more like revisiting a Chapter you've completed a long time ago): THE IMPULSE HOPPER! Simply set up a filter in the middle row, and the Impulse Hopper will only let a set of items through if all of the ones in the Filter have arrived.%n%nThis still poses an issue for crafts that take multiple of the same ingredients. The solution is rather simple though: Set the filters to be 64 of each item, and only let them through once multiple stacks have arrived. They are surely going to go in the correct spot!%n%nIf you're still having trouble because your input slots are filling up, use an Integrated Dynamics Block Reader on the Distillery or a buffer chest that checks if the target block is empty, and if so, emits a redstone signal to the Impulse Hopper (in Redstone Mode: Active with signal) which will let some items through.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.134.title: Oilin' up those Tiers and Tierin' up those Oils
divine_journey_2.quest.db.134.desc: Craft some Heaven Extract and Otherworldly Tears. One tastes like mashed potatoes except instead of potatoes it's more like clouds, and the other one tastes like scorched Ender Dragon wings. None of them are my favorite though.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.135.title: Sun is down, freezin' cold
divine_journey_2.quest.db.135.desc: Woo, made this here with all the ice on in the booth,%nAll the gating in the pack can't stop me that's the truth,%nYeah, jump on into Bewitchment it's like I'm a sleuth,%nThis is way too big, when we end this give me the loot!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.136.title: It never melts!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.136.desc: Throw some Splash Iceworld Potions on a field of Stone, Granite or Diorite to convert it to Perpetual Ice! The Potion has a large spread range, it even goes underground a bit.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.137.title: Tough Purified Paste
divine_journey_2.quest.db.137.desc: It's time to perform your first Circle Rite.%n%nMake some Tough Purified Paste! You'll need to Right Click the ingredients on the Golden Rune in the center, then Right Click with an empty hand. If your Circle layout is correct and you have sufficient Altar Power, you'll be able to perform it.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.138.title: Rich Witch
divine_journey_2.quest.db.138.desc: And here is the Golden Chalk I promised in the previous quest!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.139.title: Going deeper... into insanity
divine_journey_2.quest.db.139.desc: Brew up some of the nothingness, vacuum, manifestation of the realization of our mortal lives being insignificant in the vastness of the universe, the Brew of the Void!%n%n...%n%nUuhhhh, ...nyeheheh, it's great to be a Witch...?%n%n...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.140.title: Now THAT's witchy...!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.140.desc: Brew up a Bottle of Blood from Adder's Forks or Tongues of the Dog! Nyeeehehehehehehehheeeee....!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.141.title: Speed Potions would be jealous*
divine_journey_2.quest.db.141.desc: * Doesn't actually give you Speed.%n* Not for human consumption.%n* Consult a doctor if you've accidentally inhaled or touched it... or worse.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.142.title: Shine a light on it!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.142.desc: Craft either a Silver or Iron Candelabra! Placing this on top of your Altar will boost its Altar Power.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.143.title: 耶! 又是個新的祭壇!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.143.desc: 製作相同的 6 個任一種的女巫的祭壇! 將他們以2x3的方式放置, 並在上面放上 1 張任一種顏色的地毯來構成這個多方塊結構。%n%n這個結構將會提供能量來使你巫術(Bewitchment)的所有設備都能正常的運作。女巫釜鍋, 蒸餾塔, 紡車, 火盆和圓環儀式若沒有在周圍 16 格半徑的範圍內取得足夠的祭壇能量, 將沒有辦法正常運行。%n%n如果你想要充填祭壇所儲存的能量, 你必須用一些野生植物, 來讓附近的區域變得豐富多彩一點! 樹木, 作物, 小草, 鮮花, 菌類, 還有你想的到的任何東西。並且植物的多樣性能幫更大的忙! 兩種不同的作物所充填的能量會比起兩個一樣的作物來的更多。%n%n如果你想要充填比這更多的能量, 你也可以選擇在祭壇的 6 格範圍上放置下列物品(以下物品按照充填效力由小到大排序):%n%n- 容器: 花盆/玻璃瓶, 高腳杯, 飛天軟膏, 或盛滿的高腳杯 %n%n- 原生的劍或儀式刀(最佳的組合是鑽石劍和儀式刀)%n%n- 法杖或發光物: 火把/紅石火把, 蠟燭, 烈焰桿, 燭台, 終界燭, 倫納德之杖, 雙蛇杖。%n%n- 儀式相關: 頭顱/骷髏頭顱, 紅石/地獄石英/青金石/蛋白石(Opal), 凋零骷髏頭顱, 紫水晶(Amethyst)/鑽石/綠寶石/石榴石(Garnet)/海磷碎片, 魔導書(Grimoire Magia), 任何雕像, 五芒星(Pentacle), 惡魔心臟(Demon Heart), 龍首。 %n%n你可以在巫術(Bewitchment)的Wiki頁面上找到更多資訊:%nhttps://bewitchment.fandom.com/wiki/Witches%27_Altar
divine_journey_2.quest.db.144.title: Can't capture - can summon!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.144.desc: Use the Distillery recipe to obtain a Villager Egg.%n%nSummoning any Demon requires a sacrifice of a Player or a Villager, and this is the best way to have them 'ready'. Yikes!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.145.title: Ouch! Hot hot hot hot hot!!!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.145.desc: Craft a Fiery Chalk!%n%nOven mitts recommended.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.146.title: Slaying the Master
divine_journey_2.quest.db.146.desc: Read the Codex Infernalis / Higher Demons / Master Leonard section to summon the Lord, the Master, the One who's behind all of this.%n%nReluctantly, but challenge him to a fight. In order to progress, there is only one way that fight should end...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.147.title: The final dish
divine_journey_2.quest.db.147.desc: Craft a Stew of the Grotesque!%n%n...Buuut I'd recommend NOT eating it.%n%nYou'll need it for the next quest in un-eaten form, and it might not be too beneficial for your health anyway.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.148.title: HWHWEEL
divine_journey_2.quest.db.148.desc: Craft a Bewitchment Spinning Hwheel.%n%nWhat did you say...?%n%nUhh, to craft a Bewitchment Spinning Hwheel?%n%nSpinning Hwheel?%n%nSpinning Hwheel, yeah.%n%nYou mean Spinning Wheel.%n%nYeah, Spinning Hwheel.%n%nSpinning Wheel.%n%nSpinning Hwheel.%n%nSpinning Wheel.%n%nSpinning Hwheel.%n%nYou're saying it weird, why are you putting so much emphasis on the 'H'?%n%nWhat are you talking about, just saying it: 'Spinning Hwheel'. Craft a Spinning Hwheel. That's how you progress.%n%nSay 'wheel'.%n%nWheel.%n%nNow say 'Spinning Wheel'.%n%nSpinning Hwheel.%n%nSpinning Wheel.%n%nSpinning Hwheel.%n%nSPINNING WHEEL. D:<%n%nSpinning Hwheel.%n%nFINE. WHATEVER. YOU WIN. By the way, you need altar power for it... Now go.%n%nAltar Wpower.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.149.title: A strong scent
divine_journey_2.quest.db.150.title: Purity
divine_journey_2.quest.db.150.desc: Craft a Sigil of Purity. It burns like pure fire in your hands, reflecting your inner soul... I'm sure it's nothing to worry about!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.151.title: It's not a table you preach from..
divine_journey_2.quest.db.151.desc: Craft a Sigil Table! With this, you can (unsurprisingly) create ... Sigils! (Who would have thought.)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.152.title: Anti-Ghostbusters
divine_journey_2.quest.db.152.desc: Perform the Spiritual Rift Rite at night! You can find it under the Circle Rites section of your Book of Shadows.%n%nSometimes (not always) Ghosts will end up spawning. Defeat them to obtain some Shards of the Grotesque!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.153.title: A type of Heavy Metal
divine_journey_2.quest.db.153.desc: Okay, this quest is tough.%n%nI'll accept it.%n%nBut try to fully automate Poppets, and eventually Death Protection Poppets.%n%nGood luck!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.154.title: Power of the Underworld
divine_journey_2.quest.db.154.desc: Distill some Demon Heart combined with some of your previous Oils, and add a pinch of Pride... for an interesting result.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.155.title: Slightly less Essential
divine_journey_2.quest.db.155.desc: Create the listed Essential Oils using your Witches' Oven! These ones aren't as frequently used as the ones in the "These are Essential!" quest, you only need to batch craft a few.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.156.title: Chock full of Chalk
divine_journey_2.quest.db.156.desc: Craft a piece of Ritual Chalk!%n%nYou can draw Bewitchment Circles with this tool. All Circles have to have a Golden Rune drawn in the center.%n%nThere are 3 layers of Circles you can draw:%n%n            ███████%n         █                 █%n      █      █████      █%n   █      █             █      █%n█      █      ███      █     ⠀█%n█   █      █        █      █   █%n█   █   █             █    █   █%n█   █   █      §6█⠀§r    █    █   █%n█   █   █             █    █   █%n█   █      █        █      █   █%n█      █      ███      █     ⠀█%n   █      █             █      █%n      █      █████      █%n         █                 █%n            ███████%n%nThe white squares represent White Chalk - but some Rites later will require Red or Purple Chalk to be used for one or more of the circles.%n%nIf you want to conserve Chalk, you can recolor your existing Circles with the Rite shown in your Book of Shadows / Rituals / Circle Drawing.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.157.title: Stitch, Thread and File
divine_journey_2.quest.db.157.desc: Weave up some woven, and wave when you're done.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.158.title: -273 °C
divine_journey_2.quest.db.158.desc: Freeze some Thaumium for Cold Iron. Don't worry, Frostfire never goes out, and you can even pick it back up!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.159.title: Never gonna die anymore!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.159.desc: Craft a Death Protection Poppet. When bound to yourself with your own Taglock and held in your inventory or on a Poppet Shelf, it'll prevent a lethal blow by reincarnating you instantly using its own woven body.%n%nIf that's not witchy enough for you, then I don't know what is.%n%nYou will need to automate these using the second Poppet recipe... eventually.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.160.title: Itching for more Witching
divine_journey_2.quest.db.160.desc: Craft a Witches' Cauldron! Nyaaaahahahahahahahaaaaaa!%n%nThis machine functions very similarly to the Thaumcraft Crucible. You need to light a fire beneath it, fill it up with some Water, then throw in the required ingredients shown in JEI. However there are some key differences:%n%n- You need Altar power for each recipe. A Cauldron more than 16 blocks away from an Altar won't function.%n%n- You can't directly pipe Water into it. Instead, to automate it, you'll have to use a Mechanical User with a Water bucket inside. You can detect whether or not the Cauldron is empty with an Integrated Dynamics Block Reader, and have the Mechanical User in 'Redstone On' mode to fill the Cauldron exactly when it's empty.%n%n- You can also brew Bewitchment Potions in the Witches' Cauldron. Simply start with a piece of Mandrake Root, add an additional ingredient (listed in JEI), and either Redstone or Glowstone, and optionally Gunpowder for the splash effect. Once done, Right Clicking with Empty Bottles will create the desired Potion.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.161.title: Magical Chalk!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.161.desc: Craft some Phasing Chalk, and hold it strongly, otherwise it may slip out and phase away into another reality.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.162.title: These are Essential!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.162.desc: Create the listed types of Essentia Oils with your Witches' Oven! All of these will be heavily used later, so make sure to constantly produce them!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.163.title: A Witch's necessary machine
divine_journey_2.quest.db.163.desc: Craft a Witches' Oven! Supply it with Empty Jars to get a chance to obtain the various Essential Oils from Bewitchment!%n%n%nTo automate the machine, insert Coal, Empty Jars and the required input ingredient from the top and the sides, and extract the results from the bottom.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.164.title: Ground Dragon
divine_journey_2.quest.db.164.desc: Perform one of the most difficult Cauldron recipes to create some Dragon Resin. Fortunately you'll only need to do this once. Good luck!%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nIs this how you get a Ground Dragon? Like, a Garchomp?! No. No it isn't. (That's it for the Pokemon references.)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.165.title: Stronger Stringer
divine_journey_2.quest.db.165.desc: If the input Spirit is strong, the output String will be strong too, they say...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.166.title: Helium would be jealous...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.166.desc: It magically floats. Wingardium Leviosa or somethin'?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.167.title: 危險! 易爆物!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.167.desc: 進入死亡之塔(Mortum Tower)開始冒險! 向上攀爬並攻克塔的每一層, 並在最後擊倒莫克文(Vamacheron)來攀爬到最高的樓層。%n%n獲取一些神祕的洩漏之魂(Mysterious Leaking Soul)! 你會需要 2 個這個物品來完成這個任務, 但是最終你將會需要 5 個來鑽研到巫術(Bewitchment)的更深的領域!%n%n啊差點忘了... 歡迎你加入巫術這個大家族。
divine_journey_2.quest.db.168.title: Wake
divine_journey_2.quest.db.168.desc: Craft 4 Awakened Cores!%n%n%n...Getting fancy here, don't we?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.169.title: This is Hella Borin'!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.169.desc: Well hopefully the title doesn't match your current feelings - you're closer than ever to lategame!%n%nCraft a Hellebore Seed and plant it to get more!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.170.title: These little buggers...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.170.desc: ...is what you would say, if we were in 1.7.10! Buuuut, since then, Mandrakes have been cultivated and they no longer attack the player when harvested... Which is for the better.%n%nCraft a Mandrake Seed and plant it to collect more!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.171.title: Pulling the Strings
divine_journey_2.quest.db.171.desc: Craft a Poppet! This definitely isn't a toy that wicked Witches abuse in any way... Nonononono... Of course not.%n%nFor now, only the first recipe is available, but it's not automatable. Once you have access to Alchemistry and ProjectE, you'll be able to use the second recipe.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.172.desc: Open your Codex Infernalis and read the Higher Demons / Lord Baphomet section on how to summon this creature of nightmares, God of the Underworld.%n%nBeat him.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.173.title: Dwelled deep enough...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.173.desc: A new book, containing more demonic knowledge is now available to you... the Codex Infernalis!%n%nLook up the Lesser Demons / Demon and Demones category on how to summon them. They'll require 3 entirely red circles and a sacrifice of a Player or a Villager.%n%nOnce summoned, fight them to obtain their Heart!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.174.title: Demons! Rise!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.174.desc: Craft a Pentacle.%n%n%n... I don't like where this is going.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.175.title: Pulling the Strings...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.175.desc: Craft some Diabolical Vein..%n%nAnd realize, you've already gone down on a devilish path... But there is no more turning back...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.176.title: Baby Ender Dragons' natural habitat
divine_journey_2.quest.db.176.desc: Craft your first Dragon's Blood Sapling, then grow it to get more!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.177.title: It's like taking a shower in heaven
divine_journey_2.quest.db.178.title: Yummie! Flames!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.178.desc: Craft a Flame Devourer Pendant. When the user's inflicted with the Hell Fire status effect, Right Clicking this item will yield a piece of Ignition.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.179.title: Oyeel
divine_journey_2.quest.db.179.desc: Craft some Oil of Vitriol.%n%nThere is nothing more to say.%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n...%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nWhat?%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n...%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nI said there is nothing more!%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n...%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nThere is definitely not a meme or a reference down here, stop looking!%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n...%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n...%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nFINE...%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nSon: "Dad, why is my sister called 'Peace'?"%nDad: "Well, son, your mom thought there was not enough peace in the world...!"%nSon: "Ah, that's interesting. Thanks, Dad!"%nDad: "No problem, Oil."%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n...%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nI told you not to look, it was bad anyway. :I
divine_journey_2.quest.db.180.title: Gypsum
divine_journey_2.quest.db.180.desc: Even though Gypsum is missing from 1.12 Bewitchment, it makes a return in the form of a custom item! Hurray!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.181.title: SWIRL
divine_journey_2.quest.db.181.desc: We rise%n%nWe rise%nWe fall%n%nWe rise%n%nWe rise%nWe fall%n%nWe rise%n%nWe rise%nWe fall%n%nWe rise%n%nWe rise%nWe fall%n%n%nWE RISE%n%nSWIRL%n%n(Swirl... of Depths.)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.182.title: Don't get too Salty
divine_journey_2.quest.db.182.desc: Craft some Ritualistic Salt!%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nI heard sprinkling this on some undead on Thriller Bark will release their captured shadows... Or wait, that's not in this game...!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.183.title: Mmmm, marvelous!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.183.desc: Wanna be fancy and drink from a Goblet? Now is your chance! Not only will your wine taste better, but this will also give you an exquisite amount of Altar Power! Nice.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.184.title: Brrrrrrrrr... Icy!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.184.desc: Use your Witches' Cauldron to create an Iceworld II Splash Potion. You'll need to throw in the following ingredients in order:%n%n- Mandrake Root%n- Ice OR Snow block%n- Glowstone Dust%n- Gunpowder%n%nThen Right Click on the Cauldron three times with an Empty Bottle to get 3 of them!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.185.title: There is only one way out...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.185.desc: All this dark magic has messed with your brain... The only way out... The only way to end this... Is to go away with it... Go into the hellish Underworld by sacrificing yourself to a Curse... The Curse of Conflagration will be perfect...%n%nHow? Well, it's quite simple actually:%n%nFill a Taglock with your own juices by Shift+Right Clicking on a Bed you've slept in. (Don't try to think about it more than that.)%n%nHaving this, inflict yourself with the Curse of Conflagration using your Brazier. The ingredients can be found in your Codex Infernalis, under Curses / Conflagration.%n%nOnce under the Hell Fire status effect, use your Flame Devourer Pendant to obtain some Ignition!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.186.title: Curse them!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.186.desc: Craft a Brazier!%n%nTo use it, look up the Curses section in your Codex Infernalis. Place the input items on top, and light it with a Flint and Steel. The Curse will be cast on the player whose Taglock you've used.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.187.title: Oilin' up
divine_journey_2.quest.db.187.desc: Create some Liquid Witchcraft and a Droplet of Wisdom! Mmmm... smells good! Smells a bit... witchy and knowledgy...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.188.title: Make it bleed!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.188.desc: Craft a Boline and use it on the logs of a Dragons Blood Tree. It will eventually bleed Dragon's Blood Resin. Collect it using an Absorption Hopper!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.189.title: MOAR SEEDZ!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.189.desc: Use more Mysterious Leaking Souls to craft Aconitum, Belladonna and Wormwood Seeds.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.190.title: No Goblet without a Drink
divine_journey_2.quest.db.190.desc: Fill it up! In what other way did you plan to drink from it, huh?%n%nBesides the superb taste, it'll also serve you as the best "Cup" type item for Altar Power. Magnificent!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.191.title: Wow, such Essentia Storage
divine_journey_2.quest.db.191.desc: Craft a 16k ME Essentia Storage Component.%n%nWhen upgraded to a Cell, it stores 128,000 units Essentia. Wow!%n%nHonestly that's more than you'll ever need, buuuuut, you can't stop before the finish line, can you?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.192.title: Storing your Essentia even more
divine_journey_2.quest.db.192.desc: Craft a 4k ME Essentia Storage Component! Just like regular Storage Components, when upgraded to a Storage Cell, these are capable of storing Essentia (instead of items).%n%nThis one stores 32,000 units of Essentia (8 times the size of the Cell).
divine_journey_2.quest.db.193.title: Conduct it all the way!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.193.desc: Use a FULLY CHARGED Impetus Conductor with an Impetus Crystal to craft Conducted Impetus. WARNING: Do NOT autocraft this. AE2 could eat up your inputs, if the given Impetus Conductor isn't fully charged*.%n%nTo charge your Impetus Conductor, insert it into your Void Recharge Pedestal. Make sure it has an incoming beam of Impetus.%n%n%n%n-------------------------------%n%n* This is because the charge value is (untraditionally) stored in the Forge Cap NBT of the item, not the regular NBT.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.194.title: Using Impetus
divine_journey_2.quest.db.194.desc: Craft a Void Recharge Pedestal and connect a beam of Impetus to it. This machine charges any items that accept Impetus, such as an Impetus Conductor.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.195.title: Store your Essentia
divine_journey_2.quest.db.195.desc: Craft a 1k ME Essentia Storage Component. When upgraded to a Storage Cell, this is capable of storing 8000 units of Essentia. (8 times the size of the cell). That's 32 times the amount a single Jar can store, so these Components are VERY powerful.%n%nSimply place it in regular Drives, and use Essentia Import and Export Buses to distribute the Essentia between the outside world and your system. Just like you would with items!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.196.title: Homemade, Eldritch flavour
divine_journey_2.quest.db.196.desc: Upgrade a quarter stack of Void Stones to Eldritch Stones!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.197.title: Workbench Charger - for your Terminal
divine_journey_2.quest.db.197.desc: Craft an Arcane Charging Upgrade. Placing this in the slot on the right inside the Arcane Crafting Terminal's GUI will act as a Workbench Charger - the Terminal will be able to draw Vis from all 8 adjacent Chunks too!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.198.title: Digital Arcane Crafting
divine_journey_2.quest.db.198.desc: Craft an Arcane Crafting Terminal! Attaching this to your ME Network will let you pull items from your system for Arcane Crafts.%n%nUnfortunately we haven't been able to figure out a way to keep the 6 Vis Crystals refilled, so you'll still have to do that manually. Simply place them in the slots on the right.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.199.title: Roar! More Core for sure!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.199.desc: Craft a Diffusion Core and a Coalescence Core to get into Thaumic Energistics!%n%nTo unlock the Thaumic Energistics tab in your Thaumonomicon, simply scan any Applied Energistics item or block.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.200.title: Void Rift? Pwah, it's mine!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.200.desc: Craft an Impetus Drainer! Placing this close to a Void Rift will start draining it. You can disable/enable this functionality with a Redstone signal.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.201.title: Break it apart!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.201.desc: Once you've defeated the Eldritch, break apart their tower, and loot the items listed on the right!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.202.title: The Core of Impetus
divine_journey_2.quest.db.202.desc: Craft an Impetus Jewel! This is the base crafting ingredient for all machines that interact with the energy gained from Void Rifts - also known as "Impetus".
divine_journey_2.quest.db.203.title: Defeating the Eldritch
divine_journey_2.quest.db.203.desc: Find an Eldritch Spire structure in the Emptiness and raid it!%n%nYou'll need to find 4 key pieces hidden throughout the dungeon and ascend the main tower to progress!%n%nDefeat the final boss and gain access to the Eldritch Revelation!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.204.title: The Ultimate Essentia Storage
divine_journey_2.quest.db.204.desc: Craft a 64k ME Essentia Storage Component!%n%nWhen upgraded to a Cell, it can store 512,000 units of Essentia. (That's 2048 times the amount a single Jar can store. Wow!)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.205.title: Preparing for Halloween?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.206.title: Ritual of the Arcane
divine_journey_2.quest.db.206.desc: Craft 16 Arcanium Bases. You can only craft this while in the overworld and standing inside a concentric square of biomes of this shape (these are simply representing blocks, not chunks):%n%n%n§5███████%n█§c█████§5█%n█§c█§a███§c§█§c█§5█%n█§c█§a█§b█§a█§c█§5█%n█§c█§a███§c█§5█%n█§c█████§5█%n███████§r%n%nWith%n%n§5█§r = Mortum biome%n§c█§r = Hell (Nether) biome%n§a█§r = Magical Forest biome%n§b█§r = Ocean biome%n%n%nTo set this up, you need to use an Arcane Terraformer on top of where the Ocean biome is, with the following steps:%n%n1. Transform a Square area with Range = 4 into a Mortum biome.%n2. Transform a Square area with Range = 3 into a Hell biome.%n3. Transform a Square area with Range = 2 into a Magical Forest biome.%n4. Transform a Square area with Range = 1 into an Ocean biome.%n%nIf you're unsure if you've transformed the area correctly, you can craft a Ritualistic Biome Checker. by standing in the middle (right on top on the Arcane Terraformer) and Right Clicking the item, it'll tell you how many blocks you have correctly transformed into the required biome.%n%nYOU DON'T HAVE TO BE PERFECT THOUGH! There is some leeway. The recipe will still work if you only transformed:%n%n- 22 of the 24 Mortum biome blocks,%n- 15 of the 16 Hell biome blocks,%n- 7 of the 8 Magical Forest biome blocks.%n%nYou can only do this MANUALLY, and only your Player needs to stand in the central Ocean biome block, the Crafting Table can be further away (as long as you can still reach it).%n%nNote: There is sometimes a bug where the biome layout is entirely correct, and item can still be crafted, even though the crafting output is empty. Then you'll need to click the empty output slot to get the item. This is due to the recipe detecting Player location, not the Crafting Table's location.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.207.title: Shaping the world
divine_journey_2.quest.db.207.desc: Craft an Arcane Terraformer and 4 regular Biome Foci in an Arcane Workbench, then use each one in the 4 biomes listed to the right: Ocean, Magical Forest, Hell (Nether) & Mortum.%n%nWARNING: If you Shift+Right Click a Biome Focus, it will get cleared and turn it back into a regular version.%n%nThe Arcane Terraformer can take any of these Foci and turn a circular or square area around it into the wanted biome.%n%nFor this, it'll require 3 key ingredients:%n- Vis, drawn from the air.%n- Essentia, drawn from the 5 input hatches located on the sides and on the bottom. These are specifically for Terra, Aer, Ignis, Aqua and Permutatio, with Permutatio being drawn from the bottom. The rest should be routed into their respective colored input plug using Essentia Tubes or ME Essentia Export Buses.%n- Impetus, drawn from an Impetus Relay, Impetus Matrix or Impetus Drainer - routed by an Impetus Resonator.%n%nThese materials will only be used while the machine is active. To activate it, select the desired area in the GUI, then Right Click it with your Gauntlet.%n%n§6Note:§r Thaumic Augmentation (unconventionally) stores a lot of its NBT data in the Forge Cap NBT. Because of this, this quest has been changed to NBT-independent detection, which means that any Biome Focus is accepted. You'll still need the ones listed for the next quest, however.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.208.title: Don't (A)-Void these
divine_journey_2.quest.db.208.desc: Using your Void Seeds and materials from Bewitchment, craft some Cold Void Seeds, Cold Void Metal Ingots, and finally, Void Metal Ingots.%n%nWhat a process!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.209.title: If you haven't messed up yet, now is the time!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.209.desc: Pump a lot of Flux into a chunk! This can be best done by setting up a Crucible, filling it to the brim with items that have a high Essentia amount, then breaking or Shift+Right Clicking on the Cauldron.%n%nWARNING: Do NOT do this inside your base. Nearby is fine - although you'll need to keep an eye on the Void Rift spawned this way, not to cause Taint to spawn.%n%nUse a Causality Collapser on the Void Rift! This closes the Rift and drops a fair number of Void Seeds. You'll need a good amount of them, so repeat this process a couple of times.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.210.title: Causing Collapses
divine_journey_2.quest.db.210.desc: Craft a couple Causality Collapsers! Depending on your luck, you may need more than the 5 needed to complete the quest.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.211.title: November 27, 1784: Proposed. Today: Developed.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.212.title: It isn't so Empty after all...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.212.desc: Mine up a stack of the base Stone of the Emptiness: Void Stones!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.213.title: Enter the Emptiness
divine_journey_2.quest.db.213.desc: Discover a tear in the fabric of spacetime, and activate it with your newly acquired Gauntlet that has an Impetus Conductor attached!%n%nThen enter the Emptiness...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.214.title: Outer Essentia Storage
divine_journey_2.quest.db.214.desc: Sometimes you want to store the Essentia outside of your Storage Cells (for a subnet, for a simple setup that doesn't need as much Essentia, etc.), and these components can come useful.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.215.title: Getting the Essentia in & out
divine_journey_2.quest.db.215.desc: Craft an ME Essentia Import Bus & Export Bus.%n%nThey can import / export Essentia from Jars into your Essentia storage system. They can also accept all types of Cards that regular Import and Export Buses can.%n%nTo filter them, use Phials of Essentia.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.216.title: A Stepping Stone
divine_journey_2.quest.db.216.desc: Loot or craft some Ancient Pedestals! Using Ancient Stones instead of Arcane Stones, and Ancient Pedestals instead of Arcane Pedestals, you can upgrade your Infusion Altar.%n%nThis new Infusion Altar comes with decreased Essentia costs and increased stability.%n%nOnce it's formed, the center pedestal does not need to remain an Ancient Pedestal.%n%nYou can also place down Ancient Pedestals instead of Arcane Pedestals around the Infusion Altar, reducing Essentia Costs and increasing speed slightly at the cost of increased Instability. You do not need Ancient Pedestals for an Ancient Infusion Altar to function, any Pedestal will work.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.217.title: Auto Infusion Matrix
divine_journey_2.quest.db.217.desc: Craft all the required items on the right for an Auto Infusion Matrix multiblock!%n%nCheck the figure in JEI and set up the machine. Make sure to place the Blueprint inside the Machine Controller.%n%nWATCH OUT: You should set it up in a single chunk, and make sure it's more than 16 blocks away from any Thaumcraft Filling Essentia Transfusers you're not planning to use for this machine!%n%nTHE SETUP: There are 41 individual Essentia Input Hatches on the machine, since there are 41 types of Essentia. Each one should be whitelisted to only accept 1 unique type of Essentia. To do this, place a total of 41 Essentia Export Buses (or Storage Buses with a higher priority than your Drives) on each individual Essentia Input Hatch.%n%nBE CAREFUL: Empty Essentia Input Hatches can steal Essentia from each other, so try to fill them up quickly. Breaking and replacing an Essentia Input Hatch will delete its contents and NOT create any Flux in the process - so feel free to do so. Other than that, these Input Hatches basically act like Jars, having a max capacity of 250 units of Essentia, and being able to accept from anything and output to anything that normal Jars can.%n%nFIRSTLY: Of course, you'll need a sufficient supply of ALL 41 types of Essentia before you can use this machine effectively. Setup a large automation facility to convert basic materials into Essentia (like Stone into Terra, Redstone into Potentia, etc.).%n%nBUT WHAT ABOUT THE FLUX? Spread out your facility over multiple chunks and use many Flux Condensers to get rid of the Flux. More optimally, let a Flux Rift build, and stabilize it using Stability Field Generators. These are rewarded, although you may need to craft more. Once the Rift is stabilized, you can generate as much Flux in the Chunk as you want, about 32,000 is the limit. Have at it!%n%nBE AWARE that if the Thaumonomicon requires you to craft something in the Infusion Altar, using this machine WON'T COUNT.
