divine_journey_2.quest.db.404.desc: Insert the Key into the Tier 1 Dungeon Reward located behind the boss room. This might contain one of two Schematics: The Moon Buggy or the Tier 2 Rocket Schematic. You're looking for the latter, but fortunately even if you were unlucky and got the Moon Buggy Schematic, you can convert it into the one you need by crafting.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.405.title: Tier 1 Rocket parts
divine_journey_2.quest.db.405.desc: Craft a Nose Cone, 4 Rocket Fins and a Tier 1 Rocket Engine. These are the main components for a Tier 1 Rocket.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.406.title: I'm a Fan of Rockets
divine_journey_2.quest.db.406.desc: Craft an Oxygen Fan and upgrade it to an Oxygen Vent. This is a common component used in Galacticraft Rocket and Machine crafting.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.407.title: More expensive than Granny's vases
divine_journey_2.quest.db.407.desc: Craft some Tin and Copper Canisters. These are simple crafting ingredients for some Galacticraft items and machines.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.408.title: Venus materials
divine_journey_2.quest.db.408.desc: Obtain some Solar Ore from underground; some Volcanic Rock from around Lava pool, and near (or underneath) Volcanos; and at least 8 Buckets worth of Sulphuric Acid.%n%nThe easiest way to find Sulphuric Acid is to locate Vapor Spout blocks on ground level - a Sulphuric Acid pool will be right below. Alternatively, use the Roots Light Drifter spell and drift underground to spot them.%n%nIf you're low on Sulphuric Acid, you can duplicate the Liquid with some AbyssalCraft Crystallized Sulfur Clusters in the Liquicrafter.%n%n§6Note:§r Galacticraft doesn't fully support the Forge liquid system, so there are actually two unique Sulphuric Acid Bucket items. Becuase of this, this quest has 2 Tasks for the 2 different Buckets, but you only need to complete one of them.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.409.title: RF to Lightning
divine_journey_2.quest.db.409.desc: Enough with the Lightning strikes!%n%nWith the RF Lightning Generator, you can convert RF directly into LE!%nYou can also increase the speed of your Lightningcraft Infusion Multiblock by x5 compared to the base.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.410.title: Underground Moon Dungeon
divine_journey_2.quest.db.410.desc: Find an Underground Moon Dungeon, enter it, and get to the end. Defeat the Evolved Skeleton Boss to obtain the Tier 1 Dungeon Key.%n%nIf you have a Dungeon Locator, it will point you to the nearest one, likely saving you a significant amount of time searching.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.411.title: Crystal Eyes
divine_journey_2.quest.db.411.desc: Craft some Crystaltine Ingots with your new acquired Plasma Cores!%n%nThey are a pain to craft manually... But wait, the next quest might be able to help you on that.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.412.title: Loading...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.412.desc: Craft a Fuel Loader! When placed on the left side of a Launch Pad, and powered from the left, you can fill a Rocket on top of the Launch Pad.%n%nTo insert fuel, you'll need to use the right side, where the Launch Pad is normally. It's simplest to do this with a Phantomface.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.413.title: Breathing in space
divine_journey_2.quest.db.413.desc: Craft and equip an Oxygen Mask, an Oxygen Gear and a Parachute. These will be vital to survive out in space, and vital to come back and land without dying.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.414.title: Satellite Flooring
divine_journey_2.quest.db.414.desc: Craft 25 Satellite Launch Pads and assemble them into a 5x5 square. When correctly assembled, the middle square should pop up.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.415.title: S-O-L-A-R
divine_journey_2.quest.db.415.desc: Use your Liquicrafter to process the Solar Ores you collected into Empowered Solar Dust and Solar Ingots!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.416.title: Your first Rocket!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.416.desc: Craft a Satellite Rocket! This is what you can use to send a Satellite into space:%n%n1. Place the Satellite Rocket onto the 5x5 Satellite Launch Pad.%n%n2. Place the Fuel Loader on the left of it to load some fuel into it. You'll need to power the Fuel Loader from the left.%n%n3. Right Click the Satellite Rocket and place a Satellite into it.%n%n4. Launch the Satellite Rocket. Your Satellite will be correctly sent into space!%n%n5. Now you can use your Satellite Controller and Communications Dish to connect to the Satellite.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.417.title: This job pays well IRL
divine_journey_2.quest.db.417.desc: Make a NASA Workbench! This is used to build all your Rockets. For now, only the Tier 1 Rocket and the Satellite Rocket are available. To unlock more Schematics, you'll need to find them on the Moon, Mars, or Venus. To do so, scroll to the last page, insert the Schematic and press "Unlock Schematic".%n%n(If you can't click on the buttons on the left because JEI is interfering, you can press Ctrl+O to disable JEI temporarily. Press it again to re-enable it.)%n%nMost Rockets can have an inventory. Simply insert Chests in the top right when building the Rocket to add some.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.418.title: IMA FIRIN' MAH LAZER
divine_journey_2.quest.db.418.desc: Craft all the components for the Laser Focus multiblock listed on the right! You can use larger Input, Output and Energy input Hatches.%n%nThis machine focuses a laser beam at the input item to plasmafy it, charging it with a LOT of power... Good thing Portions of the Sun can transfer such energy, and Hyperglued Meteoric Casing can sustain it...!%n%nYou'll also need Mekanism Laser Energy, inputted near the tip of the Focus. You can easily convert RF into Mekansim Laser Energy using a Mekanism Laser. To charge the Mekanism Laser Acceptor faster, you can use all 4 sides. To make it EVEN faster, you can combine up to 5 Mekanism Laser beams into 1 stronger one using a Laser Amplifier.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.419.title: It makes the Asteroid as strong as possible
divine_journey_2.quest.db.419.desc: Craft a block of Hyperglued Meteoric Casing!%n%nThe central point of this block is very strong and can sustain any sort of pressure...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.420.title: Crafting with Liquids
divine_journey_2.quest.db.420.desc: Obtain the required materials listed on the right, and assemble them into a Liquicrafter Modular Machine multiblock.%n%nYou can use larger Input and Output Hatches, and you can use any kind of Conduit to import liquids and items into the Hatches on the left, and output them from the right.%n%nThis machine can combine liquids and items into other liquids and items, and it'll be used for some recipes from now on.%n%nThe first recipe you'll need it for is Galacticraft Oil, to be able to fuel your Rockets that you want to send to space.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.421.title: Quarrying some Desh, Deshing some Quarry
divine_journey_2.quest.db.421.desc: Obtain some Desh Ore from Mars. I recommend quarrying the place again.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.422.title: To the Asteroid Belt!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.422.desc: After researching the Asteroid Belt, fly there with your Tier 3 Rocket!%n%nPreparations include the same items as before. You won't need a Fluid container this time.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.423.title: To the underground again!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.423.desc: Find an Underground Mars Dungeon, enter it, and get to the end. Defeat the Creeper Boss! You can only do this by reflecting its projectiles back at it, similarly to how you would do to Ghasts in the Nether.%n%nIf you have a Dungeon Locator, it will point you to the nearest one, likely saving you a significant amount of time searching.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.424.title: Underground one final time
divine_journey_2.quest.db.424.desc: Locate the underground Venus Dungeon using your Dungeon Locator! Get to the end and defeat the Spider Queen boss! Use some Shears to cut off some of her special string. Make sure to start from the bottom, otherwise you'll destroy the whole stem and get less string at the end.%n%n%n%n%nYou made sure to bring Shears like I told you riiiiiiiiiiiiiiiight...?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.425.title: Parts of it still orbit the Sun to this day...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.425.desc: Find a special Meteor that's lit up from the top and built of unbreakable blue rocks! Head inside and discover that this is actually a Puzzle Meteor. Solve the 4 puzzles inside to gain 4 Key Fragments and head down to defeat the Asteroid Keeper! It drops 5 Chunks of Meteor that Ended the Era of Dinosaurs!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.426.title: Strong, like Titan
divine_journey_2.quest.db.426.desc: Find some Ilmenite Ore in the Asteroids dimension. It's pretty rare but spawns in large veins inside of asteroids. It's best to use a Digital Miner to locate some. Once you obtaned some, process the Titanium Shards into Titanium Ingots.%n%nIf you use Silk Touch you get Ilmenite Ore directly, which has a more efficient conversion to Titanium Ingots.%n%nThe quest only asks for 10, but you'll need more eventually, so also set up a Quarry here.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.427.title: Beamer presentation
divine_journey_2.quest.db.427.desc: Craft an Energy Beam Reflector and an Energy Beam Receiver to unlock Draconic Evolution Fusion Crafting!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.428.title: Compressor Automation
divine_journey_2.quest.db.428.desc: Craft the required materials listed on the right to build an Ultimate Compressor! It's a MUCH faster variant of any of the base Galacticraft Compressors and it can craft even if the inputs are jammed up in a couple stacks. Woohoo!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.429.title: Up, down, up, down, up, down...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.429.desc: Craft 2 sets of Hydraulic Platforms! Place one in a 2x2 on the ground, and place the other one a couple blocks higher up. You can use this as a fancy elevator!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.430.title: Wyvern Weaver
divine_journey_2.quest.db.430.desc: Craft your first Wyvern Core! It takes a quarter of a Mana Pool. You'll need a LOT of these, so it might be time to increase your Mana generation.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.431.title: Stores Absolutely ZERO Energy!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.431.desc: Craft a couple Draconic Energy Cores!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.432.title: Egg-streme Heart-ships
divine_journey_2.quest.db.432.desc: Use Dragon Egg Essence to craft some Dragon Eggs and Dragon Hearts!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.433.title: Your prize
divine_journey_2.quest.db.433.desc: Once the Wither slayer is correctly set up, take your prized Nether Stars and run off with them!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.434.title: Oneshotting Withers
divine_journey_2.quest.db.434.desc: Make a Draconic Evolution Mob Grinder!%n%nWhen powered, it's even capable of destroying the Wither with a single blow. Use this to your advantage and build a Wither killer machine! Summon the Wither using Wither Builders (or Formation Planes, Block Placers, your choice). Make sure it stays inside a Witherproof enclosement, and wait for its invulnerability to wear off. Then kill it with a Mob Grinder (it even works through the Witherproof wall)!%n%nIt's also important to mention that the Wither CAN destroy your Wither Builder or other machines that aren't protected by Witherproof blocks. Popular solutions include:%n%n- letting the Wither fall in a tall chamber while its invulnerability wears off, and killing it at the bottom.%n%n- using Draconic Evolution portals made out of a Dislocator Receptacle and some Draconium Infused Obsidian, and teleporting the Wither away from your precious machines into another chamber with the Mob Grinder next to the outer walls; this design takes up less space but is more expensive.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.435.title: Biggerer Battery
divine_journey_2.quest.db.435.desc: Craft a Draconic Flux Capacitor! This is the highest tier Flux Capacitor available in the pack.%n%nCharge it up in your Thermal Expansion Energetic Infuser or Draconic Evolution Energy Infuser.%n%nShift+Right Click with it to toggle it between multiple modes. You can also equip this in a Bauble slot or just leave it in your inventory to charge your desired items.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.436.title: Oh, Packers!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.436.desc: Craft a Packager! You'll only ever need one Packager on your Network, which stores one copy of each Packaged Recipe Holder. The other copies are stored in individual Unpackagers.%n%nIf your Packager is running out of space, extend it with Packager Extensions!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.437.title: Package
divine_journey_2.quest.db.437.desc: Make some Packaging Components!%n%nPackaged Auto is a mod that lets you encode recipes that have more than 9 unique input items. Good examples are Elevatium Ingots in the Laser Focus or some 9x9 crafts.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.438.title: Never exceed the Schwarzschild radius!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.438.desc: Craft a Quantum Compressor! This machine is capable of producing Singularities...! That's right! You'll need good material production using either a Quarry or preferably Seeds, and you'll need to compress them.%n%nThis machine needs to be powered, it needs a Singularification Catalyst in its left slot (which won't be used up), and all inputs can be inserted from the top and the sides, outputs can be extracted from the sides and the bottom.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.439.title: False Advertising
divine_journey_2.quest.db.439.desc: Holds no energy, just takes it. 0 stars.%n%nEven takes like a stack of Redstone Blocks. Make sure to automate their crystallization at least!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.440.title: WELCOME TO LATEGAME!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.440.desc: Make a Plasma Core in the Laser Focus and use it to craft your first Draconic Core!%n%nAll of the 4 included ingots are non-trivial, but all of them can be fully automated. You'll need a lot of Draconic Cores moving forward, so make sure to automate every single step of its creation!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.441.title: 關於頻道
divine_journey_2.quest.db.441.desc: 應用能源是個非常強大的模組,在你完全利用該模組的特色前,有些事情你需要轉一下你的腦袋.%n%n首先是頻道.每個有能力傳輸資料(物品,液體,氣體,或之後章節將到來的其他神奇資源)的AE2機器使用1個頻道.最簡單的玻璃線纜,包層線纜或智慧線纜有能力傳輸8個頻道.智慧線纜也能顯示正在傳輸多少頻道.另外緻密線纜有能力傳輸32個頻道,但有些AE2部件不能直接連接緻密線纜(例如輸出和輸入匯流排或儲存匯流排).%n%n此外,頻道也能傳輸電力至每個AE2機器,所以不需要個別再接電力.如果你只想傳輸電力,可使用石英纖維.%n%n但頻道不是無中生有的!當沒有ME控制器時設置的簡單ME系統,你僅能使用總共8個頻道,這真的不多-所以為了自動合成和自動處理,你必須設置ME控制器的多方塊結構.%n%nME控制器的多方塊結構是ME系統的心臟,所以你只能有1個.要設置這個多方塊結構,將ME控制器緊靠著擺放,這樣它們只能面和面接觸.所以一個最常見的ME控制器設置就是立方體的邊.%n%n為何ME控制器能有幫助呢?好的,控制器方塊的每一面提供32個頻道!全都加起來會是很多的頻道!但嘗試將頻道傳送到遙遠的地方可能不是件容易的事...%n%n所以你有兩個選擇:P2P通道和ME量子環.%n%nP2P通道基本上是將32個頻道壓縮成1個1.簡單從ME控制器連接一個緻密線纜,在上面放P2P通道,然後用智慧線纜從它接線出來.這邊的智慧線纜可儲存8個P2P通道,也就是,當解壓縮時,在另一側有8x32=256個頻道可以使用.要解壓縮頻道,在另一側使用另一個P2P通道,然後用記憶卡將兩個P2P連接在一起!還沒結束喔.你剛剛創建的P2P線路技術上不是你網路的一部分-它是分開的網路!需要從你的原有的網路接石英纖維或另一個能源接收器來供電.同時,因為這是個分開的網路,可以的話在裡面用另一個ME控制器,若8個P2P頻道不夠用的話.%n%n所以,使用P2P通道,你不再需要用8個緻密線纜接線到遠處!一條智慧線纜就足夠了.%n%n或者,你也可以使用量子環的多方塊結構,無線傳輸最多32個一般頻道或P2P頻道.設置這個多方塊結構,使用1個量子連結倉,用8個量子環包圍著它.在距離很遠的兩地各設置一個,然後用2個綁定在一起的量子纏繞態奇點將它們連接.(用AE2奇點和終界粉,爆炸後成一對綁定的量子纏繞態奇點.)注意兩個量子環多方塊結構都需要用能源接收器或石英纖維供電,但兩邊仍是相同的一個ME網路,所以不能兩邊都有控制器的多方塊結構.%n%n但有時候製作兩個分開的系統是很好用的.因為你可以建立一個不需要控制器的小系統,服務地方性的小範圍,且是分開的網路,稱為"子系統".子系統可透過ME界面在主系統中被看見,在子系統那側接上ME儲存匯流排至主系統.典型的運用在自動合成.記得每個子系統都需要電力運作,可透過任何一般的方式供電,也可以從主網路中用石英纖維供電(也只能傳輸電力).%n%n例如破壞面板在子網路時使用不需要格式化.這在自動化植物魔法的活石是很實用的.或是你想製作一個系統投擲出它得到的物品,用個小型的AE2子系統,包含簡單的儲存和格式化的破壞面板-這是自動化一些要把物品丟入液體中轉換成別的物品時非常實用.%n%n若你還有更多的疑問,開個創造模式地圖試試看,或到官方Divine Journey 2 Discord server: https://discord.gg/rH9pyS7 來問問別人.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.442.title: Let's Drag On
divine_journey_2.quest.db.442.desc: Finally you feel powerful enough to hold what seems to be pure Dark Energy in your hands...%n%nAre you ready to abuse its powers?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.443.title: The PenULTIMATE Crafting Table
divine_journey_2.quest.db.443.desc: Make your first 9x9 Crafting Table!%n%nSomething's missing though...%n%nIt's not EXTREME enough...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.444.title: Yet Another Machiavellian Machine Frame (YAMMF)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.444.desc: I swear this is the last tier of Machine Frames... For sure, this time! For suuuuuuuuuuure.....!!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.445.title: Mass Infusion
divine_journey_2.quest.db.445.desc: Craft some Draconic Fusion Injectors! With these, you'll have access to almost all Draconic Evolution Infused items.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.446.title: Powerer Tools
divine_journey_2.quest.db.446.desc: Craft all Draconic Tools & Weapons.%n%nSimilarly to your armor, you can further upgrade these by applying some Upgrade Keys to them through Fusion Crafting.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.447.title: SPUDDY!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.447.desc: Upgrade your Inert Potato Armor into Infused Potato armor, then §cRight Click each piece§r to turn it into an Energized Potato piece!%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n(Now you might think it's bad design not to have the Infused Potato pieces here, but if you Right Click one before this quests would detect it, then you'd have no way to finish the quest other than to recraft the piece from the start.)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.448.title: The Wonders of Armor tiering
divine_journey_2.quest.db.448.desc: Tier up the following Armor pieces until you obtain a full set of Inert Potato Armor:%n%n1. Emeradic armor%n2. Refined Coralium armor%n3. Dreadium armor%n4. Manasteel armor%n5. Living armor%n6. Elementium armor%n7. Terrasteel armor%n8. Thaumium armor%n9. Thaumium Fortress armor%n10. Bewitchment Silver armor%n11. Cold Iron armor%n12. Electricium armor%n13. Skyfather armor%n14. Mystic armor%n15. Heavy Duty armor%n16. Desh armor%n17. Titanium armor%n18. Inert Potato armor
divine_journey_2.quest.db.449.title: 對了,就是蛋...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.449.desc: 合成龍蛋種子!你必須把它種在耕地上,且耕地下方要有龍蛋核心.在這包裡你至少要殺4隻終界龍,才能蒐集出這些合成材料.現在你可以合成終界龍的所有掉落物了.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.450.title: The final Processor
divine_journey_2.quest.db.450.desc: Make 4 Scheduling Processors!%n%nThey're used for the highest tier Storage Components and Packaged Auto items.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.451.title: Look Ma! No Damage!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.451.desc: Do you like the idea of taking zero damage?%n%nDo you like the idea of your armor being simply recharged by RF?%n%nDO YOU WANNA BE OVERPOWERED?!?!?!?%n%nWell then. This is the armor set for you. Make good use of it.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.452.title: "Ultimate" Crafting Table
divine_journey_2.quest.db.452.desc: This is it...%n%nIt's finally EXTREME enough!%n%nThe difference is...%n%nMore POWER!%n%nYeeeessss!%n%nI can craft EVEN MORE POWERFUL items in this...!%n%nNothing can stop me now!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.453.title: Bigger Battery
divine_journey_2.quest.db.453.desc: Craft a Wyvern Flux Capacitor! Charge it up in your Thermal Expansion Energetic Infuser or Draconic Evolution Energy Infuser.%n%nShift+Right Click with it to toggle it between multiple modes. You can also equip this in a Bauble slot or just leave it in your inventory to charge your desired items.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.454.title: Get Woke, Sun
divine_journey_2.quest.db.454.desc: Charge up some Draconium Blocks in the Laser Focus, then use your Fusion Injector setup to convert them into Awakened Draconium Blocks!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.455.title: Rats, another crafting chain
divine_journey_2.quest.db.455.desc: Well what can you do with your Basic Fusion Crafting setup...? Immediately upgrade it to Wyvern tier! Yup! That's it. Nothing else. So do it!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.456.title: Your Patterns, Ma'am
divine_journey_2.quest.db.456.desc: Craft a Package Recipe Holder! This Pattern can have up to 20 recipes that all use up to 81 unique input items. To encode it, use the Package Recipe Encoder. You can also copy its settings there onto another Package Recipe Holder, but make sure not to override one that already holds some recipes. It's safest to check each Recipe Holder first by placing them into the Encoder and hitting "Load" one by one. Only press "Save" if you're sure you intend to override the input Recipe Holder.%n%nYou'll need 2 identical Recipe Holders for each craft, one for the Packager and one for the Unpackager.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.457.title: OP
divine_journey_2.quest.db.457.desc: Upgrade your Wyvern Armor into a full set of Draconic armor!%n%nThe upgrades aren't over though... Check the Draconic Evolution Upgrade Keys in JEI to make your Armor even stronger!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.458.title: It's got Sparklez like a certain Captain
divine_journey_2.quest.db.458.desc: Now that you have a steady source of Nether Stars, make a couple Crystal Matrix Ingots!%n%n(If you're low on Diamonds, craft a Diamond Seed!)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.459.title: Stronger magnetic field
divine_journey_2.quest.db.459.desc: Craft an item Dislocator! This is the best Magnet available so far, even better than the Greater Ring of Magnetization.%n%nSimply Shift+Right Click to activate / deactivate it. You can also place it in a Bauble slot.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.460.title: Strongest magnetic field
divine_journey_2.quest.db.460.desc: "Can my Magnet get even better?!?!?!" - is what you'd think, and yes, yes it can. This is the best Magnet available in the pack, and it works similarly to the previous tier:  Simply Shift+Right Click to activate / deactivate it, and you can place it in a Bauble slot.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.461.title: Auto Your Mato
divine_journey_2.quest.db.461.desc: Needing to automate some 5x5, 7x7 or 9x9 Extended Crafting recipes?! Well, look no further than the Automation Interface!%n%n1. Once crafted, place it on top of an Extended Crafting 5x5, 7x7 or 9x9 Crafting Table, and set up a recipe in the Crafting Table on the bottom (you can use the "+" button from JEI).%n%n2. Then open your Automation Interface and click the "Save Recipe" icon on the bottom left.%n%n3. It's important to also click the Gear icon on the bottom right and choose which direction the input items are coming from and which direction the output items should go to.%n%n4. Power the Interface with some RF, and use perhaps an ME Interface to send items to it and back. To save on ME channels, you can use one ME Interface for 8 Automation Interfaces by whitelisting which items should go into which crafts from the ME Interface.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.462.title: Look Ma! Bunch of damage!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.462.desc: Craft a full set of Wyvern tools & weapons. These tools can be charged up and upgraded.%n%nYou can also apply the Reaper enchantment to the Sword to sometimes obtain Mob Souls when killing Mobs. These can then be used in Stabilized Mob Spawners.%n%nSimilarly to the armor pieces, you'll need to tier up weapons and tools through the exact same tiers as before (except that LightningCraft tools have been removed since they have multiple broken interactions).
divine_journey_2.quest.db.463.title: The balance of power must be preserved
divine_journey_2.quest.db.463.desc: Craft the most "BALANCED" tool in the game. Yup.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.464.desc: Craft a Package Recipe Encoder! Use this machine to Encode recipes that take more than 9 unique input items. You can fill any slot in the 9x9 with the requirements. The maximum amount of unique items you can have is 81.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.465.title: 4.99 each!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.465.desc: Throughout the entire modpack, you'll only need to kill the Ender Dragon 4 times. You had to have killed it at least twice now; once in the first Exploration section, and once to get your first Dragon Scale for Bewitchment. You might need to kill it 2 more times, if so, grab your Ender Crystals, resummon it, and whack it a couple times. It's the perfect way to test out your new armor set anyway!%n%nCollect some Dragon Eggs and craft a Dragon Token to continue.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.466.title: Post Office
divine_journey_2.quest.db.466.desc: To use your Packaged recipes, you'll need to place an Unpackager before each machine, in place of an ME Interface.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.467.title: Got Power?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.467.desc: Build a Draconic Energy Storage multiblock structure!%n%nThis quest asks for Tier 4, but you can build a higher tier one to store even more power!%n%nIf you're unsure of the construction, consult your Draconic Evolution Information Tablet. You can also simply Right Click the Energy Core to see the exact layout.%n%nTier 1 stores 45.5 Million RF%nTier 2 stores 273 Million RF%nTier 3 stores 1.64 Billion RF%nTier 4 stores 9.88 Billion RF%nTier 5 stores 59.3 Billion RF%nTier 6 stores 356 Billion RF%nTier 7 stores 2.14 Trillion RF, or Java's Max Integer Limit (the highest number possible in Java)%nTier 8 stores 2^63 RF. Best represented by "Infinite". Even if you generate a very respectable 10 Million RF/tick, you'd need over 1460 IRL years to fill it up... So, just consider it an infinite power storage!%n%nTo insert or extract energy, use Energy Pylons. Place them near the multiblock, and place a Glass block on top or on the bottom, closer to the center of Energy Storage structure.%n%nYou can simply Right Click the blue orb that forms to toggle between input and output mode.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.468.title: 我的心
divine_journey_2.quest.db.468.desc: 你現在可以合成綠心之容器...!%n%n但別著急, 這不是一件容易獲得的東西.%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nSong : Different Heaven & EH!DE - My Heart %nI spent the last two weeks just screaming,%nI spent the last two weeks just screaming...%nTrying to work you out is killing,%nEver since my heart's been missing...%n%n
divine_journey_2.quest.db.469.title: More than three layers of <3's
divine_journey_2.quest.db.469.desc: Finally, after all this time, you gain access to Blue Hearts, the final tier of Heart Canisters!%n%nThey're not the easiest thing to make, but eventually I'm sure you can max out the final layer of hearts.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.470.title: Heavenly Radiance
divine_journey_2.quest.db.470.desc: Craft a Mantle of the Stars. This is the only armor from Astral Sorcery you can get - and it's one of the most powerful and varied in the game. You can attune (and reattune, overwriting the prior attunement) the Mantle to a specific constellation for buffs and effects - which will be listed here. Additionally, all Mantles have +80% Chaos Resistance, which is direct damage reduction against the Chaos Dragon, a terrifying boss that you will have to fight soon (Chapter 25).%n%nWhen attuned to:%n%nDiscidia, 1/3 of damage against you is added to your next attack.%nArmara, you gain 3 charges of complete damage protection, which slowly regen.%nVicio, an elytra that does not lose durability from flying - and can be upgraded to creative flight via a perk.%nAevitas, slowly restores missing health and hunger.%nEvorsio, breaks block faster, mines in an AOE, and does damage to nearby mobs.%nLucerna, highlights nearby mobs and spawners.%nMineralis, highlights nearby blocks that match what is in your hand or offhand.%nHorologium, freezes all nearby mobs when hit, but has a minute long cooldown.%nOctans, gives water breathing, and removes all movement and tool usage penalties for being submerged.%nBootes, flares spawn when you are attacked, and will attack your most recent attacker.%nFornax, applies healing equal to the damage taken from fire.%nPelotrio, when breaking a block or attacking a mob, spawn a Spectral Tool, which will then attempt to mirror what you are doing.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.471.title: BQ 是什麼?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.471.desc: §c§l非常重要:§r§c 當任務書的檔案有做出變動時, 記得輸入 §e/bq_admin default load§c 來重新讀取新的或有改動的任務。§r%n§%n%nBQ, 更好的任務(BetterQuesting)的簡稱, 是一個可以讓模組包作者自行製作一個詳細的%n任務系統給玩家的模組, 也能加入該模組包的最終目標以及教學導引等。你可以使用%n按鍵(預設: §eK§r)打開你的任務書。更好的任務(BetterQuesting)的某些視覺上的效果有經由%n附屬模組更好的任務調整器(BQTweaker)進行過一些修改。%n%n所有任務已經被拆分成數個章節。您在遊玩時, 不需要徹底完成一個章節才進入到下一個, 但如果您想這麼做的話, 那是您的自由。%n在這個模組包的每一個任務章節中, 重要且必須完成才能遂使進入下一個章節的重點任務, 已經特別放大並清楚的標示出來了。%n%n任務需要以獲得物品的方式來完成, 而需要獲得的物品會列於任務視窗的右側。%n在任務視窗的左上部分, 會有該任務的一些描述(或一些有趣的雙關)。%n在任務視窗的左下部分, 通常會列出該任務的獎勵, 可以點擊下方的領取按鈕來獲得。%n某些任務屬於"多選擇任務", 這代表你必須從數個獎勵中選出您想要的再進行%n領取的動作。某些任務則屬於多獎勵任務, 您可以藉由點擊鄰近領取按鈕的箭頭來檢%n視獎勵清單的每一頁內容。%n%n任務會有幾種不同的表現形式, 以表現處於不同狀態下的任務。%n- 若你沒有辦法進入或完成這個任務, 它將會有一個灰色的背景。%n- 若您剛解鎖了這個任務, 它將會有一個發光的紅色背景。%n- 若您已經完成了這個任務, 但是這個任務尚有未領取的獎勵,%n  它將會有一個發光的綠色背景。%n- 若您已經完成了這個任務, 並且確定所有可領取的獎勵皆以領取完成的話,%n  它將會有一個固定的綠色的背景。%n%n在任務書的主頁右下角, 會有一個可以控制是否顯示完成任務通知的按鈕, 可供玩家自行調整。%n%n在章節清單的左側, 您可以看到 3 個按鈕。%n依照由上而下的順序, 它們分別是:%n- 獲取所有尚未獲取的獎勵( 多選擇任務的獎勵將無法透過這個功能領取 )%n- 自動調整縮放比例大小至可以顯示出所有子任務%n- 返回, 即代表回到主頁%n%n你可以使用按鍵(預設: §e退格鍵§r)或上一頁按鈕來回到上一頁。%n%n最後, 藉由啟動進階提示功能(§eF3+H§r), 你可以看到一些任務的追加訊息。%n%n
divine_journey_2.quest.db.472.title: JEI 是什麼?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.472.desc: JEI, 或稱 Just Enough Items, 是一個下載量最高的模組。%n他用於搜尋模組添加的物品及合成配方。因此，了解 JEI 的工作原理至關重要。%n%n對一個物品點擊左鍵或按下顯示配方的按鍵 (預設: §eR§r) 將會顯示所有能做出該物品的配方, 若該物品沒有任何配方能製作, 則不會顯示任何東西。%n%n對一個物品點擊左鍵或按下顯示用途的按鍵(預設: §eU§r)將會顯示所有有使用到該物品的配方,%n同樣地,如果該物品不能製作任何東西,則不會顯示任何東西。%n%n你可以在檢視配方的時候使用滑鼠滾輪來檢視不同的頁面, 你也可以使用退格鍵%n來回到上一個檢視的配方。%n%n在配方檢視器的左側, 你可以看到所有配方完成所需要的工具(註)。%n§7註: 基於一些兼容性問題, 您只能看到絕大多數的工具, 而不一定是全部的工具。§r%n%n若您點擊配方檢視器的標題,您將可以"顯示所有的配方",也就是列出所有遊戲中可行的合成配方。%n%n點擊你的加入書籤按鍵(預設:§eA§r)可以將滑鼠正下方的物品加入左側的書籤區,利用這個功能來快速記錄你需要完成的工作吧。%n%n%n%n如何使用 JEI 的搜尋功能:%n%nJEI 使用子字串比對的方式來進行搜尋, 這代表輸入 "炭" 將會同時找到 "煤炭" 和 "木炭".%n%n你可以使用" @ "特定搜尋單一模組的物品, 例: "@botania" 可以列出所有來自 Botania 的物品。%n%n你可以使用" | "作為OR運算子來同時搜尋兩種不一樣的東西, " | " 這個符號的按鍵可以在 Enter 的上方找到。%n%n你可以在字串前加上" - "來排除特定的項目, 例: "-@minecraft" 將會從搜尋結果中排除原生Minecraft的所有物品。%n%n您可以隨意組合以上這些搜尋方法。例: 搜尋"@alchem"將會同時顯示 Alchemistry 和 Blood Magic: Alchemical Wizardry 的物品, 您可以使用"@alchem -@blood"來從中排除掉Blood Magic: Alchemical Wizardry的物品, 又或者您可以透過"@alchem -@blood|singu"來同時搜尋所有 Alchemistry 和 Singularities 的物品。%n%n如果您無法順利從您的箱子找到您想要的物品, 您可以雙擊 JEI 的搜尋方框, JEI 將會幫你標出在您的箱子中所有符合搜尋要求的物品。%n%n如果您想要將配方到入到工作台上, 但不想手動一個一個選取物品的話, 可以在您在工作台上檢視配方的時候, 點擊旁邊的"+"按紐, 它將會參考配方自動將所有所需物品移動到工作台上。如果您想要放上盡可能多的物品的話, 在按下"+"按鈕的同時按下Shift即可。%n%n
divine_journey_2.quest.db.473.title: 關於團隊功能
divine_journey_2.quest.db.473.desc: 注意: 以下內容並非關於伺服器架設的設定, 若您有架設伺服器的需求, 歡迎前往我們的 Discord 伺服器詢問相關事宜。以下內容為使用團隊功能遊玩時的相關事項。%n%n想要和你的團隊一起玩這個模組包嗎? 以下是你該知道的一些事情。%n%n關於任務系統:%n%n第一步: 點擊任務系統視窗左下角的返回按鈕來回到任務系統的主頁面。%n第二步: 點擊隊伍, 並邀請你的朋友們加入您的隊伍。%n第三步: 等待他們的同意, 注意邀請是有時間限制的, 需要請你的朋友們盡快接受邀請。%n%n完成以上步驟後, 現在他們已經順利加入你的任務書隊伍了! 所有的任務進度將會同步到隊伍內每一個人的任務書上。%n%n關於聲明區塊:%n%n第一步: 打開你的個人介面(預設: §eE§r)並點擊左上角我的團隊按鈕。%n第二步: 點擊組員並把你的朋友加入進來。%n你可以選擇點擊打開設定頁面, 更改組的顯示名稱。%n現在你的朋友們已經加入了你的 FTB 組, 你們可以在組的聲明區塊中和方塊互動。%n%n最後, 關於更多實用設備(Extra Utilities 2)模組:%n若你想要和其他人共享你的GP, 你只需要輸入 §c/xu_powersharing§r 並選擇你的隊友。你的隊友對你下一樣的指令來完成共享的動作。%n%n這些就是全部了 :)%n%n
divine_journey_2.quest.db.474.title: 關於捷徑
divine_journey_2.quest.db.474.desc: 這是關於鍵盤快捷鍵的解說, 不是教你怎麼略過模組包挑戰的解說, 不如說你沒辦法略過的, 太天真了孩子。%n%n當你將滑鼠停在一個物品上(在背包介面或JEI介面都可以)時, 按下 §eT§r 鍵, 他可以為你標出鄰近的包含有該物品的箱子, 符合條件的箱子將會出現白色粒子效果。反之, 如果沒有任何符合條件的箱子, 則不會有任何事情發生。§4警告: 如果附近有 Bibliocraft 的方塊的話, 該功能會被強制終止。§r%n%n當你將滑鼠停在你的背包介面的其中一個物品上時, 按下 §eShift+T §r, 會自動將該物品的名稱發送至聊天室中, 讓全部玩家都能看到。%n%n按下 §eF3+Q§r 將會顯示所有 F3+[某按鍵] 的功能介紹。%n%n§eF3+H§r, 進階提示顯示, 能允許你看到更多有幫助的資訊 - 雖然這些資訊可能對你來說有那麼點太多, 它帶來的好處卻是超乎想像的。好處之一就是你可以確切地看到要解鎖一個任務會有哪些要求 - 這代表你不需要在想要解鎖之後的任務時, 還得辛苦地回到前面翻找是哪一個任務還沒完成。%n還有一個雖然不是快捷鍵, 但是想在這裡告訴你的一個功能。你可以手動開啟是否顯示 NBT 標籤資訊, 打開你的背包介面, 點擊左上角的灰色齒輪按鈕, 也就是"客戶端設定"的按鈕, 選擇 FTB Library, 並將"顯示物品 NBT"的設定值設為 true 即可。%n%n§eF3+G§r, 顯示區塊邊界, 它的功能是讓你, 呃, 看到你所在區塊的邊界。但值得一提的是, 這個模組包有一個關於區塊邊界的進階功能, 預設的啟動按鍵是 §eF9§r, 它所顯示的區塊邊界有四種模式:%n- 不可見%n- 只顯示角落位置%n- 顯示所有方塊邊界(類似原本的 F3+G)%n- 只顯示最外圍邊界%n%n善用這個功能來確保你不會蓋出一個橫跨區塊邊界的自動化處理流程, 因為這可能會導致您的流程無法正常運作, 甚至發生遊戲崩潰。%n%n§eF7§r, 顯示可生怪區域, 所有現在就能生怪的區域會被標上紅色的記號, 而如果是只能在晚上生怪的區域, 則會被標上黃色記號。%n%n§e滑鼠鍵 4§r (如果你的滑鼠沒有超過三個按鍵的話, 你可以在選項中的按鍵設定更改這個功能的按鍵綁定), 將物品展示於世界, 會將你當前持有的物品放入世界中， 有點類似於將物品放入物品展示框中。%n%n§eF3+P§r, 在失焦時暫停, 是一個只能作用於單人模式的功能。它的狀態預設是開啟的, 當這個功能是啟動狀態的時候, 在你不是停留在背包介面時做出切換視窗的動作, 將會自動暫停遊戲, 並打開暫停選單。%n%n§eF3+A§r, 重新載入區塊, 將會重載所有過去有加載過的區塊, 可以修復區塊並未正常載入, 或是方塊消失的錯誤。%n%n除了以上列出的常用快捷鍵以外, 這個模組包還有非常多實用的快捷鍵, 你可以打開暫停選單, 選擇"選項..." -> "按鍵設定..."來查看或編輯大部分的快捷鍵設定。%n
divine_journey_2.quest.db.475.title: Divine Journey 2 是什麼?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.475.desc: Divine Journey 2, 通常縮寫成"DJ2", 是一個圍繞著 DivineRPG 和一些自動化魔法模組開發而成的專家向模組包。%n前一個版本的 DJ1, 通常被稱為 Divine Journey, 是一個和本模組包有著類似的最終目標的模組包, 在 2017 年基於 1.7.10 版本開發。您不需要遊玩 DJ1 來了解 DJ2 的內容。%n%nDJ2 是一個專家向模組包。這可能對不同的玩家有著不同的意義存在, 但在這裡我們想表示的是:%n%n1. 這個模組包將會花費您非常長的時間來達成目標。%n%n2. 這個模組包是圍繞著它的進度開發的 - 大多數的東西都是有限制的, 多數的合成配方也和原生的配方有所不同。%n%n3. 合成配方所使用的物品價值將會非常的高, 並且會需要自動化 - 有時是小規模的, 有時候則會是極端誇張的規模。幸運的是, 您將會有很多工具來協助你的努力, 它們將會漸漸地在這個模組包的前半進程中一一解鎖。應用能源(Applied Energistic)會成為你的朋友, 您需要利用它來自動製作或自動處理近乎所有任務所需要的東西。%n%n%n這個模組包的最終目標是"找尋人生的意義", 而它就藏在進入遊戲時會獲得的一個包包裡, 所以應該不會太難吧...喔等等, 這個包包好像需要某種鑰匙才能打開它, 我看看..."§l無盡之鑰§r"? 喔...喔不...這就麻煩了......%n%n和初代的 Divine Journey 一樣, 你會需要 "§l無限的無盡之錠§r", 雖然不是真正意義上的"無限", 你仍然會需要費§l很多功夫§r來做出前往無限之鑰, 最好的情況是使用創造模式儲物箱來協助你完成。%n%n所以啦, 基本上這個模組包的最大目標就是要獲得創造模式下才能取得的某些物品......我懂, 這目標還挺常見的, 一點都沒有原創感。%n%n但你知道什麼是原創的嗎? 那就是超過600種以上的自創物品和超過5000種以上的更改過的合成配方, 它們將會引導著你直到最後...總之, 祝你好運!%n%n%n%n該模組包的主要進度如下:%n%n1. 入門階段: 原生Minecraft內容, 匠魂(Tinkers' Construct), 圖騰模組(Totemic),%n             根源魔法(Roots), 沉浸工藝(Immersive Engineering), 早期的通用機械(Mekanism),%n             和AE2的物品儲存.%n%n2. 主要的世界探索: 更好的地獄(Better Nether), 暮光森林(Twilight Forest (可選擇)),%n                    沙漠次元(Atum 2), 混沌世界(Erebus), 天境(Aether I), 冰晶雪原(Iceika).%n%n3. 主要的科技模組:%n   - Stage 1: 更多實用設備(Extra Utilities)的第一部分, 開放式方塊(Open Blocks),%n             刷怪塔實用設備(Mob Grinding Utils)%n   - Stage 2: 熱力膨脹(Thermal Expansion), 終界接口(EnderIO)的第一部分, AE2 %n             合成終端和流體儲存%n   - Stage 3: 工業先鋒(Industrial Foregoing), 一部分的RF工具(RFTools),太陽能(SolarFlux %n             Reborn),量子通量(QuantumFlux)%n   - Stage 4: 實用拓展(Actually Additions), 終界接口(EnderIO)的第二部分, %n             簡易噴氣背包(simply jetpacks)%n   - Stage 5: 通用機械(Mekanism)的第一部分, 更多實用設備(Extra Utilities)的第二部分, %n             AE2 自動合成和自動處理, 無線 AE2, 終界設備(Ender Utilities), %n             終界儲存(Ender Storage).%n%n4. 主要的魔法模組:%n   - Stage 1: 深淵國度(AbyssalCraft) 第一部分, 神聖RPG(DivineRPG)的開始, %n             血魔法(Blood Magic)的第一部分, 邪惡工藝(EvilCraft)的第一部分%n   - Stage 2: 深淵國度(AbyssalCraft)的第二部分, 植物魔法(Botania)的第一部分%n   - Stage 3: 植物魔法(Botania)的第二部分, 血魔法(Blood Magic)的第二部分, %n             邪惡工藝(EvilCraft)的第二部分%n   - Stage 4: 秘術時代(Thaumcraft)%n   - Stage 5: 巫術(Bewitchment)%n   - Stage 6: 秘術進階(Thaumic Augmentation), 秘術能源(Thaumic Energistics)%n   - Stage 7: 神聖RPG(DivineRPG)的結束, 雷電工藝(LightningCraft), %n             極限反應堆(Extreme Reactors)%n   - Stage 8: 星輝魔法(Astral Sorcery). 後期的更多實用設備(Extra Utilities), %n             星系模組(Galacticraft)%n%n5. 最終階段: 龍科技(Draconic Evolution), 煉金化學(Alchemistry), %n             農業工藝(AgriCraft), RF工具:維度(RFTools Dimensions), 無盡貪婪(Avaritia), %n             創造模式物品, 解鎖人生的意義.%n%n
divine_journey_2.quest.db.476.title: Beam Core? Huh, more like Be-gone Core!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.476.desc: Break down some Beam Cores into Nickel Chloride and Polyvinyl Chloride!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.477.title: Gone, Reduced to Elements
divine_journey_2.quest.db.478.title: I thought it was over... But alas, more Cores!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.478.desc: Obtain some Kaolinite from Draconic or Wyvern Cores, and combine it with Barium, Psyllium and Chaotic Cores to get the actual final tier of Draconic Evolution Cores: The Corrupted Core!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.479.title: The Abyss is trippy
divine_journey_2.quest.db.479.desc: Break down Refined Coralium into Psyllium, or use some Hybrid Abyssalium to also get Potassium Permanganate.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.480.title: Bury 'em!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.480.desc: Get some Hand Purple from Wyvern Cores or Barium Sulfate from Crystaltine Ingots, and break them down further into elemental Barium.%n%n...%n%n- Why are Helium, Curium and Barium called the medical elements?%n%n- Because if you can't Helium or Curium, you Barium!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.481.title: Chemical Caster
divine_journey_2.quest.db.481.desc: It is highly recommended that you do the "Growing Chaos" quest at the top of this Chapter before doing this quest, so you won't have to kill another Chaos Guardian... unless... you'd LIKE to do that. Then go ahead.%n%nBuild the Chemical Caster multiblock! Note that all 4 Casting Tables require an Ingot Cast to be placed in them.%n%nThe quest requires an additional Resistive Heater, which you'll use to provide heat for the machine. You can use any Mekanism Heat Acceptor on the top. Simply power the Resistive Heater, and set its power usage high first (to a couple thousand RF/tick), to have it heat up. Once it's sufficiently hot, you can bring its power usage down to only about 200 RF/tick. It takes a little while to have the heat transferred to the multiblock, so be patient.%n%nUsing this machine, you can cast any solid Alchemistry element into its Ingot form. It's fast, and it's available earlier than the Chemical Combiner, which is also capable of doing this. However the Combiner can create a bunch of Compounds as well.%n%nYou'll likely end up using both of the machines later on.%n
divine_journey_2.quest.db.482.title: Rubbing it in
divine_journey_2.quest.db.482.desc: Break down Tungsten into Rubidium in the Fission multiblock!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.483.title: Why didn't you tell Alphonse Elric about this?!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.483.desc: Build the Fission Controller multiblock!%n%nYou can check your Alchemistry Guidebook to see how to construct it, but it's a simple 5x5x5 hollow cube of Fission Casing blocks, with a 3-tall pillar of Fission Cores in the center. Then make sure to place the Fission Controller while looking AT the multiblock. (Sometimes the Guidebook shows its orientation incorrectly.)%n%nThen power the Controller, and you can input and output items from any side.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.484.title: Holy Molybdenum!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.484.desc: Break down Bismuth into Molybdenum in the Fission multiblock!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.485.title: 10^100 Chrome
divine_journey_2.quest.db.485.desc: Use Potassium Dichromate, Chromium Oxide, Wafers or Rainbow Plates to get some Chromium!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.486.title: The opposite of Pokemony
divine_journey_2.quest.db.486.desc: Get some Antimony Trioxide from End Steel, and break it down further into pure Antimony!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.487.title: Good luck pronouncing this!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.487.desc: Combine some Zirconium, Yttrium and some Beryllium Alumide into Zircyttrid Beryllium Alumide!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.488.title: Breakout on Acid
divine_journey_2.quest.db.488.desc: Break down Beryl Zincite to get Beryllium Alumide and Silicon Trioxide!%n%n%n...Oh, the wonders of Alchemy!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.489.title: Yeet-rium
divine_journey_2.quest.db.489.desc: Break down some Platinum, Iridium or Gold in the Fission Multiblock to obtain some Yttrium!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.490.title: Old nightmares
divine_journey_2.quest.db.490.desc: Break down some Gold or Mercury in the Fission multiblock to obtain some Zirconium!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.491.title: Atomizer
divine_journey_2.quest.db.491.desc: Make an Atomizer to turn any Fluid into atoms and molecules! It's the easiest way to get H20 or any other molecule that has a liquid form at room temperature.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.492.title: Anti-Strong Compound... Weak Compound?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.492.desc: No, it's pretty strong. Make some!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.493.title: Heat resistant AND allows for circuits
divine_journey_2.quest.db.493.desc: Zirconium%nYttrium%nScandium%nCopper%n- %nBeryllium%nAlumide%nArgon%nCarbonate%nHelium%n%nSheet.%n%nOr, a Zysc-Baach Sheet, for short.%n%nCraft it in the Liquicrafter!%n%nRemember that Helium and Argon are considered liquids right now, so use liquid transporting Tanks or Fluid Conduits.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.494.title: It's a Scandal!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.494.desc: Break down Niobium further into Scandium!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.495.title: Chipmunk Voice
divine_journey_2.quest.db.495.desc: Break down some Lithium or Beryllium in the Fission multiblock into Helium!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.496.title: Where have all the flowers gon
divine_journey_2.quest.db.496.desc: Break down Rubidium further into Argon!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.497.title: Am I D.?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.497.desc: Break down Luminessence to get Urea, then break it down further into Amide!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.498.title: Millions and millions of Seeds
divine_journey_2.quest.db.498.desc: Combine a Corrosive Will Crystal, Blutonium Dust and some Concentrated Cloud Seed in the Vat to obtain some Growth Infusion Liquid! Then use your Growth Infusion Liquid to obtain some Crop Sticks!%n%nThese sticks are way more powerful than they look like - they allow you to duplicate any Mystical Agriculture Seed planted on them, either through spreading or using the Clipper.%n%nYou can also mutate the same type of crop with itself by planting 2 of them on a Crop Stick placed diagonally from each other, and placing a double-Crop Stick in the corner. The Seeds will eventually mutate (which you can speed up a lot with the Imaginary Time Block), creating a potentially better one.%n%nEach AgriCraft Seed has 3 stats, and maxing them out is commonly referred to as "10/10/10'ing the Seed". The last 10 doesn't matter for this pack, as weeds are disabled, but the first two increase the rate at which the crop grows and the second one increases the average yield of the crop.%n%nYou can check the 10/10/10'ing progress in a Seed Analyzer.%n%nYou'll need a bunch of Seeds in one of the later Chapters, so definitely take advantage of AgriCraft!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.499.title: 揮舞著它蓋建築
divine_journey_2.quest.db.499.desc: 合成無限建築魔仗!這是將你至今建造的所有基礎設施封頂起來的完美工具,或是建造一間房子(或城堡?)來住.它有相當大的建築範圍,但切記不要誤按了它...否則你會比沒有使用這個魔杖的時候做更多的清理工作...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.500.title: Salty
divine_journey_2.quest.db.500.desc: Craft an Evaporator. When a fluid is placed in it, it will slowly evaporate into an item. You'll want to passively automate this, as you'll need a large amount of Mineral Salt.%n%nYou can push fluids from any side and pull items from any side as well.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.501.title: Gone, Reduced to Elements
divine_journey_2.quest.db.501.desc: Craft a Chemical Dissolver! Give it some power and toss in a material and it will dissolve down into elements. You can push inputs and pull outputs from any side.%n%nIf you'd like to craft more Dissolvers but you don't have enough Chaos Shards, try to move towards the quest near the top of this Chapter called "Growing Chaos" that allows you to craft Tiny Chaos Fragments!%n%nThis quest also unlocks a lot of other quests on this page that aren't connected to it. This is because the connections would get really messy otherwise!%n%n§6(Note that if you have for some reason enabled edit mode, you must disable it to continue.)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.502.title: Machine Frame ^who knows
divine_journey_2.quest.db.502.desc: Okay I might have lied when I said the Draconic Machine Frame was the highest tier... but I swear this time there is no more... no more Machine Frame tiers... nah-ah, not at all. Nada. Yup. Definitely.%n%nTo craft the required Crystal Cores, you'll need Rock Crystals with size at least 300 and purity at least 75%.%n%nTo grow Rock Crystals, place a Bucket of Starlight in a 1x1 hole. Throw a Rock Crystal inside and wait. This will slowly increase its size. Don't keep diving into the hole to see how much your Crystal has grown, the size changes will happen in larger jumps, and if you keep picking up the Rock Crystal, the size changes will never happen. Once the Rock Crystal size increases a bit, the Bucket of Starlight gets used up.%n%nIf the size of your Rock Crystal is nearing maximum (400), when throwing it into a pool will have a chance to split it into two. One will have the same purity, and the other will have its purity increased by 0-9%.%n%nThis means for every split, on average you gain a Rock Crystal with a 4.5% increased purity. Depending on what the original Crystal's purity was, it might take you 10 or even 20 full Crystal splittings before you can reach a high purity value. So it's important to start with at least a decent Crystal.%n%nOnce you obtain a couple high-purity Crystals, it's time to automate this! Your best friend will be Integrated Dynamics.%n%nThere is a great explanation by Direwolf20 in his video titled "Enigmatica 2 Ep88 Dynamics Crystal Growth Pt2", (search for it on YouTube and watch it carefully if you're unsure how to do this automation). Link is: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8F3K8sSN3aM%n%nTo put together the incredients, you'll once again need to use the Laser Focus multiblock. It is recommended that you swap out the Huge Energy Input Hatch into a Ludicrous one.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.503.title: Calcium Carbs
divine_journey_2.quest.db.503.desc: Dissolve Meteoric Iron to gain some Calcium Carbonate. Your immediate use for them is to craft Mekanism Heat Input blocks from Modular Diversity.%n%nHowever you might need more Chaos Shards for the upcoming multiblock, so check out the quest near the top of this Chapter called "Growing Chaos" to get more!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.504.title: So THAT's what Mana tastes like
divine_journey_2.quest.db.504.desc: Break down AbyssalCraft Crystallized Mana or Runes of Mana into Ammonium. Your best bet is to use the highest tier AbyssalCraft Crystallized Mana Clusters.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.505.title: Never before seen reactions
divine_journey_2.quest.db.505.desc: Obtain some Beryl from Mirion Ingots and Zinc Oxide from Alchemical Brass, and combine them into Beryl Zincite!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.506.title: Feelin' like a real Alchemist
divine_journey_2.quest.db.506.desc: Craft a Chemical Combiner! This machine allows you to create a bunch of Compounds as well as any Alchemistry Ingot. You can also create some basic materials with it.%n%nSimilarly to the Dissolver, you can input and output from any side.%n%nYou can combine up to 9 inputs, and each input slot can have any number of items. Sometimes putting elements into different slots will yield different results, for example both a Copper Ingot and a piece of Copper Dust takes 16 Copper elements, and placing the input into slot 1 or 2 will determine what the output is going to be.%n%nThis machine is 4x slower than the Chemical Caster multiblock, however it's still an essential block.%n%nIn order to automate it, it's best to set a target recipe by looking at a Combiner recipe in JEI, and pressing the "+" button to import it into the machine. This way, all the input ingredients will land in the correct slot.%n%nTo create AE2 Patterns for the machine, use Alchemistry Slot Fillers wherever you don't want an item to be placed. These Slot Fillers are incredibly cheap, but get consumed upon crafting, so you'll want a lot of them.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.507.title: From the Abyss, into Alchemy
divine_journey_2.quest.db.507.desc: Break down AbyssalCraft Methane into Alchemistry Methane!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.508.title: Strontium
divine_journey_2.quest.db.508.desc: Use one of the main Impetus items to get Strontium Carbonate and break it down further into regular Strontium!%n%nYou might want to semi-automate the creation of some of these Impetus items. You can use an External Crafter to keep your Primordial Pearl repaired.%n%nHowever, once you get to Fission, you'll be able to break down regular old Osmium into Strontium, so it's not hugely important to automate it now.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.509.title: Nice and fertilized
divine_journey_2.quest.db.509.desc: Combine some materials in your Chemical Combiner into some Alchemistry Fertilizer, then into some Mystical Fertilizer!%n%nYou can use the latter to Bone Meal your Mystical Agriculture crops.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.510.title: Diamonds!? Nah, just Di - ammonium...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.510.desc: Combine some Ammonium, Hydrogen and Phosphate in your Chemical Combiner into Diammonium Phosphate!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.511.title: Electrolyzer
divine_journey_2.quest.db.511.desc: The Electrolyzer is an optional machine, but it's the easiest way to get Chlorine using only Water and Salt as the inputs.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.512.title: Chromatic Barry
divine_journey_2.quest.db.513.title: Tight -anium
divine_journey_2.quest.db.513.desc: While regular Titanium does yield Titanium elements, you can only get Titanium Oxide from Compressed Titanium or Titanium Boxes. The Boxes reliably yield more, not just with a 50% chance.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.514.title: I'm Elemental
divine_journey_2.quest.db.514.desc: Break down some Evil Infused Iron into Lead Iodide, and break it down further into regular Iodine!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.515.title: Melted Stars
divine_journey_2.quest.db.515.desc: Melt some Nether Stars to get Hydroxylapatite, and break it down further into Phosphate.%n%nThis might be the perfect time to upgrade your Wither farm as well!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.516.title: So that's why your Tung Stanks when you bite this
divine_journey_2.quest.db.516.desc: Dissolve some Stone Ichor into Tungsten!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.517.title: Growing Chaos
divine_journey_2.quest.db.517.desc: 1. First use Iodine, Mercury and Copper Chloride in your Liquicrafter multiblock to get a little bit of Impure Mercury-Iodine Mixture.%n%n2. Then purify this liquid with some Nickel Chloride to get pure Liquid Iodine.%n%n3. Finally, combine 10mB of Liquid Iodine with some Mesquite and Titanium Oxide to get 6 Tiny Chaos Fragments!%n%nIt might not be a bad idea to automate this entire process. I recommend using 3 separate Liquicrafters for it.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.518.title: We can't GO to Mercury, but we can GET some Mercury
divine_journey_2.quest.db.518.desc: Break down Supremium Ingots into Mercury Sulfide, and break it down further into elemental Mercury.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.519.title: Is it nature green or poison green...?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.519.desc: Alloy up some Cadmium and Arsenic! What could POSSIBLY go wrong?!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.520.title: Chad-mium
divine_journey_2.quest.db.520.desc: Break down some Flying Ointment into Cadmium Sulfide, and break it down further into Cadmium elements.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.521.title: Taste the rainbow... Or don't, actually, DON'T!!!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.521.desc: Break down Rainbow Plates into Arsenic Sulfide and further into pure Arsenic.%n%nSo yeah, DON'T taste the Rainbow. For your own safety.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.522.title: "Sap Hire" - is what a gemologist would call "Free Honey".
divine_journey_2.quest.db.522.desc: Combine some Cobalt Aluminate, Potassium Permanganate and Aluminum Oxide to get your first Sapphire Gem!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.523.title: CoAl, not Coal...!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.523.desc: Break down some Mirion Ingots or Blocks into Cobalt Aluminate!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.524.title: Purpler and Calcer
divine_journey_2.quest.db.524.desc: Combine some Han Purple and Calcium Carbonate into Han Calcite!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.525.title: Vandalism
divine_journey_2.quest.db.525.desc: Break down Silver into some Vanadium!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.526.title: Barium Circuitry
divine_journey_2.quest.db.526.desc: 1. Melt your elemental Tungsten in your Liquifier.%n%n2. Then also melt some Nitrogen. Even though Nitrogen is a gas, this time it can only be picked up in Fluid tanks! Low on Nitrogen? Well, there are several ways to get it. Check out all the possibilities in JEI!%n%n3. Then combine the above two liquids with a Copper Canister, some Barium Calcite, some Silicon Trioxide, some Dense Ice from the Asteroid Belt and some Sapphire to obtain an Oxygen-Rich Barium Calcite Perpetuator!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.527.title: Repeated Breakdown
divine_journey_2.quest.db.527.desc: Break down Han Calcite into Barium Calcite and Copper Carbonate!%n%nTake a minute to appreciate Alchemy... This is what Han Purple and Calcium Carbonate became...!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.528.title: Melting Atoms
divine_journey_2.quest.db.528.desc: Craft a Liquifier! Input 16 of certain elements to obtain their liquid form. You can use any side as item input and any side as fluid output.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.529.title: Boring
divine_journey_2.quest.db.529.desc: Break down Fluorine, Neon or Sodium into Boron!%n%nSodium comes from regular old Salt, so that's probably your best choice.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.530.title: Queue-queue the Hellfire
divine_journey_2.quest.db.530.desc: Break down Bottled Hellfire into Cucurbitacin!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.531.title: Rubying it in
divine_journey_2.quest.db.531.desc: Alloy up some Ruby and Rubidium into Ruby Rubidium. Fun!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.532.title: Rube Goldberg would be proud
divine_journey_2.quest.db.532.desc: Combine some Strontium Carbonate, Cucurbitacin and beta-Carotene into your first piece of Ruby!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.533.title: V-M-B
divine_journey_2.quest.db.533.desc: Obtain some Mendelevium from Nether Stars and alloy up some Vanadium, Mendelevium and Boron into some V.M.B. Compound!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.534.title: Adding Carbon and Hydrogen... many many times.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.534.desc: Upgrade Methane into Ethane, Propane, Butane, Pentane and finally, Hexane!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.535.title: Slot Machine
divine_journey_2.quest.db.535.desc: It's only a piece of Peridot and $49.99 to upgrade your Token to the last tier! Call now - 01/66/420-DR4G0N!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.536.title: It's even on the Peridotic Table
divine_journey_2.quest.db.536.desc: Combine some Magnesium Sulfate, Magnesium Oxide and Hexane to obtain your first Peridot!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.537.title: Blue on the outside, Cyan in the inside
divine_journey_2.quest.db.537.desc: Break down Crystalline Ingots or Crystaltine Ingots to get some Copper Chloride!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.538.title: Mmm...(th)at's quite nice
divine_journey_2.quest.db.538.desc: Break down Void Metal or any base Impetus item to obtain Mesquite! Remember that Void Metal Seeds are now available to craft.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.539.title: Copper Bismid Sheet
divine_journey_2.quest.db.539.desc: Combine some Copper Carbonate and Bismuth into a Sheetmetal shape!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.540.title: Bismuth
divine_journey_2.quest.db.540.desc: Obtain some Bismuth from Demonic Elixirs!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.541.title: Magnesium Compounds
divine_journey_2.quest.db.541.desc: Break down Basic Wafers, some Flying Ointment or some Bottled Frostfire to obtain Magnesium Sulfate.%n%nAlso break down any of the Will Crystals to get Magnesium Oxide. The best yield comes from Destructive, Vengeful and Steadfast Will Crystals.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.542.title: What Lead to this?!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.542.desc: Break down some Lead in the Fission multiblock into Niobium!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.543.title: Weak Fusion Plant
divine_journey_2.quest.db.543.desc: Gather up the materials listed on the right and build a Weak Fusion Plant! This machine is capable of combining certain elements by adding their atomic numbers. It's not as strong as Alchemistry's Fusion multiblock though, but we gotta work with what we got.%n%nThis machine requires a lot of power to use though, so definitely use appropriate Conduits. Melodic ones will do!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.544.title: Fission makes these easier!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.544.desc: Using Fission, now you can simply get Strontium from Osmium, Chromium from Silver and Manganese from Tin!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.545.title: An Inscriber's dream
divine_journey_2.quest.db.545.desc: Build the Mass Inscriber multiblock!%n%nThis is an incredibly fast version of the AE2 Inscriber, allowing you to create Circuits and Processors in bulk without even needing any Presses!%n%nTake advantage of this machine!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.546.title: Neon
divine_journey_2.quest.db.546.desc: Break down Calcium or Scandium into Neon!%n%nYou can use Condensed Milk or Eggs for Calcium, and you can get Scandium from Niobium, and Niobium from Lead.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.547.title: Heating up and Cooling down
divine_journey_2.quest.db.547.desc: Fission requires some sturdy coolants! Cadmium Arsenic provides appropriate casing and Neon can cool the machine. Unfortunately these break after each infusion though.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.548.title: Handle it with care...!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.548.desc: Fuse up some Uranium from Niobium and Antimony. As long as the tube is sealed, it shouldn't cause any harm...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.549.title: A Paladin living in a Palace made of...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.550.title: A tube separates us from certain death
divine_journey_2.quest.db.550.desc: Fuse up some Palladium and Cadmium into Plutonium!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.551.title: Guess its radioactive level from its name
divine_journey_2.quest.db.551.desc: Fuse up Molybdenium and Palladium into Radium!%n%nUse it quickly so it won't radiate away...!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.552.title: Routinely doing this now!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.552.desc: Break down some Radium into Ruthenium!%n%n...Phew, you used it quickly enough so it didn't radiate away!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.553.title: Thor's favorite element
divine_journey_2.quest.db.553.desc: Fuse up Ruthenium and Palladium into Thorium!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.554.title: The Road leads here...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.555.title: The next Ytter-ation
divine_journey_2.quest.db.555.desc: Fuse up some Ytterbium from Arsenic and Rubidium!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.556.title: Bro, mine it up! ...Or I mean fuse it up!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.556.desc: Break down some Ytterbium into Bromine!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.557.title: MELTDOWN
divine_journey_2.quest.db.557.desc: 1. Create some Liquid Bromine in the Liquifier.%n%n2. Also create some Molten Uranium from its elemental form in the Liquifier.%n%n3. Cast some Plutonium and Rhodium Ingots.%n%n4. Combine them in the Liquicrafter. I recommend replacing its Energy Input Hatch with a highest tier one, since this recipe requires 200,000 RF/tick. And watch out! This element is no longer in a safely contained flask.%n%nPick it up to complete the quest, but §cimmediately put it away into a container§f, otherwise really bad things will happen!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.558.title: Never before seen power
divine_journey_2.quest.db.558.desc: Craft the items listed to the right to set up a Draconic Reactor.%n%nMany people avoid using this awesome multiblock because of its known downside: It can go boom. Well, no longer. In this pack, I've decided to §6disable the Draconic Reactor explosion§r, so that more people would be interested in using this machine.%n%nI've also §6increased its power output by 500x§r, but §6increased its fuel usage by 10x§r as well.%n%nFor a detailed guide on how to construct the multiblock, check your Draconic Evolution Information Tablet -> Draconic Evolution -> Draconic Reactor section.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.559.title: A power of Chaos, compressed into a ball
divine_journey_2.quest.db.559.desc: Craft a Draconic Reactor Core! This is the central piece of the Draconic Reactor multiblock, but it's also used as a crafting ingredient.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.560.title: Stabilizing Chaos
divine_journey_2.quest.db.560.desc: Craft the required items for the Chaos Stabilization ritual listed to the right. You'll need to recraft the Awakened Draconium Blocks every time you perform the Ritual.%n%nOpen your Draconic Evolution Information Tablet, go to Draconic Additions -> Chaos Stabilizer to learn more. This multiblock allows you to stabilize the highest tier Armor and Omnitool, the Chaotic ones.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.561.title: Let Chaos ensue
divine_journey_2.quest.db.561.desc: Craft a full set of Chaotic Armor. They're an even better version of the Draconic Armor, with one catch, you'll need to stabilize them first.%n%n§c§lWARNING:§r Before you equip any of these armor pieces, you'll need to stabilize them. Read the Draconic Information Tablet -> Draconic Additions -> Chaos Stabilizer section on how to perform the Stabilization Ritual.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.562.title: It's pure Chaos
divine_journey_2.quest.db.562.desc: Craft a Chaotic Staff of Power.%n%n§c§lWARNING:§r Before you use this tool, you'll need to stabilize it. Read the Draconic Information Tablet -> Draconic Additions -> Chaos Stabilizer section on how to perform the Stabilization Ritual.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.563.title: Imagine if time passed faster...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.563.desc: Craft an Imaginary Time Block! This machine speeds up the tickrate of nearby blocks, making it ideal for a large crop farm. It just requires power and nothing else!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.564.title: The tools of AgriCraft
divine_journey_2.quest.db.564.desc: Craft a Seed Analyzer and place an Agricultural Journal inside to keep track of analyzed plants. You can use this machine to check your 10/10/10'ing progress for each Seed.%n%nThe Gardening Trowel is an easy way to move plants.%n%nThe Clipper is a very powerful tool that lets you duplicate Seeds. Though you could always just use more Crop Sticks to mutate more.

divine_journey_2.quest.db.567.title: 秘術的
divine_journey_2.quest.db.567.desc: 一些基本的秘術時代的種子.之後會取得更多,抓緊了.

divine_journey_2.quest.db.570.desc: 不,這不是正確的溫度.%n%n用來合成冰和雪.

divine_journey_2.quest.db.571.desc: 第1階種子!這不能種 - 只能當合成材料使用 - 製作產資源的種子會需要.%n%n之後你能取得更快且更多的產物和複製種子,直到你用煉金化學模組解鎖農業工藝模組,在這之前你只能用合成的來製作更多種子.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.572.title: 木製
divine_journey_2.quest.db.572.desc: (繞口令)%nHow much wood could a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood? As much wood as a woodchuck could chuck, if a woodchuck could chuck wood.%n%n用來合成原木,和自然精華結合能製作樹苗.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.573.title: 開花
divine_journey_2.quest.db.573.desc: 能進一步處理成所有原版的染料.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.574.title: 黑黑的
divine_journey_2.quest.db.575.title: §4火熱
divine_journey_2.quest.db.575.desc: 合成火和地獄種子!這讓你能和成許多重要的物品,包含沙!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.576.title: 現在是高畫質

divine_journey_2.quest.db.590.title: 合金種子

divine_journey_2.quest.db.592.desc: 終極注魔水晶能轉換每一階的精華,不會被破壞,也可以轉換精華塊製作精華,且能製作完美精華!%n%n提示: 設置合成機來將所有的精華都直接製作成究極精華塊,當你的系統需要的時候再向下轉換.

divine_journey_2.quest.db.597.title: §e注魔?

divine_journey_2.quest.db.601.title: 是時候停下你的凋零農場了!

divine_journey_2.quest.db.612.desc: 給我更多多多多多多!!%n%n%n現在我可以把合金爐給全全全全全全全全拆了,啊啊哈哈哈哈....!!%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n... 嗯.%n%n%n也不是全部啦,只有一些.%n%n總之,這不虧!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.613.title: 秘術錠
divine_journey_2.quest.db.613.desc: 升級種子,跟著順序做下去,絕對-只有-秘術-種子-不要-看-第三-個.記得一旦你用煉金化學解鎖農業工藝之後,就可以複製種子.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.614.title: 無模式
divine_journey_2.quest.db.614.desc: 這章有很多任務標題和任務敘述,這些種子真的沒有給我增加太多的工作,你知道嗎? 放過我吧,我盡力了. 比方說, 凋零骷髏種子,鈦種子,終界鋼種子,你能想到些什麼? 我知道可以以不同的方式重新安排它們, 或許把它們和'未分類'合在一起打散,但這會打亂'未分類'的主題,只需要第4階的種子,而'無模式'需要額外的1個 (或2個!) 種子來合成. 真的, 這個任務的名字就是個謊言, 因為我確定每件事情都有個模式. 注意到模式是重要的 - 它會告訴你事情是怎麼運作的. 也許不會,看狀況. 就像這裡的情況 - 有個模式, 但不能用它建構的東西來命名. 它不是一個夠實際的模式製作的. 一些模式還不足以影響世界. 但也許你永遠也不能確定某些事情的模式. 你對一些事實的感受可能會隨著時間改變, 當中的模式卻是不會改變的, 但感受不是真實的嗎? 你對模式的感受創造了模式嗎? 我們創造出為了滿足混亂宇宙下的社會結構模式,是為了安慰自己嗎? 所以或許這個任務的更好的名稱應該是 "無模式?"  但是,比起確定性的敘述,會吸引較少的注意力,就像"無模式." 如果人們相信注意力創造了被給予的注意力, 那麼吸引盡可能多的注意力就不符合創作者的利益嗎? 每個人被吸引注意, 這些運作方式是可複製的.%n所以產生了釣魚連結, 這是一種主要創造視覺刺激的藝術形式, 可以提高產品在潛在買家頭腦中的價值, 超出他們原本認知的價值. 釣魚連結通常被認為是對產品內容的扭曲, 但這是對這個術語的誤解. 舉例來說, 這個任務名稱具有誤導性, 但不是釣魚連結, 因為它不是經過設計的,且可能不會增加你對任務內部的評估. 釣魚連結可能會產生誤導, 但更常用於突出產品的最佳品質. 這種對釣魚連結的理解包括廣告, 儘管廣告經常引起對品牌的信仰價值, 而不僅限於簡單地增加它.%n這個概念的另一個觀點是迷因 - 通過模仿和傳播他人和行為或信息. 它最常用於在網路上分享的笑話, 但通過模仿和傳播的想法與人類一樣古老. 八卦和花邊故事是網路迷因的例子. 講述的故事因講述者而異, 但最成功的元素始終包含在其中. 角色有不同的名字或面孔, 人設可能會改變, 確切的動作會有所不, 但主題仍是相同的.%n迷因的創作和釣魚連結的產生雖然目的獨特, 但動作和目標相似: 讓人們把他們的注意力花在它上面, 使用參考和鉤子來增加參與度. 有些人這樣做是為了好玩, 當作一種嗜好, 當作一種創作. 其他人這樣做是為了賺錢, 讓你相信買入是賺到了. 你所知道的一切都會影響你的選擇. 現在你知道了. 這些知識會改變你的工作嗎? 你會知道它是否有嗎? 在這篇文章中, 我會...%n%n
divine_journey_2.quest.db.615.title: 未分類
divine_journey_2.quest.db.616.title: 陰森森的
divine_journey_2.quest.db.616.desc: 沒人喜歡地獄幽靈生怪磚,那太笨重了.所以,拿去吧.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.617.title: 樸實
divine_journey_2.quest.db.617.desc: 終於 - 全滿的魔力池.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.618.title: 從流星墜落.從地球生長.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.618.desc: 別這麼奶酪. 你不需要再用奶酪晶圓來合成了.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.619.title: 完美
divine_journey_2.quest.db.619.desc: 用§c終極注魔水晶§r合成完美精華.%n然後合成多一些.%n再多一些.%n再多再多.%n你會需要大量的完美精華為了RFTools Dimensions.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.620.title: Elevating the Elevatium creation
divine_journey_2.quest.db.620.desc: The first benefit of pretending to know how to use Infusion is to craft Elevatium Ingots with a higher yield! Change your Elevatium automation to be more efficient!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.621.title: Maximum Portage
divine_journey_2.quest.db.621.desc: Craft some EnderUtilities Portal Frames and 2 Portal Control Panels! These are the best Teleportation Devices you could get your hand on so far, as they do not require any power, and can send you to either another EnderUtilities Portal (with the Link Crystal (Portal)), or using any of the other 2 Link Crystals, you get also go to a some other Location or Block you specify (but you won't be able to return in that case).%n%nThey're very handy, and can be built vertically or horizontally, in any shape and size (within limits), as long as the Portal Frame blocks from a closed loop!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.622.title: Fr33 L00T!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.622.desc: Build the Mob Loot Fabricator Modular Machine structure! The quest doesn't ask for Bromine, but you'll need 8 Buckets of it.%n%nThis machine uses a bit of energy and mana to output a MASSIVE amount of useful mob loot. No longer will you need laggy Spawners!%n%nThe maintenance cost is also very low - it requires 2 units of Mana per tick, and since a Mana Pool can hold 1,000,000 units of Mana, you'll be able to use the machine for 25,000 seconds or almost 7 IRL hours on just 1 full Mana Pool. (The machine might eat up the first pool of Mana faster and store it in its internal buffer.)%n%nThe machine works on percentages, every 2 ticks it rolls a die for each and every single possible output, and if it lands on a certain number, it outputs the given mob loot. So technically it's possible to output ALL types of mob loots AT ONCE, although astronomically unlikely. But, because of this, §6you'll need a large output buffer§r. The machine can generate 73 unique items, so to avoid clutter, I recommend 3 Ludicrous Item Output Hatches (which you can craft now), or multiple smaller Output Hatches. §6There are 7 locations you can place Output Hatches on the machine, make sure their total capacity is at least §c73 slots§6 for the machine to function.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.623.title: Let the Lights Dim, Dim the Let Right
divine_journey_2.quest.db.623.desc: The Dimlet Workbench lets you break down and combine Dimlets into other ones.%n%nDo you want to find a dimension full of Molten Mithril oceans but no luck so far? Well, place down this machine, look for 'Molten Mithril' and check what it needs. Maybe you already have all the Dimlet parts that are needed for its construction. If not, explore more RFTools Dimensions and find more Dimlet containing buildings to loot.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.624.title: Dimension splitting... contained
divine_journey_2.quest.db.624.desc: It turns out that even though the previously made 'alloy' of sorts had some unforeseen properties, it's also pretty useful in some ways....%n%nThough this Machine Frame seems to require a lot of power... Better upgrade my Laser Focus power input to Ultimate tier.%n%nIt allows you to create seemingly 'randomized' dimensions...! The oceans can be made out of Molten Gold, the terrain could be filled with Diamond Block tentacles... You never know!%n%nWelcome to RFTools Dimensions!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.625.title: Creator of whole universes
divine_journey_2.quest.db.625.desc: Craft an Empty Dimension Tab!%n%nThis is the main and most important item of RFTools Dimensions, as this is where Dimensions are going to be stored. However, it's also simply used as a crafting ingredient.%n%nTo craft it, you'll have to make a Master Infusion Crystal and convert some Insanium into Perfectium. The Master Infusion Crystal has infinite durability and can convert any type of Essence into the next tier. I recommend setting up an external RFTools Crafter to convert to higher tier Essences.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.626.title: 紅石計畫(還有藍色和綠色)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.627.title: Train the Terrain to attain the Domain
divine_journey_2.quest.db.627.desc: Craft a Terrain Absorber. Similarly to the other Absorbers, place it down, and let it absorb the current Terrain type it's in. You might need to visit specific RFTools Dimensions to absorb the type of terrain you want.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.628.title: Spacetime-Splitting
divine_journey_2.quest.db.628.desc: Craft a Dimension Builder! This is the most powerful RFTools Dimensions machine. It lets you power up your Realized Dimension Tabs.%n%nFirst, Dimensions need to be created. Simply put it in the Dimension Builder and provide the machine with power to build the dimension. Then, while you want to visit the dimension, §cLEAVE THE DIMENSION TAB IN THE DIMENSION BUILDER§r to let it receive power.%n%nYou don't want to be in a dimension while it unpowers... it's not a very pleasant thing to put it lightly.%n%nDimension creation costs are up 20x from base, but the Dimension Builder can accept waaaay more power than default, and generating power shouldn't be an issue with an Extreme Reactor or a Draconic Reactor (or both!).
divine_journey_2.quest.db.629.title: D14L U9
divine_journey_2.quest.db.629.desc: Craft a Dialing Device! This machine lets you call up the Receiver that's automatically placed in the center of each created RFTools Dimension, and lets your Matter Transmitter know where to go.%n%nJust place it near your Transmitter / Receiver combo, and it'll work wirelessly.%n%nTo dial up a Dimension, select your destination from the list below. Press 'Dial' to constantly keep your nearby Transmitter provide a teleportation beam to the selected dimension, or (since this could be dangerous if the dimension unpowers and you accidentally saunter into the teleportation beam) you could press 'Dial Once' to only dial the dimension until you enter the beam. To interrupt the beam, simply press 'Interrupt'.%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nWe are lost in the internet.%nThis is our last chance to save humanity.%nJoin us. And end this war.%nRight here. Right now....%nDIAL UP!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.630.title: Faster than Lightspeed
divine_journey_2.quest.db.630.desc: Craft a Matter Booster! When placed next to a Transmitter, it makes it available to teleport to an unpowered Receiver without (or with less) unpleasant effects.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.631.title: Tell NASA about this before they send people to Mars!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.631.desc: The Destination Analyzer, when placed next to a Dialing Device, lets it check the status of a Receiver. This way you can be sure that a receiver has enough power or is not blocked before attempting to travel to it.%n%nYou can also place the Destination Analyzer next to a Transmitter. In that case, the Transmitter will show a red colored teleportation beam if there is something wrong on the receiving end. You can check the actual problem in the dialing device.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.632.title: In.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.632.desc: Craft a Matter Transmitter! This machine lets you teleport to an RFTools Dimension by calling it from a nearby Dialing Device. You'll need to power both of the machines.%n%nYou can name the Transmitter something like 'Home' or 'Base', and this name will show up wherever possible to let you know where to teleport from/to.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.633.title: Absorb, Compress, Create
divine_journey_2.quest.db.633.desc: Craft a Material Absorber! This block is used to create Material Dimlets. To use it, simply place it down, and place 128 of the desired block next to it. They will quickly be eaten up!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.634.title: Return from nothing!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.634.desc: The Advanced Charged Porter holds way more charge than the regular Charged Porter. Less refilling, yay!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.635.title: I wouldn't give a DIME for this... But I WOULD give a Dime-ond...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.635.desc: Craft an Infused Diamond! You might want to automate this going forward.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.636.title: Seems to be missing from Dimension C-132...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.636.desc: Dimensional Shard Ores spawn in any non-void RFTools Dimension from Y=2 to Y=64. Find some and mine up some!%n%nYou'll need a lot of these going forward, so set up a Quarry or Digital Miner in a (preferably pleasant) Dimension of your choice to mine some up.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.637.title: A wormhole!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.637.desc: Craft a Point to Point Dislocator. This is used as a crafting ingredient for the Advanced Dislocator, but it also has its own usage:%n%nYou first have to Right Click it to split it into a bound pair. You can use either Dislocator to teleport to the other. This works if the Bound Dislocator is in a Pedestal, portal, in a player's inventory or even on the ground as an item entity.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.638.title: Make sure to add Adam and Eve, and an apple...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.638.desc: The Dimension Enscriber is the machine that lets you choose what your custom RFTools Dimension is going to contain. Simply place an Empty Dimension Tab in the bottom left, and optionally place some Dimlets or other modifiers inside that let you change the aspects of the Dimension.%n%nAs your first Dimension I recommend leaving the large screen of slots alone, and simply create a random dimension. So just click on 'Store'.%n%nThis Empty Dimension Tab will then need to be placed into a Dimension Builder to create it.%n%nIf you want to recycle your Empty Dimension Tab, simply place it back into the Enscriber, then click 'Extract'.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.639.title: It's an Aura Sphere
divine_journey_2.quest.db.639.desc: The Phased Field Generator lets you enter unpowered RFTools Dimensions for 500 seconds, to perhaps recover something that you lost. Hopefully you'll never have to use this, but it's important to let you know that this is an option.%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nLucario's favorite move!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.640.title: The Enderest of Enderer Pearls
divine_journey_2.quest.db.640.desc: Craft an Infused Enderpearl! Automating this is in your best interest.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.641.title: Becoming Parcelus Piton
divine_journey_2.quest.db.641.desc: Are you flooding in materials? But still in need of more Dimlets? Craft some lootboxe... ahem, I mean Dimlet Parcels that could give you the Dimlet of your Dreams! (Or disappointment, you never know...)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.642.title: Playing universe golf
divine_journey_2.quest.db.642.desc: The Advanced Dislocator is the most OP teleportation item in the pack. To use it, first have some Ender Pearls in your inventory, and open its interface with a Right Click. Then Shift+Left Click the 'Add Fuel' button on the bottom right.%n%nThe 'Add New' button will add a teleport location to the list of locations. This will default to where you're standing, but can be changed. Click 'Commit' to add the new location. You can then click 'Rename' to change its name to something other than coordinates.%n%nYou can do this as many times as you want, in multiple different locations. From this point on, use Shift+Right Click to open the Advanced Dislocator, as Right Click will teleport you to the selected location.%n%nThis all works even cross-dimensionally. No more pesky Portals! We're OP now.%n
divine_journey_2.quest.db.643.title: Mind over matter
divine_journey_2.quest.db.643.desc: Craft a Bound Dislocator (Player). This is used as a crafting ingredient for the Advanced Dislocator, but it also has its own usage:%n%nRight Clicking this Dislocator will bind it to yourself. Another player or entity can then use that dislocator to teleport to your location as long as you are online.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.644.title: Infuse with Infused
divine_journey_2.quest.db.644.desc: Craft a Machine Infuser! Any RFTools or RFTools Dimensions machine can be placed inside this to give it a bonus (usually a speed increase) using Dimensional Shards. To read the exact infusion bonus of each machine, simply hold Shift while hovering over it.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.645.title: Out.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.645.desc: Craft an RFTools Receiver and a Charged Porter.%n%n§cBind the Charged Porter to the Receiver by Shift+Right Clicking on it.§r%n%nBy this point, you might have other ways to come back from the RFTools Dimension, but it's not a bad idea to emphasize it: You'll need a way back, and this combo allows you to do so.%n%nWhen you want to return, simply Right Click the Charged Porter and you'll appear on the Receiver you set the Charged Porter to.%n%nWhen you enter the RFTools Dimension, there will be a Receiver at your feet. If you name the Receiver, that name will show up in the Dialing Device.%n%nYou can also name your own Receiver something like 'Home' or 'Base', and this name will show up wherever possible to let you know where to teleport from/to.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.646.title: Floopsorb, Floopress, Flooprate
divine_journey_2.quest.db.646.desc: Craft a Liquid Absorber! This block is used to create Liquid Dimlets. To use it, simply place it down, and place 128 of the desired liquid (in source block form) next to it. They will quickly be swallowed up!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.647.title: Edit -> Insert -> Dimensional hyperscrope -> ...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.647.desc: You can craft a Dimension Editor to change already created dimensions by inserting various Dimlets. Though be aware that a Dimlet is lost after it's inserted in the Dimension Editor.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.648.title: An' anotha' one
divine_journey_2.quest.db.648.desc: Notice that if you create another random dimension by putting in no Dimlets into the Dimension Enscriber's main screen, then the new Dimension Tab will link back to the same dimension.%n%nTo avoid this, add Digit Dimlets to the creation screen. A different combination of Digits will always result in different Dimensions! You can craft the Digit (0) Dimlet, and craft the larger Digits from that.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.649.title: Gaia fights? Pwah, dimensions!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.649.desc: Craft a Liquid Stellar Alloy Dimlet and create a Dimension of Stellar Alloy oceans! Pump it up and make blocks upon blocks of it.%n%nNote that Gaia Spirits can be gotten from the Mob Loot Fabricator Modular Machine.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.650.title: Demon Hearts? Pwah, dimensions!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.650.desc: Craft a Liquid Mystic Dimlet and create a Dimension of Mystic oceans! Pump it up and make blocks upon blocks of it.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.651.title: Crafting chains? Pwah, dimensions!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.651.desc: Craft a Molten Starmetal Alloy Dimlet and create a Dimension of Molten Starmetal oceans! Pump it up and make boatloads of Starmetal.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.652.title: Essence tiering? Pwah, dimensions!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.652.desc: Craft a Supremium Block Dimlet or a Molten Supremium Dimlet and create a Dimension of Supermium Blocks or Molten Supremium oceans! Mine or pump it up for blocks upon blocks of it.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.653.title: 地下種植化學物品(有問題嗎?)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.653.desc: (小聲)!%n%n%n喂, 你!%n%n%n...%n%n%n對, 就你!%n%n%n...%n%n%n想要讓煉金化學更容易嗎...?%n%n%n...%n%n%n不, 當然是免費的且你不需要出賣你的靈魂.%n%n%n...%n%n%n相信我!%n%n%n...%n%n%n不要嗎?%n%n%n...%n%n%n好吧, 那就這樣囉...%n
