divine_journey_2.quest.db.655.title: 全數位
divine_journey_2.quest.db.655.desc: 現在有了恐懼水晶...你是相當強大的.你能選擇用它來開始發展血魔法,或做成最強大的採石場:數字型採礦機!%n%n若選擇後者,我來教你怎麼用:%n%n在它的介面中會找到'配置'的按鈕,讓你能指定:%n%n- 半徑範圍最大32格,%n- 你想挖掘的Y軸位置.%n- 要挖什麼 (需要設定過濾器).
divine_journey_2.quest.db.656.title: 捕捉太陽之力
divine_journey_2.quest.db.656.desc: 不需要再去金星了! 我們會現場直播!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.657.title: A new continent?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.657.desc: Discover Europe (-ium) by traveling across the Atlanti-- I mean dissolving some Dimensional Shards!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.658.title: BREAKDOWN
divine_journey_2.quest.db.658.desc: The elements seem to be moving WILDLY inside the Highly Radioactive Dimension-Splitting Compound! Break it down into its (new) elements!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.659.title: Where are the other countries though?!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.659.desc: It's quite an amusing accident that half of the atomic number of Europium is (almost) exactly the atomic number of Germanium...!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.660.title: Epic Rap Battles!! -ium
divine_journey_2.quest.db.660.desc: Hopefully you found a good source of Molten Stellar Alloy. You'll need a lot!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.661.title: Don't tell ur ium about this
divine_journey_2.quest.db.661.desc: Break down some Rutherfordium into Tellurium!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.662.title: Permutation, Variation, Combination!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.662.desc: Your greatest feat so far! You managed to find a way to combine Erbium, Gallium, Tellurium, Polyvinyl Chloride & Diammonium Phosphate into a stable compound...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.663.title: Never stop combining!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.663.desc: Combine Neptunium, Germanium, Butane and Amide and see what it turns into...!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.664.title: Spelling Bee Nightmares
divine_journey_2.quest.db.664.desc: This compound has never before been created... %n%n%n%nIt has such a beautiful pinkish tint.... %n%n%n%nAnd...%n%n%nAnd, wait...%n%n%n???%n%n%nNo, that can't be.%n%n%nThat would make alchemical transmutations way too simple....%n%n%n%n%n...%n%n%n%n%nWHAT%n%nHAVE%n%nI%n%nCREATED?!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.665.title: It solidifies when poured out...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.665.desc: And it forms a Crystal structure... very peculiar.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.666.title: Oh the NCC won't let me be
divine_journey_2.quest.db.666.desc: Neodymit Calcium Carbonate. What did you think it was?%n%n%nAnyway.%n%n%nBreak down some Covalence Dust. And break it down further into Neodymium.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.667.title: Dust to Dust to Dust
divine_journey_2.quest.db.667.desc: Create a Dusty Thermal Singularity by combining other Singularities, and craft your first batch of Low Covalence Dust!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.668.title: Forging Crystal and Soul
divine_journey_2.quest.db.668.desc: When forging G.E.R.C. Crystals with Souls I got from a while back, I can make a rigid yet vibrant and magical structure. It pulsates with power, like it's ready to turn the world upside down.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.669.title: Boom Boom Pow
divine_journey_2.quest.db.669.desc: I like that Boom Boom Pow%nThem essence flying to 'sky%nIt's tryna blow up and fly%nI'm gonna stop it now!%n%nI'm making coffee and cake%nThis is just blowin' all day%nIt's got that Boom Boom Boom%nKeeps going Boom Boom Boom%nLet me get it now%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nI'm so 3008, you're so 200-late! (Huh, destroyed!)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.670.title: Discovering the new contine- I mean element
divine_journey_2.quest.db.670.desc: Break down Red Matter to obtain Americium!%n%nWith all your powers combined, craft a Neutronium Compressor!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.671.title: The Real EMC
divine_journey_2.quest.db.671.desc: Obtain Red Matter from your Transmutation Tablet by feeding at least 16,777,216 (a.k.a. 2^24) EMC into it.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.672.title: Bluer Blue Blur
divine_journey_2.quest.db.672.desc: Upgrade Medium Covalence Dust, an Alchemical Singularity and Dark Matter into High Covalence Dust!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.673.title: Sky Blue
divine_journey_2.quest.db.673.desc: Combine all the EnderIO Endergy Singularities into one, and craft some Medium Covalence Dust!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.674.title: It's fun to stay at the EMC-A!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.674.desc: Place the Tome of Knowledge inside the Transmutation Tablet by Shift+Left Clicking on it! The Tablet will display "Learned". Then put in any item that has an EMC value. All items that can be created out of that amount of EMC will show up.%n%nThe best material to use are Void Metal Ingots. Due to how expensive they are with their original creation method, they contain a LOT of EMC. However there are Seeds for it, so you can pretty much get all of it for free.%n%nProjectE is mainly used to replace your laggy crop farms, spawners and quarries that you might still have laying around, and only have potentially one farm active (the Void Metal crop farm), so your game doesn't lag out as much. Later you'll be able to generate EMC directly from light, so you might not even need this single crop farm!%n%nDark Matter takes a little over 1 million EMC (2^20 EMC, to be precise) to create, which you can get from only 40 pieces of Void Metal Ingots. Create some!%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nIt's fun to stay at the EMC-A!%nIt's fun to stay at the EMC-A!%n%nThey have everything for you men to enjoy%nYou can hang out with all the boys%n%nIt's fun to stay at the EMC-A!%nIt's fun to stay at the EMC-A!%n%nYou can get yourself clean, you can have a good meal%nYou can have all the resources you need
divine_journey_2.quest.db.675.title: Krypton-currencies
divine_journey_2.quest.db.675.desc: Break down Hafnium into Krypton and make some Krypton Lights!%n%n%nAnd just to be safe, don't let Superman touch these.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.676.title: Half - nium, half Hafnium
divine_journey_2.quest.db.676.desc: Create Hafnium Sulfate from High Covalence Dust or Dark Matter. Since you can EMC Dark Matter, it's probably the better option.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.677.title: No more problEMC
divine_journey_2.quest.db.677.desc: Craft an Energy Collector MK2! This machine can generate a passive maximum of 12 EMC per second up to a maximum of 30,000 EMC at a light level of 15.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.678.title: How to avoid an EMCistential crisis
divine_journey_2.quest.db.678.desc: Craft an Energy Collector MK1 to convert light directly into EMC! It passively generates 4 EMC every 1 second up to a maximum of 10,000 EMC depending on the highest light level. When placed adjacent to an Energy Condenser or an Anti-Matter Relay MK it will transfer the EMC into that machine.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.679.title: Read 'n learn, child!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.679.desc: Combine some Alchemistry Singularities into Alchemical Singularities, then make a Tome of Knowledge.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.680.title: All to Gold
divine_journey_2.quest.db.680.desc: Make some Techy Singularities by combining all the Tech-based Singularities!%n%nThen craft the Transmutation Tablet!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.681.title: Matter breakdown
divine_journey_2.quest.db.681.desc: Break down Dark Matter into Radon and Polonium!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.682.title: I'm sure it'll fit
divine_journey_2.quest.db.682.desc: Craft an Energy Condenser! This machine can:%n%n- Convert any items placed into its inventory into EMC, which is then stored in the internal buffer.%n%n- Receive EMC from an adjacent Energy Collector or Anti-Matter Relay.%n%n- Use EMC energy from its internal buffer to create the specified item.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.683.title: It's just a fancy Chest.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.683.desc: Obtain some Neptunium from Highly-Radioactive Dimension-Splitting Compounds.%n%nThen use your most precious materials to craft your first Alchemical Chest! This is the base crafting ingredient for all the automatic EMC converting Condensers.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.684.title: Disperse - ium into Dysprosium
divine_journey_2.quest.db.684.desc: Break down some Medium Covalence Dust into Dysprosium!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.685.title: negordyH
divine_journey_2.quest.db.685.desc: !negordyH itnA etearc ot epicer noisuF kaeW raluger a esU

divine_journey_2.quest.db.686.desc: !nortcelE itnA na dna notorP itnA na otni meht nrut ot nortcelE na dna notorP a no rettamitnA diuqiL emos ruoP
divine_journey_2.quest.db.687.title: Everything that Matters
divine_journey_2.quest.db.687.desc: Polonium gets converted into Molybdenum in the Fission Multiblock. But when used in Weak Fusion, it can help a single Hydrogen atom break down into a Proton and an Electron!%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nThis is definitely how they do it at CERN, trust me on this, no need to look it up.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.688.title: Setup the SystEMC
divine_journey_2.quest.db.688.desc: Craft an Energy Collector MK3! In strong lighting, or if placed in the Nether, it will generate a passive 40 EMC per second up to a maximum of 60,000 EMC.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.689.title: Corruption
divine_journey_2.quest.db.689.desc: Transform an Awakened Draconium Block in the world into a Corrupted Draconium Block using your Philosopher's Stone.%n%nOnce you make a second Philosopher's Stone, setup automation for this using Block Placers and Breakers, Annihilation and Formation Planes, or World Block Importers and Exporters; and a Mechanical User or Player Simulator.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.690.title: Fullmetal
divine_journey_2.quest.db.690.desc: Break down Radon further into Technetium and convert it to a 'Fullmetal' form!%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nYeah, weak reference, I know.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.691.title: Lightspeed, squared
divine_journey_2.quest.db.691.desc: Upgrade your Anti-Matter Relay all the way to MK3! When transferring, it gives a 10 EMC per second bonus, making it really viable in a power-flower setup. It can transfer up to 640 EMC/s and can store up to 10,000,000 EMC.%n%nA power-flower setup consists of an Energy Condenser MK2 in the center, Anti-Matter Relays on 5 sides except the top (so it can still be accessed), Energy Collectors around the whole thing, and Glowstone around them.%n%nThis will produce and provide EMC for the central Energy Condenser to create any item you specify out of just light! Wonderful.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.692.title: How to square your resources
divine_journey_2.quest.db.692.desc: Upgrade your Anti-Matter Relay into a MK2 variant! When transferring, it gives a 3 EMC per second bonus, and it can transfer up to 192 EMC/s and can store up to 1,000,000 EMC.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.693.title: Don't cool it. Let it heat!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.693.desc: Craft a Fission Catalyst! Use this instead of a Fission Coolant to create some... unexpected results.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.694.title: Make sure to grow antigravity hands
divine_journey_2.quest.db.694.desc: 100 Anti Hydrogen goes into an Antimatter Cluster... Let it flow because otherwise if it touches regular matter...%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nIt goes boom.%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n* It doesn't really go boom, this is just flavor text. Don't worry.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.695.title: E[MC] = [E]MC^2
divine_journey_2.quest.db.695.desc: Craft an Anti-Matter Relay MK1. This machine serves two functions. Firstly, any item placed into its inventory will be converted into EMC. Secondly, it transfers energy from Energy Collectors to Energy Condensers.%n%nWhen transferring, it gives a small, 1 EMC per second bonus. It is also used to charge the Klein Star series with EMC.%n%nIt can transfer up to 64 EMC/s and can store up to 100,000 EMC.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.696.title: STUFF IT ALL IN
divine_journey_2.quest.db.696.desc: The Energy Condenser MK2 is an upgraded version of the Energy Condenser. In addition to being substantially faster than the Energy Condenser, the MK2 also has a separate inventory for output. Items can only be extracted from the output side, and inputed on the input side.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.697.title: Philosophy
divine_journey_2.quest.db.697.desc: Create all the 5 listed combined Singularities, and combine them yet again into a Magical Singularity!%n%nCreate some Celestial Crystal Cores, made with Celestial Crystals this time that have a size of at least 700 and a purity of at least 75%. You should automate this the same way you did Rock Crystals. Remember to create a Celestial Crystal you only need a Rock Crystal and a Stardust thrown into Liquid Starlight. Wait for the Crystal to grow, and break it.%n%nHowever the automation goes the exact same way, since Celestial Crystals can also split. Direwolf20's video titled "Enigmatica 2 Ep88 Dynamics Crystal Growth Pt2" (link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8F3K8sSN3aM )  is still an amazing source of information on how to do this automation.%n%nFinally once you're done with the prerequisites, craft a Philosopher's Stone.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.698.title: BREACH! BREACH!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.698.desc: TNT can also be compressed. Yup. This is a regular Minecraft Expert pack, what did you expect? That it COULDN'T be compressed into a Singularity?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.699.title: But in the end it doesn't even Matter
divine_journey_2.quest.db.699.desc: Charge it up with the ProjectE Charge key, which defaults to 'V', and destroy all the Matter! It doesn't even Matter!%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nI TRIED SO HARD AND GOT SO FAR!%nBUT IN THE END IT DOESN'T EVEN MATTER!%nI HAD TO FALL TO LOSE IT ALLLL!%nBUT IN THE END IT DOESN'T EVEN MATTER-ER-eeer!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.700.title: WayOfTime's inspiration
divine_journey_2.quest.db.700.desc: Create all the Red Matter Tools listed to the right!%n%nYou can charge any of these tools with the ProjectE Charge key, which defaults to 'V', for a special effect:%n%n- The Red Matter Pickaxe will also break up to 32 ore blocks of the same type with a Right Click. If it is used on a block that is not an Ore, it will scan the area for an ore, and use its ability on the nearest one.%n%n- The Red Matter Shovel will dig a larger area, proportional to its charge level. It requires EMC supplied from a Klein Star or Alchemical Fuel.%n%n- The Red Matter Hammer will destroy blocks in a larger area, but it can only be used on Stone-like blocks. It requires EMC from a Klein Star, or Alchemical Fuel to function.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.701.title: The Ethics of Pacifism
divine_journey_2.quest.db.701.desc: Create all the Red Matter Tools listed on the right!%n%nYou can charge any of these tools with the ProjectE Charge key, which defaults to 'V', for a special effect:%n%n- The Red Matter Sword will cast an Area of Effect attack and consume Glowstone Dust from the player's inventory.%n%n- The Red Matter Axe will break all wood in a range proportional to its charge level and consume Redstone Dust from the player's inventory.%n%n- The Red Matter Hoe will till a larger area.%n%n- The Red Matter Shears will make Sheep that are sheared drop about 8 wool, rather than 1-3. Unfortunately this will also deal damage to the Sheep. However it will also rarely clone the Sheep! It can also be used near trees, which will drop all Leaf blocks in the area.%n%n%n%n
divine_journey_2.quest.db.702.title: Feel the Power
divine_journey_2.quest.db.702.desc: Craft the two omnitools from Project E!%n%nThe Red Katar combines the Red Matter Sword, Hoe, Axe, and Shears. As its charge level goes up, its speed will also go up. It will also increase the effectiveness of all its abilities, such as its damage and area of effect. It can shear Sheep and Mooshrooms, and has a chance to clone them. Using the tool with the use key will also break all Wood and Leaf blocks in the area. Using it on Grass will till all land in its area.%n%nReleasing the charge key will kill all mobs in the area. It will kill all spawn groups of Zombie Pigmen in the Nether. Whether it kills all mobs or simply all aggressive mobs is dependent on the mode the Katar is in.%n%nThe Red Morning Star combines the Red Matter Hammer, Pickaxe, and Shovel. It can also break wood type blocks, but does not allow for the wood-base abilities that the Red Matter Axe does. When used, it can dig out a large cubic area of Stone-like blocks or a large flat area of Dirt-like blocks proportional to its charge level.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.703.title: The Blade of the Law
divine_journey_2.quest.db.703.desc: The Kikoku.%n%nThe Blade of the Law.%n%nA cursed blade.%n%nIt has infinite durability.%n%nIt can even hurt players in Creative mode.%n%nIt pierces armor.%n%nIt can be enchanted with any Enchantment up to twice the normal level cap, and combining Enchantments on it in an Anvil will add the existing level and the new level together. You no longer need two Sharpness III's for a Sharpness IV. You'll only need a Sharpness III and a Sharpness I.%n%nOP?%n%nYes.%n%nWell deserved?%n%nDefinitely.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.704.title: And nothing else Matters
divine_journey_2.quest.db.704.desc: Obtain White Matter from your Transmutation Tablet by feeding at least 268,435,456 (a.k.a. 2^28) EMC into it.%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%n%nSo close, no matter how faaaar%nCouldn't be much more from the heaaaart%nForever trusting who we aaaare%nAnd nothing else matteeeeers%n%nNever opened myself this waaaay%nLife is ours, we live it our waaaaay%nAll these words, I don't just saaaaay%nAnd nothing else matteeeeers
divine_journey_2.quest.db.705.title: It's a Matter of Time
divine_journey_2.quest.db.705.desc: The Watch of Flowing Time is a really powerful item that can speed up the tick rate of nearby blocks. Press the ProjectE Charge key, which defaults to 'V', to charge it up, and while it's in your hotbar, it will speed up the passing of the day.%n%nIt has two modes, too - speeding up or reversing the day! Right Click to toggle between "Off", "Fast-Forward" and "Rewind" modes.%n%nMore importantly, while placed in an activated Dark Matter Pedestal it will increase the tick rate by +18 for all blocks within a 4 block radius! The pedestal is activated by Right Clickng it with an open hand.%nIf you're playing on a server, don't be surprised if it's disabled because of this...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.706.title: Take my Breath Away
divine_journey_2.quest.db.706.desc: The Dark Realm is the perfect location to create Anti Air... That's right! Air, completely made out of antimatter particles like Anti Nitrogen, Anti Oxygen, Anti Carbon and Anti Dioxide...! ...wait. That's how it works right?%n%n%nAnyways! Make some!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.707.title: Lobbying Hub
divine_journey_2.quest.db.707.desc: Welcome to the Creative stage! To begin, you should semi-automate or fully automate Death Protection Poppets, if you haven't done so yet. Then craft a couple Corruption Cores! Eventually you'll need more, but 2 will suffice for now.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.708.title: Ruin Haunters
divine_journey_2.quest.db.709.title: Bookworm's Paradise
divine_journey_2.quest.db.709.desc: Ever wondered what Rainbows taste like?%n%n%nVery sweet! It grants you ultimate creativity! You could write a couple of Books about it...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.710.title: Dankest of Nulls
divine_journey_2.quest.db.710.desc: Craft a /dank/null/Creative! It has infinite storage! Yay!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.711.title: Tinkering Extreme
divine_journey_2.quest.db.711.desc: Craft some Creative Modifiers! With these, you can add any number of additional modifiers to your Tinkers' Tools!%n%nThey're also used quite heavily in this Chapter. Make 4 for now, but you'll need to make more later.%n%nNote that you can make Golden Furies out of EMC.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.712.title: Proactive
divine_journey_2.quest.db.712.desc: Dissolve some White Matter into Protanicium...%n%n%n%n%nI swear this is one of the last times you'll have to do this!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.713.title: Infinite Items*
divine_journey_2.quest.db.713.desc: *as long as you can fill your Drawer.%n%n%nThis upgrade creates a wormhole inside of your Drawer so you can fill it to the brim with any item you wish!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.714.title: We can go BIGGER!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.714.desc: The pure ESSENCE of Enlarging things... As you reach for it, and grab it, you feel its effect on your own hands... The atoms inside are getting farther and farther away from each other... Better not hold it for too long.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.715.title: Screen Scramble
divine_journey_2.quest.db.715.desc: Craft some Creative Screens! They don't need to be powered by Screen Controllers!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.716.title: Milling for Millions
divine_journey_2.quest.db.716.desc: GP? Huh, more like gee, I've got infinite, P!%n%n%n...%n%n%nWell, it's not truly infinite, but it's a lot. Have at it!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.717.title: Scarecrow's Dream
divine_journey_2.quest.db.717.desc: Question! What do you get if you compress some Condensed Victus Vis Crystals even further!%n%na) A black hole.%nb) New life!%nc) A big red heart.%n%nYeah, you know the answer, don'cha.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.718.title: Gone Vegan
divine_journey_2.quest.db.718.desc: Do you wanna cast some spells? Well I know just the tool for you! The Creative Component Pouch contains infinite amounts of all Roots herbs! (Incredible!)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.719.title: Making a Murder
divine_journey_2.quest.db.719.desc: But I thought a cross was made out of wood, not Vis Crystals...!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.720.title: Inoculation
divine_journey_2.quest.db.720.desc: Craft a Creative Medicine Bag to set any Totem effect you wish! (Or, you know, just use an Environmental Controller and use this in the next creative item!)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.721.title: Insta-start
divine_journey_2.quest.db.721.desc: Do you wanna relive your dreams and perform more Totemic ceremonies? Do you wanna do it for free?!?%n%nNo?%n%nWeelllll, then just use this in the next creative item.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.722.title: The Cycle
divine_journey_2.quest.db.723.title: Moving Day
divine_journey_2.quest.db.723.desc: Stuff 100 Cardboard Boxes into each other! I'm sure they'll fit.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.724.title: Absolute Zero
divine_journey_2.quest.db.724.desc: Combining some Air and Anti Air makes a Perfect Vacuum... you just need some additional catalysts...%n%nAccording to the Third Law of Thermodynamics, a Perfect Vacuum would also be Absolute Zero.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.725.title: Catching the Hawking Radiation of Supramolecular Black Holes
divine_journey_2.quest.db.725.desc: Craft an Ultimate Singularity by combining all Singularities you could make so far! Break it down into Ultimate Ingots, and use them to craft your first Neutron Collector!%n%nWhen this machine is placed down, it will collect Piles of Neutrons at a rate of 7111 ticks per Pile (which is about 355 seconds, or almost 6 minutes).%n%nHowever it can be sped up by a lot. If you hold 9 Watches of Flowing time (all of them activated with Shift+V), stand next to the machine, it'll generate 1 Pile of Neutrons about every 6 seconds. You can also use Watches of Flowing Time on Dark Matter Pedestals near the collector. Don't forget to activate the Pedestals by Right Clicking on them! You'll hear a sound when they're activated.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.726.title: Life's an Open Door
divine_journey_2.quest.db.726.desc: Build 1000 Oak Doors on top of each other!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.727.title: Space out
divine_journey_2.quest.db.727.desc: The Elfs like to trade spacious things for their own space. Makes sense? Makes sense!%n%n§cNote:§f You'll need to use this item to create Liquid Space. You are meant to turn it into an §cinfinite source§f with a Mekanism Creative Fluid Tank or a  Creative Reservoir!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.728.title: The energy of a Neutron Star
divine_journey_2.quest.db.728.desc: Use Watches of Flowing Time (either in your hotbar, activated by Shift+V, or in Dark Matter Pedestals + Right Click to activate them) to speed up the creation of Neutronium. Craft Neutronium Ingots and use them to create more Neutron Collectors!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.729.title: Seedularity
divine_journey_2.quest.db.729.desc: Once you obtain at least 8 Neutronium Blocks, you can craft a Neutronium Seed. Along with the Neutronium Crux, you can now get infinite amounts of Neutronium from Dirt! (Or from sunlight and water... you know what I mean!)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.730.title: Something Cheesy
divine_journey_2.quest.db.730.desc: Craft some yummy Cosmic Neutronium food!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.731.title: Imagine all the people
divine_journey_2.quest.db.732.title: OCD
divine_journey_2.quest.db.733.title: Founded by DivineRPG
divine_journey_2.quest.db.733.desc: Craft 4 Essences of Foundation! You can use any DivineRPG Statues in the center row (you can even mix and match them).
divine_journey_2.quest.db.734.title: Forget it
divine_journey_2.quest.db.734.desc: Craft an Essence of Thought in the Liquicrafter! Remember that you can simply use EMC to get Knowledge of the Sky's!%n%nTo input 64,000 mB of Essence of Knowledge into the Liquicrafter, you'll need to upgrade both of the Fluid Input Hatches to the highest tier!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.735.title: Logical
divine_journey_2.quest.db.735.desc: Craft all the ingredients shown on the right and solve the logic puzzle described in the Book of Logic in order to craft the Essence of Logic!%n%nEach character shown (Steve, Alex & Herobrine) has 3 attributes: Age, Number of friends, Height (in cm). Your job is to find out all of these values! To do so, read all the statements in the Book of Logic. There are 9 statements and 9 attributes to figure out. They can be determined uniquely.%n%nOnce you're confident you know some or all the values, it's time to craft! Use a character (Steve, Alex or Herobrine), a Modifier (Age, Friends or Height), and an additional Modifier (+1, -1, +10, -10, +100, -100, +1000 or -1000). They can all be crafted, check them in JEI by searching for '@content modifier'.%n%nExample: Crafting Steve, a Height modifier and +10 together increases Steve's Height by 10.%n%nAll the values you need to figure out are positive whole numbers. Good luck!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.736.title: Too Many Wrinkles
divine_journey_2.quest.db.736.desc: Once you think you have correctly figured out all the attributes of Steve, Alex & Herobine, craft them together (shapelessly) with an Essence of Thought to create the Essence of Logic!%n%nYou deserve it. Good job!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.737.title: Batteries
divine_journey_2.quest.db.738.title: The end of a crafting chain
divine_journey_2.quest.db.739.title: I'll cell-dom need power now!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.739.desc: Craft your first Creative Powercell! Now, it DOES say "Creative" on the tin, buuuuut it actually only generates 20,000 RF/tick. It's a bit of a ripoff if I do say so myself.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.740.title: Integrating energy over time
divine_journey_2.quest.db.740.desc: Upgrading further, we get to the Integrated Dynamics Creative Energy Battery. While not very useful, it lets you get closer to the REAL good stuff.%n%n§6Note:§r Energy Batteries used in the recipe have to be EMPTY.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.741.title: Extremely automatable
divine_journey_2.quest.db.741.desc: Craft an Auto Extreme Crafting Table! This lets you automate Extreme Crafting. You won't even need an Automation Interface! Simply set up the recipe and push all the items into the left inventory, and pull out the results!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.742.title: Breathe in. Hold. Breathe out.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.742.desc: We don't know where the Oxygen's coming from. We believe it's a wormhole inside the tank. But we don't care. As long as it keeps us alive! ... Hopefully.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.743.title: Quasi Quantum Supercomputer Singularity
divine_journey_2.quest.db.743.desc: Upgrading your Creative Powercell with some microchips lets you generate 100,000 RF/tick. Better, but still not very "Creative".
divine_journey_2.quest.db.744.title: Incapacitate
divine_journey_2.quest.db.744.desc: Cluster your Capacitor, capacitate your Cluster, and have a Creative Cell that outputs 500,000 RF/tick!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.745.title: 注法台
divine_journey_2.quest.db.745.desc: 合成注法台!%n%n這是用來調整法杖內咒術的能力.把咒術放入法杖,參考法杖的任務指示.%n%n注法台需放在世界中使用:將法杖放入注法台,用小刀右鍵.會打開一個介面,這就是有趣的地方了.%n每個咒術欄都能點擊,會打開另一個介面.每個咒術有多達11種不同的升級,可使咒術有巨大的變化.要啟動一個升級,在欄位中簡單的放入各自的材料就能解鎖,點擊一下就能啟動.%n未解鎖的升級可在任何時候按下"打開咒術庫"快捷鍵啟用或停用.另外,解鎖的升級是全面性的,你的每個法杖都會跟著解鎖.%n%n每個邊框的顏色代表了一些訊息:%n§e黃色:尚未解鎖%n§4紅色:已解鎖,但未啟用%n§2綠色:已解鎖並啟用%n§d紫色:已解鎖,但與其它啟動的升級產生衝突%n
divine_journey_2.quest.db.746.title: Feel the POWER
divine_journey_2.quest.db.746.desc: Craft a Draconic Evolution Creative Flux Capacitor!%n%nIt can charge the items in your inventory with a rate of 1,073,000 RF/tick!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.747.title: Electric Spine
divine_journey_2.quest.db.747.desc: Craft a Creative Fluxpack! It contains infinite power but has an output rate of only 50,000 RF/tick. Not too shabby either way.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.748.title: Blastoff!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.748.desc: This is a Jetpack with infinite power storage. I know, what a wonderful addition to your arsenal after you already have an Angel Ring. But it seems it's required as an ingredient for something bigger...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.749.title: Flexing your Fluxing
divine_journey_2.quest.db.749.desc: The Creative Flux Capacitor lets you infinitely charge your items and has an output rate of 250,000 RF/tick! Now that's what I'm talking about!%n%n§6Note 1:§r Flux Capacitors used in the recipe have to be EMPTY.%n%n§6Note 2:§r Thermal Flux Capacitors act a bit strange, so this quest actually has 2 Tasks, with differing Capacitor NBT values, only one of which is needed for completion. (You'll have to deactivate your Capacitor though for it to work.) Even if you see the text on the right saying it's "Incomplete" but you can claim the rewards, then you have successfully completed the quest.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.750.title: Digital Power
divine_journey_2.quest.db.750.desc: From this point on, all the Creative Energy Cells have "infinite" or "near-infinite" output rates. However the first few that are available can only be used to power specific things. This one for example can power your ME System, no matter how large it is!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.751.title: Zeus in a box
divine_journey_2.quest.db.751.desc: Power your LightningCraft machines creatively! Or, you know, craft it into the next thing which lets you power anything creatively...!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.752.title: {power = ∞}
divine_journey_2.quest.db.752.desc: Now we finally get to true infinite power!%n%n§cWARNING:§r Before you craft one of your infinite-output Energy Cells further, you'll need to use one for its infinite energy capabilities! Plug this or the following couple of machines into your Draconic Fusion Crafting setup, use Cryo-Stabilized Fluxducts to transfer energy limitlessly, and use this energy to craft the upcoming Essence of Inversion!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.753.title: Backwards
divine_journey_2.quest.db.753.desc: It takes a lot of power to be able to invert anything. But infinity is still larger than 24 trillion! Plug in one of your Creative Energy Cells (at least the Immersive tier one), and power the Infusion almost instantly!%n%nYou should only ever need one Essence of Inversion, so feel free to craft the Creative Energy Cells further!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.754.title: Devil's Advocate
divine_journey_2.quest.db.754.desc: Used to "reshape reality" by remaking the pillars of creation in our image.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.755.title: Tear down the Pillars of Creation
divine_journey_2.quest.db.755.desc: Your quest is to destroy the pillars of creation with a Red Morningstar. This is what Greek Gods have built up over the millenia, and it really is the greatest goal of all. §lU§rp on the pantheon you can still see them stand. Its other ability and the wa§ly§r it's capable of such destruction is to stop the sun's rays during the day (called an "enid" in ancient Greece). You can have up to three of these at the same time (hence "daylight") or you can shoot an object and throw it towards the sun. The red sun rises from the earth when it comes across the Moon before it blows up into the stars (a sign of a great Sun), so to speak. If you're a scientist, it's probably a no-brainer to use a red moon to see it's effect immediately. You can get some good information about this in a few different papers of mine. But what if all the red suns of creation are created from a yellow sky? That's what I will talk about next, so let's get started first: A red moon creates a lot of energy, but most of it is simply light energy. For example, you will see the sun rise from the earth before it breaks up into stars to get our attention here. It seems to me that if you are in the early evening sun, that is what you will see. However, when it was just the usual nighttime sunrise, it would appear with only the red or white moon shining on it. Now, all we have to do is to imagine everything is going to be bright no matter what we were doing. Let's see how simple it is. Let's create an object with 0 light-years and 0 red/white lights. Then, imagine we were doing something involving no material. At a certain point of time, that object will start spinning up and around. Since ever§ly§rthing is done in a specific time frame, where is the source of energy in the object? The answer here will certainly come from a certain type of physical description of physics, but a "physical description" will make it easy to see. In general, the red sun and the blue moon are more active than the white moon and are closer to the sun. Both seem to be more active. Let's assume an object where some hot air and a cold atmosphere are present. When you look for a planet in the region of Enceladus, you look for a body with a very small surface. If you find a small planet in orbit of the sun, this will cause your planet to orbit around the large surface so it will probably be a very big body with very hot, dense dust. However, if the planet lies in any lower mass than the surface, a faint reddish glow will appear. This reddish glow is a reflection of the planet and an echo of the red sun. Notice that if you look at the surface of a red sun, it is really an echo of the red sun. You can find in Enceladus a body with a very small surface, and this planet will be as big and bright in the bright sunlight as it is in the red sun. Assuming this p§ll§ranet can be interpreted as the "red moon", we already have a hint on what it means to "call for the help of the red moon" to cause ultimate destruction. Secondly, let's focus on the exact execution of the destruction of the pillars of creation. In his book, "The Creation of Heaven", Albert Einstein says that the entire earth appears to be a fire that burns slowly to death. However, his book explicitly shows that this fire is not, in fact, the "burning of entire heavens". Although the concept of fire has been proposed at least once before, the existence of the flame is the only explanation for the mysterious fire. §lA§rs Einstein says, the idea of having a flame burning on top of a pillar does not seem to apply to the entire world (just how close it should be to an actual burning pillar would be difficult to explain). After all, all the sun, moon, planets, and even sunspots in the solar system have their "burning cores" on either side of the pillars or the pillars are the only visible forms of the burning flame as they are just visible. While Einstein clearly acknowledges this, the explanation he gives is a complete lie. In fact, he says that light shines at an angle of one-half of a degree to one-to-two thirds of a degree, and that such light is simply an idea invented to justify the existence of the golden flames at the very top of the pillars. The light of a single-colored flame could not have created the idea. And then Einstein began to say that the whole idea of the Great Fire Theory and the golden flame at the level of the pillars as an idea, no matter his technical difficulty, may well be an idea invented by two different philosophers, namely the German §lS§rchiller and von Humboldt. While all these ideas are merely speculation and conjecture, each of them is true in its own way. And what has come into those two ideas is simply their own reflections on one another. What these two ideas say about the structure of the universe gives more significance than any other possibility that may be explained in the next section. But what if there is more to be said? There is. For, the very first impression that you give to your child as an object of interest is that it is a "great fire fire", a great flame that has a very bright and strong flame, and "not in a good way". The Essence of Breaking. We could have all discovered by accident, even as a little child, and that's exactly what Einstein did. Through sheer luck or knowledge, we may never know, but this is the way he managed to gather the energy required to destroy reality itself and break the pillars of creation. "But we still live in this reality, right?", you may ask. Wrong! Einstein recreated this dimension by splitting and copying one that's only about 4-5 quadrillion strings, or approximately 10^-18 cm away in one of the unreachable directions of the four-spatial dimensional scope we're living in. Turns out the pillars contained enough energy to create infinitely many realities, only one of which was necessary to hold up. This whole occurrence is described fully in the Book of Chaos, a not-so-well-received scientific paper about the truth of this world. Unfortunately scientists in our age are too preoccupied to see the real truth. But now you know too.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.756.title: Remade in our Image
divine_journey_2.quest.db.756.desc: The Book of Chaos is correct, but doesn't explain what happened in its entirety. The truth is, one book was lost during the transfer of realities. It is now dubbed 'The Ancient Book of Chaos', and it only lives in our memories. It contained information on how to rebuild our reality, or even... shape it in a way that's... advantageous for some. It is interesting to observe the ways that the apparent 'real world', as it has been called over the §lz§rillenias gets in the way of what could be called a 'real world'. The concept could be very simple. It's what happened in the past and what happened in the future: all that is left is a constant pressure and need for change. I believe these are now well known principles of reality to some extent. Now I may have missed some of the interesting details that you may have missed. divine_journey_2.quest.db.816.desc: No one likes Thaumcraft Warp! Fortunately, your chemical tinkerings have yielded you an item that can send all your unwanted warp into another plane of existence. Isn't it great?! Craft an Unwarpification Talisman and try it yourself!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.817.title: 蟲蟲危機 - 錯誤回報機制
divine_journey_2.quest.db.817.desc: Divine Journey 2 是一個經過重度調整和編輯的模組包。雖然我們已盡最大努力確保沒有錯誤， 但有些部分我們沒有辦法作出變動。%n對於已知的錯誤， 我們會在其相關的地方向您提出警告。 但是， 有些錯誤我們可能還未發現。當發生這種狀況的時候， 請向我們的 GitHub Repo 報告錯誤報告： https://github.com/Divine-Journey-2/main/issues%n（你也可以在暫停視窗的右方找到這個連結。）%n%n不過, 在你想要提出錯誤報告之前, 不妨先試試這些方法吧%n- 確保你的模組包版本是最新版本%n- 確保你在下載這個模組包時下載是有正常完成的%n- 確保你的 Java 版本是最新版本%n- 確保你的啟動器不是 Cursesforge。 截至 2021 年 7 月 31 日為止， 無論您的設置是什麼，%n  Curseforge都將強制載入某一個已過時的 Java 版本。%n- 確保你電腦上的模組包沒有經過太大程度的修改， 無論是模組的設定更改或是引入%n  新的模組。%n- 如果你是在服務器上遊玩這個模組包， 確保他們沒有改變任何模組設定或合成%n  配方（通常會是關於結構生成和區塊加載的部分）%n%n如果以上的方法都確定沒有辦法解決您的問題的話, 請移步至我們的 Github Repo 上傳您的錯誤報告, 並填寫好所有要求您填寫的相關資訊。 %n%n
divine_journey_2.quest.db.818.title: Expanding our forces
divine_journey_2.quest.db.818.desc: Craft an Infinity Booster Card! With this in an AE2 Wireless Terminal, you'll be able to access your ME System from any range!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.819.title: 機械光環延伸
divine_journey_2.quest.db.819.desc: 合成無線合成終端和無線流體終端! 現在你不僅可以無線存取物品, 同時也能進行 3x3 的合成, 並且也能從流體終端存取流體!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.820.title: 溫柔體貼
divine_journey_2.quest.db.820.desc: 擴展你的薰香祭壇至下一階, 在四邊增加 2x3 碎石磚路面的長方形.%n%n若你不確定正確的結構, 到這查詢更多: https://ftb.gamepedia.com/Incense_Altar
divine_journey_2.quest.db.821.title: 挖掘黑曜石
divine_journey_2.quest.db.821.desc: 用耐酸鋁鎬來連鎖挖掘一大片黑曜石! 用這招你可以簡單的在短時間內獲得好幾組黑曜石.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.822.title: 可能是粉紅色? 也許是鋁?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.822.desc: 在冶煉爐的排液孔用岩漿桶導入岩漿! 以同樣方法將水導入冶煉爐中製作黑曜石. 現在,在冶煉爐中將黑曜石,鋁,鐵熔融合成製作耐酸鋁! 然後將熔融的耐酸鋁倒出至鎬頭鑄模! 用這個可製作出耐酸鋁鎬,可挖掘至黑曜石等級!%n%n注意: 可用約束流體管道自動導入岩漿和水, 你現在應該有辦法.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.823.title: 偶素水泥!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.823.desc: 製作一堆的水泥! 你會需要它們的.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.824.title: 沙子收集狂
divine_journey_2.quest.db.824.desc: 利用連鎖挖礦功能蒐集一些沙子!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.825.title: 礫石收集狂
divine_journey_2.quest.db.825.desc: 利用連鎖挖礦功能蒐集一些礫石!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.826.title: 黏土收集狂
divine_journey_2.quest.db.826.desc: 利用連鎖挖礦功能蒐集一些黏土!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.827.title: 這很金屬!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.827.desc: 用你剛做好的燃燒精華來"熔解"你的粗製鐵砂! 你只需要把燃燒精華和粗製鐵砂丟進一格水中, 然後...瞧! 你給自己做了個鐵錠!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.828.title: 太陽之力!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.828.desc: 將黃色染料和煤炭組合在一起來製作一種有著強烈活性的精華!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.829.title: 碾碎它!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.829.desc: 把你收集的鐵礦用粗製石錘敲碎成粗製鐵砂!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.830.title: 你各位挖起來啊!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.830.desc: 向地底挖掘, 並獲得 15 塊以上的鵝卵石或是任何種類的石頭素材! §l別忘了有快速挖掘功能!§r (預設: §e~§r)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.831.title: 先有鎬子, 才有合成?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.831.desc: 你沒有看錯! 工作台的製作沒有你想像的那麼簡單! 你必須先製作一個木製十字鎬頭部和一個工具手把, 接著把他們組合起來!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.832.title: 更多的升級!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.832.desc: 把抽屜容量升級(I)一路合成上去到抽屜容量升級(IV)! 超多儲存容量! :O%n%n[注: 抽屜容量升級(II)和抽屜容量升級(III)在任務中被跳過了, 因為在這個時間點上對你來說太簡單了.]
divine_journey_2.quest.db.833.title: 抽屜升級
divine_journey_2.quest.db.833.desc: 用剛獲得的黑曜石製作些基礎的抽屜升級! 可用這個升級抽屜的容量!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.834.title: 7號工具
divine_journey_2.quest.db.834.desc: 7號工具? 你在供三小? 喔, 做個很酷的新匠魂工具不會太晚啦(not tool late / not tool-8) >:D
divine_journey_2.quest.db.835.title: _____ 模具
divine_journey_2.quest.db.835.desc: 合成些空白模具來製作匠魂工具的部件!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.836.title: "咕嚕咕嚕"
divine_journey_2.quest.db.836.desc: - 他說把熔融金屬導入鑄造盆,你需要製作它來完成這個任務. 可以用這個將整個金屬塊一次倒出!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.837.title: 和匠魂的初見歡!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.837.desc: 把水泥燒成焦黑磚, 開始發展匠魂(Tinker's Construct)!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.838.title: 粗製的石頭錘子
divine_journey_2.quest.db.838.desc: 製作一個粗製石錘! 用它來把鐵礦石製作成粗製鐵砂。
divine_journey_2.quest.db.839.title: 如鐵一般刺人
divine_journey_2.quest.db.840.title: 斯巴達之盾
divine_journey_2.quest.db.840.desc: 用JEI查看斯巴達之盾(Spartan Shields)模組, 製作其中一個基礎鑽石等級的盾. 這盾在格擋時可以猛擊敵人: 像平常一樣按住右鍵舉盾, 然後左鍵猛擊!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.841.title: 閃亮的藍石! :O
divine_journey_2.quest.db.842.title: 夢想成為紅石大師
divine_journey_2.quest.db.842.desc: 挖些紅石出來吧! 你可以在接近底層的地下找到它, 和熔岩出現的地方差不多高度!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.843.title: 模具溢出
divine_journey_2.quest.db.843.desc: 太多模具了嗎? 長久以來,科學家們在研究一種潛在的解決方案,最近終於找到了:每個月$9.99終生訂閱,擁有'自己'的全新模具箱! 在這裡簽名並留下信用卡號碼和背後的3碼,這個完美的創作就是你的了%n...%n開玩笑的,當然免費(只要你有足夠的材料製作)...!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.844.title: 小心燙手!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.844.desc: 製作一個鑄件台能將熔融的金屬導入鑄模中! 最重要的是錠鑄模, (猜到了吧)可製作錠!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.845.title: 冶煉爐核心
divine_journey_2.quest.db.845.desc: 挖點紅石來做出一個冶煉爐控制器!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.846.title: §d史詩背包
divine_journey_2.quest.db.846.desc: 查看簡單背包(Simply Backpacks)模組製作史詩背包!%n你能存超多物品進去,設定打開包包的快捷鍵並把它裝備至飾品欄!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.847.title: 派對(部件)時間!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.847.desc: 在模具雕刻台使用模具,用多種的材料製作部件! 例如:鎬頭模具加上3塊鵝卵石製作出石鎬頭! 但若要製作金屬部件,你要使用冶煉爐,熔融金屬並導入鑄模,比如說鎬頭鑄模!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.848.title: 開局都是一樣的...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.848.desc: 你知道該做什麼: 獲得原木!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.849.title: 喔不, 要漏出來了!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.849.desc: 製作一些焦黑排液孔來從澆注口導出你想要的液體! 如果你想讓液體流得更遠, 不妨試試澆注道!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.850.title: 裝滿岩漿的儲罐
divine_journey_2.quest.db.850.desc: [這是選擇性的任務.你可以用其他現在能用的液體儲罐,不過,熱力膨脹(Thermal Expansion)的便攜儲罐是個好選擇.]%n%n合成儲罐並裝滿岩漿! 在冶煉爐內使用製作黑曜石!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.851.title: 是個工作台!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.851.desc: 使用您的 2x2 合成介面製作一個完好的石斧, 石鎬和 2 個工作台基底， 然後將它們組合起來製作出一個工作台！%n%n
divine_journey_2.quest.db.852.title: 石頭做的十字鎬
divine_journey_2.quest.db.852.desc: 合成出一個石製鎬頭, 並利用它再合成出石鎬!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.853.title: 箱子爛透了
divine_journey_2.quest.db.853.desc: 合成出任一種抽屜模組(Storage Drawers)的抽屜! 您可以在裡面放入大量的特定一種的物品！ 如果原本的箱子中堆積了大量鵝卵石、泥土、礫石等， 這將給你很大的幫助！%n%n§6注意:§r 抽體可以在保留內容物的狀況下被破壞, 可以輕鬆的移動它們!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.854.title: 這火把硬的像石頭
divine_journey_2.quest.db.854.desc: 您不需要再攜帶多餘的木材來合成木棒以製作火把! 你只要將 2 塊鵝卵石放在一起就能合成出石棍， 並用它們來製造石棍火把!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.855.title: 給熔爐一點燃料!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.855.desc: 去挖點煤炭吧! 別忘了用連鎖挖礦!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.856.title: 分開來儲存
divine_journey_2.quest.db.856.desc: 在這儲存你的工具. 當然, 是分開來的.%n%n...我的意思是, 你可以在這裡儲存整個工具, 在它們還沒組合前.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.857.title: 光合作用
divine_journey_2.quest.db.857.desc: 採集一些黃色的花(蒲公英, 向日葵...等), 然後把它們變成黃色染料!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.858.title: 堅若磐石
divine_journey_2.quest.db.858.desc: 用你剛獲得的黑曜石製作全套的黑曜石護具! 它比鐵製護具稍弱一些,但用連鎖挖礦隨時獲得黑曜石是很容易的!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.859.title: 完全圖騰!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.859.desc: 製作圖騰刻刀解鎖第2章: 在圖騰上起舞吧!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.860.title: 給它滿上燃料!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.860.desc: 你的冶煉爐會需要一個裝著充足且源源不絕的熔岩的焦黑儲罐來持續工作。之後你可以用其他液態燃料來加快這個多方塊結構的速度!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.861.title: 完全升級!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.861.desc: 取得抽屜容量升級(V)! 村民交易被禁用, 作為補償, 綠寶石礦在每個生態域都會生成 (且在高山地形中更常見一些).
divine_journey_2.quest.db.862.title: 冶煉能力
divine_journey_2.quest.db.862.desc: 利用你獲得的鐵錠來製作 2 根鐵棒, 接著裡用連鎖挖礦挖更多的鵝卵石來製作壓縮鵝卵石! 如果你的附近找不到一般的鵝卵石的話, 你可以使用4個地下生態域(Underground Biomes)的任一種鵝卵石放進你的 2*2 合成介面, 合成出一般的鵝卵石。最後利用這些東西來做出一個熔爐!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.863.title: 更多的箱子
divine_journey_2.quest.db.863.desc: 在JEI查看更多的箱子(Iron Chests)模組, 並努力打造出鑽石儲物箱, 它比一般的箱子有更多的儲存空間!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.864.title: 哥(銅)白尼感到驕傲
divine_journey_2.quest.db.864.desc: 從地下挖些銅礦! 它在較高的層數,有時甚至裸露在地表! 然後直接融爐燒製或使用冶煉爐來雙倍化!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.865.title: 工具製作的開始
divine_journey_2.quest.db.865.desc: 做個模具雕刻台! 用它來把空白模具轉換成製作工具所需的各式模具!這是匠魂(Tinkers' Construct)工具製作的開始.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.866.title: 經驗值儲存器
divine_journey_2.quest.db.866.desc: 製作些開放式方塊(OpenBlocks)的蓄水槽和經驗地漏! 蓄水槽上方放經驗地漏,站在經驗地漏上可以儲存經驗值. 蓄水槽可以很好地相互連接. 要拿回經驗, 簡單地右擊任一個連接起來的蓄水槽!%n%n[專業提示: 若你製作了4個經驗地漏,在蓄水槽上2x2的擺放, 比起1個地漏,你可以將經驗值更快的存入蓄水槽!]
divine_journey_2.quest.db.867.title: 噴火龍就是這樣
divine_journey_2.quest.db.868.title: 唉唷,是鋼喔!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.868.desc: 用焦爐製作焦炭,跟鐵一起放到高爐中,就能作出鋼錠!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.869.title: 我快聾了!!!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.869.desc: 合成柴油發電機的所需部件!當生物柴油完全自動化後,這是個絕佳的能量來源.幾個柴油發電機就可以簡單使中型的ME系統持續運作.%n%n到工程師手冊->重型機械->能量,線纜,發電機的頁面查看如何建造.點擊中央的發電機模組將多方塊結構成型.%n%n從正面的角落用生物柴油儲罐或輸液管輸入燃料.在上方3個接線器中之一連接線纜.這會在所有接線器間分配4096IF/tick.一旦開始發電,你會發現'這台機器吵到爆,窩的天啊我聽不到我的腳步聲了,我需要個超級靜音器,真希望我把它蓋的離我家越遠越好,該把它拆了'.%n%n§c警告:別在區塊邊界蓋這台機器.按下F9顯示區塊邊界.若蓋在區塊邊界上,最終這機器會損壞並使你的世界崩潰.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.870.title: 燃廖?染料?燃料!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.870.desc: 在煉油廠中將乙醇和植物油合成,獲得你的第一桶生物柴油!%n%n高度建議立即開始著手自動化生物柴油的整個製作過程,不僅是前中期極佳的能量來源,在接下來的科技類模組中也會非常大量的使用到!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.871.title: 跳,跳,粉!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.871.desc: 使用擠壓機將焦煤粉壓成HOP石墨粉!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.872.title: 現在幫我充電!!!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.872.desc: 合成充電站!從底部或後方將能量導入充電站.右鍵將能充電的物品放入來充電!再次右鍵取回.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.873.title: 令人震驚
divine_journey_2.quest.db.873.desc: 合成1個低壓線圈和2個低壓接線器.在機器,發電機和電容器上放置接線器並以線圈連接起來,就能在兩者間傳輸電力!%n%n低壓線圈最多可延伸16格遠,且不能被任何方塊阻擋.低壓線圈傳輸僅2048RF/tick.所以多台機器使用時,或許需要升級至中壓或高壓線圈.若你不想更換整個系統的線圈,可以製作變壓器讓低壓和中壓,或中壓和高壓間互轉.%n%n接線器只能用在輸入或輸出.若想連接多個設備請製作繼電器.%n%n任何電線可以用工程師剪線鉗斷開連接.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.874.title: 有機的味道
divine_journey_2.quest.db.874.desc: 用擠壓機擠壓種子製作第一桶的植物油!這是生物柴油的一半成分.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.875.title: 嗶啵-嗶啵,嗶啵-嗶啵!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.875.desc: 合成擠壓機所需的部件!到工程師手冊->重型機械->擠壓機的頁面查看如何建造.最後點擊中央木桶將多方塊結構成型!%n%n從上方橘點輸入電力.從後方藍點輸入物品(用漏斗或用物品導管和伺服器導入物品),從正面下方輸出流體,正面上方輸出物品.%n%n§c警告:別在區塊邊界蓋這台機器.按下F9顯示區塊邊界.若蓋在區塊邊界上,最終這機器會損壞並使你的世界崩潰.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.876.title: 終於有電了!!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.876.desc: 合成動能發電機.將它接上水車或風車就能開始發電(IF)!(與RF的電是1:1的).可以接上3台水車,但風車只能1台.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.877.title: 將所有東西自動化吧!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.877.desc: 跟工程師裝配台一樣!合成一個它所需的部件(雖然你或許會需要製作更多台,為了不同的藍圖和輸出),到工程師手冊->基礎機械->自動裝配台的頁面查看如何建造這個多方塊結構.點擊側邊靠近中間的半磚成型.放入藍圖,並選擇你想製作的物品.物品輸入在後方(傳送帶移動的起點,可使用漏斗或其他輸入管道將物品導入),輸出在正面(傳送帶移動的終點).%n%n§c警告:別在區塊邊界蓋這台機器.按下F9顯示區塊邊界.若蓋在區塊邊界上,最終這機器會損壞並使你的世界崩潰.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.878.title: 我的螢幕是高壓的
divine_journey_2.quest.db.878.desc: 合成1個高壓線圈,2個高壓接線器,和1個高壓繼電器.可傳導32,768 IF/tick且最多可延伸32格.若想增加電線距離,合成些繼電器.這能多重連接,意思是你可以把他們串在一起讓你的能量傳得更遠!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.879.title: 壓製物品
divine_journey_2.quest.db.879.desc: 合成金屬衝壓機所需的材料.到工程師手冊->重型機械->金屬衝壓機的頁面查看如何建造.當方塊都放置好後,右擊中央的活塞將多方塊結構成型!也可以用工程師錘將活塞轉動成面朝下.%n%n一旦成型後,將金屬衝壓模具右鍵放上!從上方用接線器供電,從傳送帶一側放箱子輸入物品,然後從另一側獲得產物!%n%n由金屬衝壓機製作的板,棒和電線,比在工作台合成的方式省下一半的材料.%n%n§c警告:別在區塊邊界蓋這台機器.按下F9顯示區塊邊界.若蓋在區塊邊界上,最終這機器會損壞並使你的世界崩潰.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.880.title: 別讓它滾遠了!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.880.desc: 用工程師裝配台中使用製作組件藍圖,合成一些鐵質和鋼質機械零件!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.881.title: 強大的移動方式
divine_journey_2.quest.db.881.desc: 用工業史萊姆球合成黏液靴子和黏液彈弓!%n黏液彈弓將你發射到空中,而黏液靴子讓你落下時存活!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.882.title: 史萊姆使你移動千里
divine_journey_2.quest.db.882.desc: 用電弧爐製作一些工業史萊姆球!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.883.title: 進入應用能源!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.883.desc: 合成一組充能賽特斯石英水晶解鎖應用能源2!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.884.title: 酒是這樣釀的嗎?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.884.desc: 合成發酵機所需的部件!在工程師手冊->重型機械->發酵機的頁面查看如何建造多方塊結構.%n%n點擊側面中間的鍋釜將這個多方塊結構成型.成型後,物品輸入在後方或側方(藍點處,可用漏斗或物品管道和伺服器),流體輸出在正面下方(橘點).當然這台機器需要電力,從背後橘點(面朝上)連接.%n%n§c警告:別在區塊邊界蓋這台機器.按下F9顯示區塊邊界.若蓋在區塊邊界上,最終這機器會損壞並使你的世界崩潰.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.885.title: 別太自大!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.885.desc: 用粉碎機將焦煤製成焦炭粉!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.886.title: 你有好好的對待木頭嗎?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.886.desc: 用雜酚油和木材獲得防腐木,之後可以用流體轉置機自動化.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.887.title: Coke不只是飲料
divine_journey_2.quest.db.887.desc: 合成27焦爐磚!JEI顯示了Chisel有很多種焦煤,切記用正確的來合成:沉浸工藝的那個.%n%n然後擺放成3x3x3的立方體!最後用工程師錘右擊其中一面後,焦爐製作完成!%n%n在左邊的欄位放入一些煤炭,右上角的欄位放些流體儲存的東西(鐵桶,各種儲罐,等等.)!焦爐會自動把煤炭轉換成焦炭,然後將鐵桶/儲罐裝滿雜酚油.%n%n記得將雜酚油導出,雜酚油若滿了焦爐會停止工作.%n%n可以(推薦)用漏斗和管線自動化輸入輸出煤炭,焦炭,雜酚油.上方輸入煤炭,下方輸出焦炭,從其中一個側面用導管導出雜酚油(這種狀況就不需要鐵桶和儲罐).%n%n§c警告:別在區塊邊界蓋這台機器.按下F9顯示區塊邊界.若蓋在區塊邊界上,最終這機器會損壞並使你的世界崩潰.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.888.title: 評價一下這方塊
divine_journey_2.quest.db.888.desc: 合成3個散熱器模組!這是機器的部件材料且是個有連接材質,相當漂亮的建築方塊.我給9/10分.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.889.title: Goodnight!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.889.desc: It's never fun to wait for night time to come... Fortunately, we have a solution! Craft an Imperfect Ritual Stone and place a Block of Lapis on top! Right Click the Ritual Stone to make it night time!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.890.title: 難聞的酒味
divine_journey_2.quest.db.890.desc: 用發酵機製作第一桶的乙醇!這是生物柴油的一半成分.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.891.title: #高爐
divine_journey_2.quest.db.891.desc: 合成27個高爐磚!擺放成3x3x3的立方體,用工程師錘右擊任何一面!%n%n這台機器放入鐵錠和焦炭會製作出鋼和礦渣.%n%n然而跟焦爐不同,這無法自動化.若想自動化生產鋼,你需要合成出強化高爐,電弧爐或發展得夠遠直到熱力膨脹模組之後.%n%n§c警告:別在區塊邊界蓋這台機器.按下F9顯示區塊邊界.若蓋在區塊邊界上,最終這機器會損壞並使你的世界崩潰.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.892.title: 設施化和容量化
divine_journey_2.quest.db.892.desc: 合成高壓電容器.可儲存4,000,000IF.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.893.title: 又冷又熱的東西
divine_journey_2.quest.db.893.desc: 合成熱傳導發電機!這是一台很簡潔的機器,當相對位置的兩側放上冷和熱的液體或固體就會開始發電.現在最好的兩種液體是岩漿和水,又或者可以把水換成冰或冰磚,岩漿換成黃鈾塊.之後可用烈焰之熾焱和極寒之凜冰來發出更多的電.既然都用這個了,為何不使用4面來雙倍發電!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.894.title: 中壓電會緊張嗎?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.894.desc: 合成中壓電容器!可儲存1,000,000IF.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.895.title: 濃縮再濃縮,提煉再提煉
divine_journey_2.quest.db.895.desc: 合成煉油廠所需部件!查看工程師手冊如何建造此多方塊結構.用工程師錘點擊長邊其中一側的中央重型工程塊將它成型.%n%n上方輸入電力,液體輸入在相對的兩側.記得要將流體導入機器.長邊的中央輸出流體.%n%n§c警告:別在區塊邊界蓋這台機器.按下F9顯示區塊邊界.若蓋在區塊邊界上,最終這機器會損壞並使你的世界崩潰.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.896.title: 快還要更快!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.896.desc: 合成2個高爐鼓風機!放置在強化高爐兩側(確保有連接上,放置時面向高爐)!當鼓風機通電時(從上方),會加快強化高爐的作業速度.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.897.title: 更多的#高爐
divine_journey_2.quest.db.897.desc: 合成強化高爐的組件!將強化高爐磚放置3x3x3的立方體,然後在中央上方放置漏斗.用工程師錘右鍵側面的中央方塊將多方塊結構成型!%n%n可從上方用另一個漏斗(或物品管道,傳輸節點,等)自動輸入鐵錠,焦炭,分別在前方和後方放置箱子輸出鋼和礦渣.%n%n§c警告:別在區塊邊界蓋這台機器.按下F9顯示區塊邊界.若蓋在區塊邊界上,最終這機器會損壞並使你的世界崩潰.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.898.title: 我們步步逼近
divine_journey_2.quest.db.898.desc: 合成一張金屬沖壓模具藍圖!JEI展示了所有的藍圖配方,即使看起來都長得一樣,所以請確認哪個是你要的.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.899.title: 狡猾的組件
divine_journey_2.quest.db.899.desc: 合成一張製作組件的藍圖!看來我們正在玩mine(挖礦)...craft(合成),因為你必須一直做這兩件事...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.900.title: 坐下來畫畫
divine_journey_2.quest.db.900.desc: 合成工程師裝配台!使用藍圖和合成材料製作多樣物品!之後可以製作自動化工程師配裝台來自動合成(這章的最右邊的任務).
divine_journey_2.quest.db.901.title: 我們一直為此努力
divine_journey_2.quest.db.901.desc: 用電弧爐製作些工業皮革!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.902.title: 這個大傢伙
divine_journey_2.quest.db.902.desc: 合成電弧爐所需的部件!在工程師手冊->重型機械->電弧爐的頁面查看如何建造.點擊中央的鍋釜將多方塊結構成型!%n%n從後方3個黑色方型其中之一輸入電力,在上方輸入.面對機器時,左側欄位輸入主要物品,右側欄位輸入附加物品.從正面底部輸出產物,在搭建時鍋釜的位置;從這邊輸出物品.電弧爐可用來熔煉,製作合金,和製作鐵,所以副產物(如礦渣)可以也應該要導出,它會自動從後方輸出,在電力輸入的下方.%n%n§c警告:別在區塊邊界蓋這台機器.按下F9顯示區塊邊界.若蓋在區塊邊界上,最終這機器會損壞並使你的世界崩潰.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.903.title: 啟程,至摩爾多!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.903.desc: 合成4個最重要的模具!使用金屬衝壓機時放上這些模具,可以從相同材料中得到更多產物.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.904.title: 更好的儲存
divine_journey_2.quest.db.904.desc: 既然你做出了鋼,那就合成抽屜管理器吧!將它連接在你的抽屜旁,就可以把所有抽屜都連接在一起!不用再找尋特定的抽屜存放物品了,簡單的對著抽屜管理器按右鍵,若連接的抽屜還有空間,它會自動放到裡面.%n%n也可以在抽屜管理器接上任何的物品傳輸器像是漏斗,管道,傳輸節點...等,將物品導入你的抽屜系統中.之後推薦你將AE2的儲存匯流排接上抽屜管理器.這樣一來你的ME系統可以看到並存取所有抽屜網路內的所有物品.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.905.title: But... how MUCH power?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.905.desc: Craft a Current Transformer! Break up your wiring into 2 pieces by connecting it to a generator (like a Kinetic Dynamo) on one side, and a Machine or Capacitor on the other side. You don't need to use Wire Connectors for the Current Transformer. This will let you know how much power is flowing through the cable, or how much power you're generating.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.906.title: 你在水什麼!?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.906.desc: 我在試著用水發電啦!合成水車,並接上動能發電機產生IF能量!記得上下左右2格都需清空才能放置水車(意即水車需要5x5的空間).在頂部放置水源,讓它流置側邊和底部,水車就會開始轉動,並產生能量.%n%n§c警告:別在區塊邊界蓋這台機器.按下F9顯示區塊邊界.若蓋在區塊邊界上,最終這機器會損壞並使你的世界崩潰.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.907.title: 做石墨的圖
divine_journey_2.quest.db.907.desc: 合成電弧爐電極的工程師藍圖!在工程師裝配台合成3個石墨電極!所有使用電弧爐的配方都需要這個材料.別擔心,這些電極有耐久值且可運作好一陣子.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.908.title: 粉碎它
divine_journey_2.quest.db.908.desc: 合成粉碎機所需要的部件!在工程師手冊->重型機械->粉碎機的頁面查看如何建造多方塊結構.建好後用工程師錘點擊長邊中央其中之一的柵欄,將多方塊結構成型.%n%n粉碎機沒有介面.相反的,當供電後(後側中央的橘點)並投入材料進去,如果丟入的物品有粉碎型態,會將物品開始粉碎.它會很樂意的吃下它不能吃的東西,所以丟入物品請小心.要把物品輸出,在黑點旁簡單的放個箱子.%n%n§警告:別在區塊邊界蓋這台機器.按下F9顯示區塊邊界.若蓋在區塊邊界上,最終這機器會損壞並使你的世界崩潰.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.909.title: 你的滑翔翼太低了嗎?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.909.desc: (Song:Chain Hang Low)%nDo you wobble when you go?%nDo it shine in the light?%nIs it leather, is it wool?%nCould you throw it over ya shoulder%nIf ya fly it make ya go%nDo your Hangs glide low?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.910.title: 工程師必備的
divine_journey_2.quest.db.910.desc: 合成工程師錘開始進入沉浸工藝!%n%n注意:第3章和第4章(根源魔法和沉浸工藝)是可以同時進行的.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.911.title: 貝柯克之死
divine_journey_2.quest.db.911.desc: 合成一堆貝柯克染血石!想獲得凝血球,在冶煉爐中燒製腐肉,或者你自己站在冶煉爐裡:但要小心,這個方法可能有點痛...%n%n注意:用貝柯克之弓合成,每個物品只會使用1點的耐久值.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.912.title: 比鎬子更好
divine_journey_2.quest.db.912.desc: 合成採礦機械鑽並在工程師裝配台中裝上鋼質鑽頭.然後直接在煉油廠中或EnderIO的流體儲罐中填裝生物柴油.當裝滿燃料時,可以非常快速挖掘3x3的範圍.升級的部件可在工程師裝配台中安裝使用.注意:其他升級是可合成的.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.913.title: 不是侮辱玻璃
divine_journey_2.quest.db.913.desc: 合成絕緣玻璃!特別記得是要用淺綠色玻璃.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.914.title: 高一點,再高一點!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.914.desc: 合成1個中壓線圈和2個中壓接線器.這種電線可傳輸8192IF/tick且最多可延伸16格.%n%n接線器只能用在輸入或輸出.若想連接多個設備請製作繼電器..
divine_journey_2.quest.db.915.title: 你可成為大麻王
divine_journey_2.quest.db.915.desc: 打些芒草獲得工業大麻種子!種植採收獲得工業大麻纖維!推薦使用根源魔法的元素土種植.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.916.title: Beta版的紅石爐
divine_journey_2.quest.db.916.desc: 合成外置加熱器!在它旁邊放上熔爐,在橘色點上接上電力!旁邊的熔爐會使用IF電而不是燃料來燒製物品了.%n%n若已從地獄獲得辛辛那金,也可以製作辛辛那金鍛造爐,燒製速度為熔爐的兩倍!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.917.title: 簡單的樣本
divine_journey_2.quest.db.917.desc: 合成一個或多個岩芯鑽井.供電後右鍵,會從地下挖掘一個樣本.樣本可能含有些礦脈.若有,這個區塊適合用挖掘機挖礦.機器不會真的挖掘地型,只會產生些原礦的產物.發現礦脈的可能性調高了,希望你能順利找到礦脈,且離你的發電機夠近 .
divine_journey_2.quest.db.918.title: 這是個用來裝電的箱子!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.918.desc: 合成低壓電容器!這可儲存100,000IF(RF).每一面都可以設定成輸入或輸出電力.同一個面上用工程師錘點擊一次設置成輸入電力(藍色點),或點擊兩次轉換成輸出電力(橘色點).儘管名稱是低壓,可使用中壓和高壓的線圈和接線器傳輸能量.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.919.title: 這是狂野的西部
divine_journey_2.quest.db.919.desc: 合成左輪手槍,8發基礎彈藥,和左輪快速裝彈器!在JEI中查看你能使用的各種彈藥!使用左輪手槍,Shift+右鍵裝填彈藥,右鍵發射.當然不想在戰鬥中用光彈藥,對吧?這就是左輪快速裝彈器的功能!一旦用光彈藥,會以它的內容物快速裝填至左輪手槍中,所以可以隨心所欲的pew-pew(只要有彈藥).可在工程師裝配台中進行左輪手槍的升級.註:其他的升級是可以合成的.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.920.title: 接受吧,這是化學!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.920.desc: 合成化學噴射器!可在工程師裝配台中使用升級.使用化學噴射器,裝滿任何的液體.可用EnderIO的儲罐,或直接右鍵任何種類的儲罐.右鍵使用化學噴射器會直接將流體噴灑出來.可能你會問,這有什麼意義.好吧,試著Shift+右鍵調成火焰噴射模式(只要你裝的液體是可燃的).這是個極為浪費的武器,但絕對可以毀滅些敵人.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.921.title: 進入通用機械!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.921.desc: 合成一組充能鋨錠解鎖通用機械!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.922.title: 箱子儲物,儲罐儲液
divine_journey_2.quest.db.922.desc: 合成EnderIO的流體儲罐和一些沉浸工藝的輸液管來儲存或移動流體.%n%n你可設定這個儲罐的每個面要輸出還是輸入.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.923.title: BOSS戰:貝柯克
divine_journey_2.quest.db.923.desc: 演奏死之舞儀式召喚貝柯克.召喚前請做些準備:%n%n1. 貝柯克會不停的射箭,所以穿一些能應對的裝備.推薦使用遠距離武器,若你想跟他硬碰硬.%n%n2. 你可以挖些你能進去躲藏的洞,但貝柯克不行.貝柯克不能按按鈕,地板門,或破壞方塊.%n%n一旦你擊敗了貝柯克,會掉落他的弓.你可以當一般的弓使用,或拿來當之後的合成材料.無論用弓射一箭或合成使用都會消耗1點的耐久值.%n%n§6注意:§r 無法領取任務獎勵嗎? 點擊"領取"旁還的右箭頭按鈕,還有下一頁!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.924.title: 不用再挖礦了!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.924.desc: 合成挖掘機和斗輪所需的部件!到工程師手冊->重型機械->斗輪式挖掘機的頁面查看如何建造這兩者.建造前,確保蓋在正確的位置.做個岩芯鑽井(看一下另一個任務).一旦發現了適合的位置,在側邊供電(3個黑點其中之一),並放置箱子(或最好是物品導管搭配2-3個抽屜)輸出產物.要注意這台機器的用電為1024RF/tick,所以必須有個好的發電機來讓它持續運作.%n%n§c警告:別在區塊邊界蓋這台機器.按下F9顯示區塊邊界.若蓋在區塊邊界上,最終這機器會損壞並使你的世界崩潰.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.925.title: 哇喔...砰!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.925.desc: 合成磁軌砲!任務獎勵的升級組件可在工程師裝配台中使用.使用前在充電站中充電!在包包中準備些發射物.包含:鐵棒,鋼棒,和石墨電極.使用時,按住右鍵直到右下角的量表達到99後,放開右鍵開火!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.926.title: 聖甲蟲之謎II
divine_journey_2.quest.db.926.desc: 合成人造聖甲蟲之軀!...這是做什麼用的呢...?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.927.title: 波音
divine_journey_2.quest.db.927.desc: 蒐集些桶型仙人掌和一個地獄仙人掌!它們遍布整個地獄,但更常出現在Gravel fields!應該不難找到!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.928.title: 往下面走,低一點,低,低,低,低,低,低
divine_journey_2.quest.db.928.desc: 製作地獄傳送門並進入!第一次進入時會或許會讀取好一陣子,因為更好的地獄(Better Nether)正在生成地形.進入後記得在旅行地圖(JourneyMap)中設置導航點,以便能找到回來的路!%n%n%n%n%n(Song:Flo Rida - Low)%nPlayer had them Iron Leggin's on (on),%nBoots with the Plate (with the Plate),%nThe whole world is lookin' at sir!%nThey hit the floor (they hit the floor),%nNext thing you know,%nPlayer went low, low, low, low, low, low, low, low!%n
divine_journey_2.quest.db.929.title: 蘑菇們
divine_journey_2.quest.db.929.desc: 取得3種不同的Better Nether蘑菇!%n%n- 盧西孢通常在茄子花原附近,是6格大的黃色蘑菇,在地獄牆側.%n%n- 燈籠蘑菇因為名字讓你困惑,是因為它其實是紫色的,是1格大.%n%n- 骨菇孢子生長在骨塊上,通常在靈魂沙原附近可找到.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.930.title: 勇敢的戰鬥
divine_journey_2.quest.db.930.desc: 擊殺凋零並獲得珍貴的地獄之星!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.931.title: 大膽的技能(skill)骷髏!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.931.desc: 找到地獄堡壘且殺死一些凋零骷髏並獲得它們的頭顱!遇到困難的話可以製作匠魂的劈刀!劈刀有內建的斬首的功能.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.932.title: 怎麼走?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.932.desc: 合成魔法地圖並在暮光森林內用它來顯示Boss的位置!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.933.title: 遊玩暮光森林!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.933.desc: 進入暮光森林後,在地底蒐集些火炬漿果並擊殺烏鴉取得它的羽毛!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.934.title: 漂浮的大傢伙
divine_journey_2.quest.db.934.desc: 進入黑暗森林中間的黑暗之塔!爬上塔頂找到暮光幽靈!這個boss不會受到近戰傷害,必須使用遠程武器.擊敗後獲得戰利品和砷鉛鐵結晶!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.935.title: 地下花園...又來了!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.935.desc: 進入黑暗森林並找到哥布林騎士要塞!你需要在入口附近的戰利品座放上1個戰利品才能進去.進去後和一些騎士,哥布林,盔甲寄居蟹作戰取得盔甲碎片!找到中央的房間有四個幻影騎士!擊敗後就能繼續向前!%n%n注意:不確定幻影騎士會掉落什麼,所以這個任務只要求盔甲碎片.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.936.title: 快結束了
divine_journey_2.quest.db.936.desc: 進入下雪生態域並找到雪怪首領洞穴!擊敗一些雪怪和首領取得雪怪首領皮毛!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.937.title: 聖甲蟲之謎 III
divine_journey_2.quest.db.937.desc: 一旦你完成了根源魔法,沉浸工藝,和暮光森林,你就可以合成出無暇聖甲蟲之軀和無暇聖甲蟲之翅!...這是做什麼用的呢?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.938.title: 點亮道路!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.938.desc: 從巨人之雲上爬下來並進入Highlands生態域下方的洞窟!找到巨大黑曜石結構並用巨人之鎬破壞後找到箱子內的灰燼神燈!%n%nGG,你已經完成了暮光森林!%n%n%n%n或是...你跳過它...? 無所謂,希望你做了正確的決定且玩得開心!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.939.title: 等離子火焰
divine_journey_2.quest.db.939.desc: 找到地獄中罕見的紫焰人!擊殺獲得這紫色的烈焰粉!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.940.title: 在這也能生
divine_journey_2.quest.db.940.desc: 找到地獄蘆葦的平台然後蒐集一些!這可用來替代使用甘蔗的配方紙和糖,地獄蘆葦塊可用來替代木材.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.941.title: 然後...當火之國來襲時...一切都變了...(動畫:降世神通梗)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.941.desc: 找到地獄堡壘或地下烈焰使者地牢並取得一些烈焰桿!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.942.title: 石廣牛勿
divine_journey_2.quest.db.942.desc: 找到並挖些2種神聖RPG模組的地獄礦物!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.943.title: 無可挑剔的影響
divine_journey_2.quest.db.943.desc: 找些遊蕩在地獄的可愛橘色小惡魔!然後無情的獵取它們的皮! D:%n找小惡魔遇到困難的話,有個根源魔法的儀式-"召喚生物"-可召喚小惡魔.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.944.title: 跳過暮光森林...?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.944.desc: 製作這個模組包時,Divine Journey 2的DC伺服器有辦一個投票討論要不要將暮光森林設計成主線任務.投票結果是:設計一個物品可以讓你跳過暮光森林,因為我們太多人都已經玩過了,而且完全沒有新東西.%n%n若你想跳過暮光森林,合成暮光森林之鑰.這可讓你合成灰燼神燈,這是暮光森林最後才會獲得的物品,讓你可以在這包中繼續向前發展.%n%n然而,如果你還沒有玩過暮光森林,我極度推薦你玩玩看,因為它可能是麥塊中最棒的冒險類模組-只要沒有過強的飛行手段.在暮光森林中探索的最佳手段是用根源魔法的澄空漫遊咒術,也可用匠魂的黏液靴子和黏液彈弓.%n%n暮光森林實在太熱門,所以使用的太氾濫了:在大部分的模組包都有它,所以能夠理解為什麼大家都對它感到厭倦了.%n%n所以想走這個路線的話,不需要進入暮光森林也是可以的.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.945.title: 進入暮光森林
divine_journey_2.quest.db.945.desc: 合成暮光之岩!用來進入暮光森林.在一個2x2的水池旁圍繞泥土或草地,然後旁邊一圈放上任何的花(包含角落).然後丟入暮光之岩後開啟暮光森林傳送門!%n%n當完成第3章的石筍任務和第4章的HOP石墨粉任務後,這個任務才會解鎖.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.946.title: 站在焦土上
divine_journey_2.quest.db.946.desc: 在地獄召喚並擊敗紫焰王!推薦在封閉的空間作戰,它無法飛走也不會朝你發射火球.擊敗後獲得它的雕像和怒焰粉!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.947.title: 地獄!!!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.947.desc: 合成地獄之火!這是用來召喚地獄的紫焰王.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.948.title: 驚人的地牢設計
divine_journey_2.quest.db.948.desc: 擊敗巫妖王後,進入暮光沼澤不會再有飢餓效果.所以去那裡,並找到米諾菇迷宮的入口!迷宮的盡頭跟米諾菇王戰鬥!它不會款待你的所以...擊殺它取得牛頭人肉醬!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.949.title: 詭異又恐怖的骷髏
divine_journey_2.quest.db.949.desc: 擊敗納迦後,屋妖王周圍的屏障會消失.進入高塔,爬上塔頂,和巫妖王作戰!%n%n若作戰時遇到困難,要知道你必須將它的投射物擊回才能破壞它的盾.只有投射物可以擊回,你可以看它的手來判斷下一個投射物是啥.一旦擊破盾後,就能對它造成傷害!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.950.title: 三顆頭的怪物但叫做九頭蛇
divine_journey_2.quest.db.950.desc: 擊敗米諾菇後,繼續探索沼澤深處,發現火焰沼澤!正中央會發現九頭蛇.擊敗它的所有的投獲得戰利品,九頭蛇肉排,和熾熱之血!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.951.title: 熱糖果
divine_journey_2.quest.db.951.desc: 用些辛辛那金,鋼,康銅和岩漿桶,合成鍛造辛辛那金方塊!在冶煉爐中混合銅和鎳或用粉碎機粉碎後合成獲得康銅.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.952.title: Cin- cinna- citcin... whatever.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.952.desc: Mine up some Cincinnasite Ore from the Nether! It can be affected by Fortune.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.953.title: 雲越來越多了
divine_journey_2.quest.db.953.desc: 擊敗九頭蛇,暮光幽靈和冰雪女王後,在Highlands地形不再受到酸雨傷害!進入並找到浮在上空的巨人雲!爬上去擊敗巨人取得巨人之鎬!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.954.title: Elsa失散多年的姊姊
divine_journey_2.quest.db.954.desc: 進入冰川生態域!中央會發現極光宮殿.爬上頂部和冰雪女王作戰取得它的戰利品!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.955.title: 注意腳下!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.955.desc: 挖些茄子花!注意當你站在一群茄子花中-踩上去時會讓你中毒,因為它們有毒液.%n%n(Song:Eminem - Venom)%nVENOMMMM, got that poisonous VENOMMMM,%nAnd I'm not knowin' when I'mmmm%nEver gonna step in themmmm%nReady to step any moment and I'mmm%nThinkin' it's time to go get 'em%nThey ain't gonna know what him 'em%nW-W-When they get collected -%n%nVENOMMMM, got that poisonous VENOMMMM,%nAnd I'm not knowin' when I'mmmm%nEver gonna step in themmmm%nReady to step any moment and I'mmm%nThinkin' it's time to go get 'em%nThey ain't gonna know what him 'em%nW-W-When they get collected.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.956.title: 好大一條蛇
divine_journey_2.quest.db.956.desc: 找到納迦堡壘並擊敗它取得戰利品和鱗片!要擊敗它,一直打它,它的尾巴會越來越短,直到它剩一顆頭!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.957.title: 從火到水
divine_journey_2.quest.db.957.desc: 使用釀造台製作水下呼吸藥水!製作時會需要河豚.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.958.title: 啵-啵啵-啵
divine_journey_2.quest.db.959.title: 大型遺跡!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.959.desc: 找到海底神殿並使用水下呼吸藥水突入襲擊,取得些海磷碎片和海磷晶體!之後可用原子再構機轉換地獄石英或用粉碎機取得.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.960.title: 白雪公主之死
divine_journey_2.quest.db.960.desc: 在地獄找些看起來不太吉利的黑蘋果!通常在Egg Plant生態域中生成.直接打就會掉落!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.961.title: 看到你惹!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.961.desc: 在地獄的天花板上打些眼球塊獲得眼蕨芽!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.962.title: 太漂亮了!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.962.desc: 使用地獄之星合成魔幻雪世界球!造訪清單列出的至少7種生態域後啟動!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.963.title: 在岩漿中鍛造
divine_journey_2.quest.db.963.desc: 合成辛辛那金鍛造爐!功能和原版的熔爐一樣,除了燒製速度兩倍快.可以結合沉浸工藝的外置加熱器,不用燃料改用電燒製!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.964.title: 黃金大毀滅
divine_journey_2.quest.db.964.desc: 合成黃金怒火!這個武器有無限的耐久且使用金粒發射子彈.若在地獄用完了金粒,別忘了辛辛那金可以合成金粒.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.965.title: 別被尖刺絆住了
divine_journey_2.quest.db.965.desc: 用剪刀蒐集尖刺!想得到更多的話,記得從底部破壞,因為彈出且不是被剪刀破壞的話會直接消失.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.966.title: 重生錨但更酷
divine_journey_2.quest.db.966.desc: 找到以辛辛那金和骨塊建成的祭壇!會包含一個重生雕像!挖起來完成此任務!提供螢石粉設定重生點,甚至是在地獄或終界!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.967.title: 聞起來像燒焦的塑膠(歌詞梗)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.967.desc: 合成一些石筍,種在任何元素土上來獲得更多.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.968.title: 綠綠的嚼一嚼
divine_journey_2.quest.db.968.desc: 取得些石結木,通常在尖刺附近可發現!用斧頭敲下,無法取得葉子的版本但可獲得石結木芽後重新種植.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.969.title: 森林大火時不覺得痛
divine_journey_2.quest.db.969.desc: 蒐集些熔岩花芽,通常可在岩漿湖旁的岩漿塊上發現!這是在地獄裡最難找到的花其中之一,別放棄!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.970.title: 放棄了嗎?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.970.desc: 打些零星生成在地獄的龍舌蘭.不需要剪刀就可蒐集.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.971.title: 精英部隊
divine_journey_2.quest.db.971.desc: 將能量立方進一步升級成精英等級!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.972.title: 更上一層
divine_journey_2.quest.db.972.desc: 合成高級能量立方!可以用電弧爐或冶煉爐來製作充能合金.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.973.title: 一塊強力的金屬
divine_journey_2.quest.db.973.desc: 合成些強化合金!這材料是用在更高階的機器.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.974.title: 我無條件接受
divine_journey_2.quest.db.974.desc: 合成能源接收器!ME系統需要這台機器轉換電力.用玻璃,包層,或智慧線纜將接收器連接能量到控制器,或簡單點直接放在控制器旁.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.975.title: 速度與激情(沒有冰激淋)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.975.desc: 好,現在誰可能會需要比這個更多的能量!?%n%n*請填入另一個關於FPS問題的警告.*
divine_journey_2.quest.db.976.title: 可以的話再快一點!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.976.desc: 仍需要更多的能量傳輸嗎?好吧,合成些精英通用線纜,應該能夠滿足需求!再次強調,因為FPS的問題請謹慎使用.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.977.title: 充電
divine_journey_2.quest.db.977.desc: 合成充能器!用它來製作些充能賽特斯石英水晶!記得將它自動化,越快越好.在側邊街上2個物品導管:一個導入一般的賽特斯,一個導出充能的賽特斯!記得設置過濾器並設置充能賽特斯石英水晶.充能器可以接受一般的電力和轉換的電力(用能源轉換器和玻璃線纜接出來的).但很有可能在一般的電力下運作得更快.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.978.title: 我們要發財囉!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.978.desc: 使用冶金灌注器製作些富集合金!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.979.title: 重金屬
divine_journey_2.quest.db.979.desc: 合成冶金灌注機!這是通用機械的核心機器,會用它來製作所有通用機械的材料.所有通用機械的機器都一樣,可以將沉浸工藝的接線器放在任一面上,用線圈連接供電.供電後,將主要材料放入左側的第二欄,灌注的材料放入左側第一欄.注意這機器只能同時存入一種灌注材料,代表你最好多做幾台冶金灌注機作業上會比較方便.點擊左側的側面設定按鈕來自動化.可選擇哪一面要輸入物品,灌注材料,電力,哪一面要輸出產物.記得使用有導入或導出的功能物品如漏斗或物品管道加伺服器.還有件事:所有通用機械的機器都可以用熱力膨脹的新月錘拆起來移動,所以不必擔心能量的損失.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.980.title: 堅強起來
divine_journey_2.quest.db.980.desc: 合成鋼質機殼!用在所有通用機械機器的基礎.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.981.title: 樂意效勞
divine_journey_2.quest.db.981.desc: 合成些伺服器!皆在物品導管上讓它將容器的自動物品導出.右鍵伺服器調整紅石控制至忽略模式,讓它始終導出!發展至此也可以合成硬化伺服器,導出的速度快一些.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.982.title: 比漏斗更好
divine_journey_2.quest.db.982.desc: 合成些熱力膨脹的基礎物品導管!放在容器和機器的兩端,然後用伺服器導出.伺服器可以右鍵改成忽略紅石模式始終導出.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.983.title: 它正看著你呢
divine_journey_2.quest.db.983.desc: 合成蓋亞之眼...!%n%n%n%n...就...別讓它看到你..... D:
divine_journey_2.quest.db.984.title: 榮重為您介紹...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.984.desc: ...原子合金!純度是多麼無可挑剔啊!是如此壯闊的美麗!它是通用機械最高階的合金.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.985.title: 可以粉碎更多
divine_journey_2.quest.db.985.desc: 合成通用機械的粉碎機!它與富集倉並肩作戰,但不是研磨礦物,是把錠磨成粉.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.986.title: 礦物雙倍化,但更快速
divine_journey_2.quest.db.986.desc: 合成富集倉!可像冶金灌注機一樣供電和自動化.它可以將礦物雙倍,就像匠魂的冶煉爐.但能更簡單的自動化,因為它只有1格大.一旦將礦物磨成粉後,將它導入充能冶煉爐燒製成錠!你看,礦物雙倍化完成!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.987.title: 就像電容器
divine_journey_2.quest.db.987.desc: 合成基礎能量立方!這是通量機械中儲存能量的方式.你可以設定每一面要輸入或輸出能量.也可以將物品放入加號的欄位來充電,或放入減號欄位將物品的能量存入能量立方(當還有空間可儲存時).你可以用新月錘(Shift+右鍵)拆掉它以及其他通用機械的機器.即使拆掉,能量仍會儲存在內.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.988.title: 讓我瘋狂
divine_journey_2.quest.db.988.desc: 合成ME驅動器!這是你能放入儲存元件的地方,儲存元件內可存物品.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.989.title: 立刻列印,茲-茲!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.989.desc: 在壓印器合併你先前製作的電路板來製作處理器!建議做多個壓印器並自動化,因為從現在起你會需要很多處理器.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.990.title: 閃亮的紫色寶石
divine_journey_2.quest.db.990.desc: 將充能賽特斯石英水晶,紅石,一般的石英丟入一攤水中,看著它們全轉變成福魯伊克斯水晶!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.991.title: 噢不!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.991.desc: 它需要電力...很多電...才會覺醒...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.992.title: 有用的綠色小方形
divine_journey_2.quest.db.992.desc: 合成4個基礎控制電路!在製作更多機器時會大量地使用到.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.993.title: 太貴了嗎?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.993.desc: 若你的機器太耗電,或許值得用些能量升級!每台機器可以放入8個.在機器介面右上角的按鈕中放入!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.994.title: 發誓這不是鈾
divine_journey_2.quest.db.994.desc: 用鋨壓縮機製作些強化黑曜石錠和強化螢光石錠!然後放入電弧爐或冶煉爐中製作鋨螢黑曜合金錠!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.995.title: ME系統的心臟
divine_journey_2.quest.db.995.desc: 合成ME控制器並用能源接收器供電!每一面可提供32個頻道給AE2的機器使用.若你快用完頻道時,試著擴大控制器數量!只能接受擺成矩形的框,意思是2x2的範圍中,4個控制器不能接觸彼此!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.996.title: 額外的壓印模板
divine_journey_2.quest.db.996.desc: 找到額外五個自訂的壓印模板,在隕石中央的隕石儲物箱中!現在把它們找齊並不是太重要,當需要AE2進行自動合成,自動處理,液體氣體儲存,高等級的儲存元件,無線終端,和空間儲存時再回來看看.這是自訂的壓印模板和處理器會使用的地方.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.997.title: 恐龍死去的沙漠
divine_journey_2.quest.db.997.desc: 合成隕石羅盤並在沙漠次元中使用!沒錯,AE2的隕石不在主世界中生成,只生成在沙漠次元!這個羅盤會指引你附近最近含有隕石在內的區塊.當進入該區塊時它會開始轉動.確保隕石不在區塊邊界上,如果是的話,在正確的點上開始往下挖掘!隕石內中間有隕石儲物箱,包含了所有你需要的壓印模板.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.998.title: 接上你的抽屜!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.998.desc: 合成儲存匯流排並接上你的抽屜控制器就能在ME網路中存取所有的物品!可接上各種箱子和其他儲存設備也有同樣的功能.記得在右鍵將儲存匯流排的優先度設定高於ME驅動器,否則所有的放回系統的物品會存在驅動器內而不是抽屜.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.999.title: 需要的物品在別處!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.999.desc: 合成輸出匯流排!從ME系統中將物品送到其他地點!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1000.title: 蒐集所有物品!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1000.desc: 合成輸入匯流排!將外面的資源送回ME系統!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1001.title: 列印中,茲-茲!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1001.desc: 使用壓印器製作些邏輯電路板,工程電路板和矽板!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1002.title: 原生的四個
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1002.desc: 找到原生的四個應用能源模組的壓印模板,位在隕石內中央的隕石箱中!這是首先需要的四個壓印模板.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1003.title: 精密壓印
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1003.desc: 合成壓印器!使用在沙漠次元找到的AE2壓印模板和基礎材料,製作電路板和處理器!要自動化,在機器的不同面輸入物品.機器上方接受物品輸入至上方欄,側方接受物品至中央欄,你猜到下方會怎樣了.在另一側輸出物品.壓印器接受一般的電力,但也能從能源接收器接出的玻璃線纜供電運作.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1004.title: 頻道的頻道
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1004.desc: 一個緻密線纜只有32個頻道,但如果你想在遠處接上更多頻道,可以使用P2P通道.用這個,可以將緻密線纜轉換成在每個頻道中傳輸32個頻道,然後在另一邊的終點使用另一個P2P通道轉換回正常的功能.兩端的P2P通道要使用記憶卡連接.%n%n這可省下許多緻密線纜.與使用16個緻密線纜不同,可以只使用1個,在兩端使用16對16的P2P通道,並用記憶卡連接.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1005.title: Giga儲存器
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1005.desc: 想在更進一步嗎?合成一個1024k-ME儲存組件!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1006.title: Mega儲存器
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1006.desc: 一旦從別的章節獲得更高階的材料後,回來合成一個256k-ME儲存組件!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1007.title: 咻咻咻!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1007.desc: 合成些加速卡!可加速輸入輸出匯流排,或是壓印器的合成速度.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1008.title: 純度是關鍵
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1008.desc: 合成晶體催生器並放在一格水旁!用玻璃線纜接上電並丟入賽特斯石英種子.看著它轉換成高純賽特斯石英水晶!注意這台機器需要很多能量.建議用在玻璃線纜間放置觸發匯流排,在旁放個控制桿,只在晶體催生器要使用時打開.%n技術上水旁最多可放置6個晶體催生器讓它成長的更快,但放置6個會讓你無法碰到水.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1009.title: 快點!快點!!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1009.desc: 若基礎通用線纜無法傳輸足夠的能量,合成些高級通用線纜!然而請謹慎使用,因為效率低落的渲染導致FPS低落.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1010.title: 更多豐富的核心!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1010.desc: 合成兩個成型和破壞核心!AE2會用到的合成材料.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1011.title: 我的東西在哪?!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1011.desc: 合成ME終端並用玻璃或智慧線纜連接到網路中!可以看到儲存在網路中的物品,搜尋特定物品且有多種排序方式.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1012.title: 儲-存-器-!-!-! >:OOO
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1012.desc: 合成64k-ME儲存組件.在開始發展熱力膨脹前,這是可製做的最終儲存元件.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1013.title: 終極能量儲存
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1013.desc: 合成終極能量立方!現階段是你最佳的儲能方式!...直到發展至EnderIO或龍科技.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1014.title: 水管工++
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1014.desc: 液體傳輸不夠快嗎?合成些高級機械管道,或許能幫上忙!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1015.title: 想成為水管工
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1015.desc: 合成些基礎機械管道讓你更容易移動液體!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1016.title: 流體溢出了嗎?沒問題!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1016.desc: 合成3x3x3的動態儲罐多方塊結構所需材料!框架需要動態儲罐方塊,每個面則是結構玻璃.最後在其中一個側面(留中間是空的)放上動態閥門.注意你可以建個更大的儲罐,可達18x18x18,如果你需要這麼儲存多液體.使用機械管道將液體輸入或導出.每個方塊(包含邊框)可儲存64桶,所以3x3x3的儲罐可存1728桶,這會迅速的擴大.比如說5x5x5的儲罐可存8000桶.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1017.title: 儲存器!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1017.desc: 合成1k-ME儲存組件.你可以選擇用它製做儲存元件或是進一步升級成4k-ME儲存組件.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1018.title: 超級網路!有搞頭!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1018.desc: 合成些玻璃線纜!可以傳輸AE2電力和最多8個頻道.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1019.title: 更進一步
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1019.desc: 在電弧爐或冶煉爐中放入金,紅石,螢石粉,融合成4個充能合金錠!用這個材料合成高級控制電路!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1020.title: 是我啊,瑪利歐!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1020.desc: 合成些精英機械管道,若你還是不滿意液體的傳輸速度!目前為止,這是你能使用的最高等級.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1021.title: 頻道溢出
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1021.desc: 合成些緻密線纜!可以傳輸32個頻道,但不能和小方塊連接,像是儲存,輸出或輸入匯流排.使用智慧線纜將緻密線纜分支出來可避免這個問題-但切記,智慧線纜只能傳輸8個頻道!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1022.title: 頻道糾纏
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1022.desc: 合成些智慧線纜!比玻璃線纜增加了功能,可以顯示線纜上有多少頻道正在使用,還剩多少可用的頻道.不同顏色的智慧線纜不會連接在一起,但會和無色的智慧線纜連接.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1023.title: 終極儲存器
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1023.desc: 越來越荒謬了...合成4096k-ME儲存組件!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1024.title: 極限儲存器
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1024.desc: 你做到了!這是能製做的最高等級物品儲存組件...!合成16384k-ME儲存組件,或稱為16M-ME儲存組件!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1025.title: 計算中,算計中?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1025.desc: 將高純賽特斯石英水晶用壓印器製做些運算處理器!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1026.title: 這批很純!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1026.desc: 合成些賽特斯石英種子並使用晶體催生器讓它成長成高純賽特斯石英水晶!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1027.title: 從小元件到大元件
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1027.desc: 若你有一些裝滿的小型儲存元件,旦你想要升級大型的儲存元件,可以合成ME-IO埠.可從小型元件將物品導出至儲存網路中.若網路中只有大型的元件,這是有效地將物品從小型元件傳輸到大型元件的方法.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1028.title: 儲存器!!! >:O
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1028.desc: 合成16k-ME儲存組件!若你開始運轉採礦場時,或許你會考慮在這,或是大一點的元件中儲存你的物品.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1029.title: 儲存器! :O
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1029.desc: 合成4k-ME儲存組件!在遊戲前期也許夠用的.有相當大的空間能儲存物品.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1030.title: 取得Mek電線!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1030.desc: 合成些基礎通用線纜!可簡單的在兩點間傳輸能量!然而,我仍建議你使用沉浸工藝的電線,因為1.12通用機械的通用線纜,由於效率低落的渲染,往往會導致FPS低落.請謹慎使用!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1031.title: 抽它(大聲)!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1031.desc: Song : The Black Eyed Peas - Pump It%nTurn up the radio! Blast the stereo! Riiiiiiiight noooowwww...!%n合成電動泵!若想要在地獄獲得大量的岩漿可用這個.比起一桶一桶裝岩漿簡單的多.將它放在流體源上,側邊供電,上方放個流體儲罐.之後你可以連接量子傳送裝置來無線傳輸流體.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1032.title: 好壓好壓
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1032.desc: 合成鋨壓縮機!能製作通用機械所需的更多合成材料.可用冶金灌注機一樣的方法自動化.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1033.title: 1格大的液體儲存
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1033.desc: 努力向上做出終極液體儲罐!現在,在1x1的空間中,這是你最佳的液體儲存方式,雖然做動態儲罐的多方塊結構可儲存更多.就像其他的通用機械機器和方塊一樣,它也可以用新月錘敲下移動(Shift+右鍵),且仍會保留已儲存的液體.當升級儲罐等級時也會保存著.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1034.title: 呵呵,燒起來吧!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1034.desc: 合成充能冶煉爐!可將粉燒成錠或只把它當成用電運作的熔爐.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1035.title: 太吵了嗎?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1035.desc: 合成4個降噪升級!可在任何機器界面中,右上方按鈕放入升級,每個升級會讓機器變得更安靜點.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1036.title: 太慢了嗎?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1036.desc: 合成8個速度升級!通用機械能接受的最大升級.在任何機械介面右上方的升級按鈕,在右上方欄位放入升級.但請注意,每個升級,機器會需要更多更多的能量!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1037.title: 我拿走一個RA!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1037.desc: 爬上太陽祭司高塔頂端並摧毀中央被玻璃包住的結構.左鍵它會爆炸並掉落太陽神之心.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1038.title: 骯髒的遺物
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1038.desc: 在地下找到蘊藏古物的礦,且別用絲綢之觸挖掘!從中獲得每一種骯髒的遺物.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1039.title: 鐵製棕石魔像
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1039.desc: 請閱讀泥製棕石魔像的任務說明!鐵製棕石魔像在迷宮的東北方角落.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1040.title: 前進,前往蟲蟲之境!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1040.desc: 進入混沌之地!記得帶上很多食物,好的裝備,背包和水桶.你會在裡面待上一陣子.進入後,在那裡的傳送門旁的蓋亞楔石,放上你的第二個蓋亞權杖.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1041.title: 為了混沌之地的旅程
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1041.desc: 合成'兩個'蓋亞寶石!一個用來進入混沌之地,另一個用來離開混沌之地.(你不想被困在裡面,對吧?)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1042.title: 別奉獻太多
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1042.desc: 合成混沌之地的奉獻祭壇!右鍵放入需要的三種物品來使用它,但等等...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1043.title: [神器] 近戰武器
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1043.desc: 找到並襲擊金字塔!往下進入迷宮.在陷阱上用鎬右鍵可將它停止.到達終點並用4個皇家火把召喚法老.擊敗後,在墳墓上右鍵找到各種寶藏但僅會有一個神器!神器有4種:近戰,遠程,盔甲和項鍊.你需要找到兩種不同類型的神器(所以至少要襲擊2個金字塔)才能繼續下去.具體來說要完成這個任務,需要1個近戰神器.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1044.title: 謎底揭曉
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1044.desc: 合成聖甲蟲寶石!用來進入沙漠次元.製作傳送門,用砂岩放置成5x5的平台,四邊多放一格高,然後用水填滿3x3的中央區域.最後在四個角落放上2格高的砂岩,並丟入聖甲蟲寶石.%n%n注意:若在創造模式下建造此傳送門時,因為某些原因不能正確開啟,試著不要飛行中建造.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1045.title: 別緊張
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1045.desc: 種些古代小麥!這是沙漠次元版本的小麥.為了種它,需要水和耕地,在綠洲找找或回主世界種.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1046.title: 種子中的能量!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1046.desc: 在沙漠次元綠洲中打些芒草或從寶藏箱中取得古麥種子!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1047.title: 不夠M,再M一點!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1047.desc: 用石磨粉碎古代小麥取得些古麥麵粉!右鍵水源方塊將古麥麵粉轉換成古麥麵團.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1048.title: 手工勞力
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1048.desc: 將磁磚方塊染成棕色,合成石磨!要使用,在上面放些物品,空手按住右鍵把上方的材料磨碎.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1049.title: 你是個巫師,哈利!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1049.desc: 合成'兩個'蓋亞權杖.一個用來進入混沌之地,另一個用來離開混沌之地.%n%n[當你困在混沌之地的時候看這邊] 好吧,看來你沒聽到我說的,已經警告你很多次了.這次是你的問題了.所有奉獻祭壇,蓋亞寶石和蓋亞權杖需要的材料可以在混沌之地裡面找到.綠寶石相當稀少,但你可以從這章的任務獎勵中拿到一些.然後,是時候挖礦了!對了,若你不能合成熔爐,請回想一下第一個鐵是怎麼做的.當然你也可以在混沌之地裡找到蒲公英和黃色花瓣塊.(順帶一提,這就是為什麼奉獻祭壇,蓋亞寶石和蓋亞權杖只需要這麼基礎的材料.)
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1050.title: 缺食物嗎?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1050.desc: 狼蛛腿可能很噁心,但如果沒有更好的選擇,把它煮來吃吧!口感脆脆的.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1051.title: 放上樹葉
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1051.desc: 合成蓋亞楔石!然後用任何實體方塊建造傳送門框架並在中間放滿樹葉方塊!框架可以是任何形狀,凹的凸的,水平或垂直的.在傳送門前放上蓋亞楔石並放入蓋亞權杖來開啟傳送門.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1052.title: 刷怪場的完美道具
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1052.desc: 合成至少一個速率方塊!任何在上方的實體,會以5倍的行走速度往箭頭方向推送.除此之外,怪物能在這些方塊上方生成,用在刷怪場的地板是很完美的!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1053.title: 剝下條紋
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1053.desc: 從避日蛛(在Ulterior Outback生態域中)或蜈蚣(在Ulterior Outback/Elysian Fields/Subterranean Savannah生態域中)身上獲得些生物加速器!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1054.title: 清洗乾淨!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1054.desc: 把骯髒的遺物用水洗淨成美麗的遺物!你可以右鍵把它賣給太陽祭司換取金幣.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1055.title: [神器] 項鍊
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1055.desc: 詳閱近戰神器的任務敘述.這個任務是神器中最稀有的種類,項鍊神器!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1056.title: 告密者發大財
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1056.desc: 找到太陽祭司高塔!在沙漠次元中的高山區域常見到,會發出紅色烽火台光束.拿洗淨的遺物右鍵跟他們交易金幣!用這個方式可獲得超級大量的金幣.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1057.title: 絲線威脅
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1057.desc: 使用紡紗機製作12個亞麻絲線!雖然只要這些量就能完成任務,但之後你可能會需要更多...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1058.title: 亞麻轉起來
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1058.desc: 合成紡紗車!使用時,手持3個亞麻花對上方按住右鍵.%nSong : Flo Rida - Right Round %nThen You spin my flax right round, right round, when you go down, when you go down, down,%n你可以從方塊的側面取得產物亞麻絲線.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1059.title: 真是柔軟!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1059.desc: 種些亞麻花!會需要水和耕地,你可以找綠洲或回主世界種.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1060.title: 打破第四面牆
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1060.desc: 在沙漠中找到奇特的駱駝型建築!進去找些開發者的笑話,有可能不會破壞第四面牆,就能找到怪異的駱駝雕像.甚至可以右鍵點它開始對話...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1061.title: 最有用的冰沙
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1061.desc: 在混沌之地中從那些有毒蟲上取得些毒腺,和蕁麻上的蕁麻葉,在Elysian Fields或%nSubterranean Savannahs生態域中能找到!%n這或許是你能製作最有用的藥水,因為這個維度的生物很多都會使你中毒.與狼蛛和狼育母作戰時特別有用.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1062.title: 好吃!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1062.desc: 合成混沌之地公司數控冰沙製造機2000型!它用來製作具有各種神奇效果的冰沙(如同藥水).
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1063.title: 絲綢的奇蹟
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1063.desc: 在地下找到蘊藏古物的礦並用絲綢之觸挖起來!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1064.title: 想蓋間浴室?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1064.desc: 在沙漠次元地下找些泥灰岩並用窯燒爐燒製作些白色磁磚方塊!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1065.title: 沙漠之火
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1065.desc: 用遺跡錠合成些遺跡塊並製作沙漠次元的窯燒爐!這是用2個窯燒爐和6個石灰岩磚(小)放成2x2的多方塊結構.窯燒爐在上方同一排並放在一起.這台機器可像一般熔爐使用或用來製作些沙漠次元的物品.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1066.title: 黑色狼蛛
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1066.desc: 找到巨大桉樹,生成在Ulterior Outback生態域中.%n擊敗底層的狼蛛,爬上最高處和狼育母作戰!第1階段,只能用遠程武器傷害它.若你使用的是黃金怒火,記得站遠一點才能擊中它!當血量低於50%開始第2階段.這階段只能近戰攻擊造成傷害.在塔頂旁蓋個平台來作戰也許是個好主意,至少你不會在第1階段就被打敗了.祝你好運!擊敗後挖下它留下的狼蛛卵...你會需要的!%n%nSong : Pendulum - Tarantula %nBlack Tarantula, time for the massive come sing ya!%nBlack Tarantula, don't play with my style I might sting ya...!%nBlack tarantula, you want me inject me bacteria..!%nAnd if ya body goin' stiff and your spine goin' numb... Now come fi' get some...
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1067.title: 亞圖姆之魂
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1067.desc: 但它看起來應該沒有靈魂才對... 還是說其實有...?
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1068.title: 蓬蓬的!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1068.desc: 合成些白色麻布塊!這能替代羊毛使用,或合成亞圖姆人偶.
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1069.title: 比綠寶石美味
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1069.desc: 在你把古麥麵粉右鍵在水源方塊上轉換成古麥麵團後,將它燒製成古麥麵包!
divine_journey_2.quest.db.1070.title: 搖滾吧
